CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[MessageDelete] (
	@SenderID int,
	@MessageID int
)
AS

SET NOCOUNT ON

update [SentMessage] set [IsDeleted] = 1 where [RecieverID] = @SenderID and [FKMessageID] = @MessageID


GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[MessageInsert]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO


CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[MessageInsert] (
	@MessageDate datetime,
	@Description text,
	@SenderID int,
	@LevelID int,
	@IsReply bit,
	@ParentID int
)
AS

SET NOCOUNT ON

declare @NewMessageID int 
INSERT INTO [Message] (
	[MessageDate],
	[Description],
	[SenderID],
	[LevelID],
	[IsReply],
	[ParentID]
) VALUES (
	@MessageDate,
	@Description,
	@SenderID,
	@LevelID,
	@IsReply,
	@ParentID
)
set @NewMessageID = (SELECT SCOPE_IDENTITY() )
INSERT INTO [SentMessage] (	
	[FKMessageID],
	[RecieverID],
	[IsRead],
	[IsDeleted]
) VALUES (	
	@NewMessageID,
	(select SenderID from Message where PKMessageID = @ParentID),
	0,
	0
)

SELECT @NewMessageID AS PKMessageID


GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[MessageSelect]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

--- Exec TechnicianMessageListing 122
CREATE Procedure [dbo].[MessageSelect]
(
	@PKMessageID int 
)
as

begin
--Select *, (select FirstName from Account where FKLevelID = LevelID and PKAccountID = SenderID) as SenderName 
--from Message where PkMessageID in (Select FKMessageID from SentMessage where RecieverID = @TechnicianID) order by MessageDate Desc


SELECT m.PKMessageID, m.MessageDate, m.Description, m.SenderID, m.LevelID, m.IsReply, m.ParentID,
(select FirstName from Account where FKLevelID = LevelID and PKAccountID = m.SenderID) as SenderName 
FROM  Message AS m  where m.PKMessageID = @PKMessageID 
end

GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[MyConfirmredProgramsCalenderViewSelectAll]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

--SELECT * FROM Position p WHERE p.PKPositionID NOT IN (SELECT sp.FKPositionID
--                                                      FROM ShowPositions sp)
---exec [MyConfirmredProgramsCalenderViewSelectAll] 122,'2012'
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[MyConfirmredProgramsCalenderViewSelectAll] (@PKTechnicianID INT, @SearchText NVARCHAR(10))
AS
	SELECT s.[PKShowID],
	       s.[Title],
	       (
	           SELECT STUFF(
	                      (
	                          SELECT DISTINCT '##' + CAST(TravelDate AS VARCHAR)
	                          FROM   ShowTravelDate
	                          WHERE  FKShowID = s.PKShowID
	                                 FOR XML PATH('')
	                      ),
	                      1,
	                      2,
	                      ''
	                  )
	       ) AS TravelDates,
	       DATEPART(yyyy, [StartDate]) AS YEAR,
	       (
	           (DATEDIFF(d, [StartDate], [EndDate]) + 1) -(
	               SELECT COUNT(FKShowID)
	               FROM   ShowTravelDate std
	               WHERE  std.FKShowID = s.PKShowID
	           )
	       ) AS ShowDays,
	       (
	           SELECT COUNT(FKShowID)
	           FROM   ShowTravelDate std
	           WHERE  std.FKShowID = s.PKShowID
	       ) AS TravelDays,
	       (DATEDIFF(d, [StartDate], [EndDate]) + 1) AS TotalDays,
	       s.[FkCustomerID],
	       s.[DayRateValue],
	       s.[isPublished],
	       s.[StartDate],
	       s.[EndDate]
	FROM   [Show] s
	       INNER JOIN Technician t
	            ON  s.isPublished = t.isApproved
	WHERE  t.PKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID
	       --AND (
	       --        s.PKShowID IN (SELECT FKShowID
	       --                       FROM   ShowPositions sp
	       --                       WHERE  sp.FKPositionID IN (SELECT tp.FKPositionID
	       --                                                  FROM   
	       --                                                         TechnicianPositions 
	       --                                                         tp
	       --                                                  WHERE  tp.FKTechnicianID = 
	       --                                                         @PKTechnicianID
	       --                                                         AND tp.StatusID = 
	       --                                                             1))
	       --    )
	       --AND (
	       --        (
	       --            s.IsOnlyTechWithPassport = t.hasPassport
	       --            AND s.IsOnlyTechWithPassport <> 0
	       --        )
	       --        OR (
	       --               s.IsOnlyShareRoomTech = t.ishotelshare
	       --               AND s.IsOnlyShareRoomTech <> 0
	       --           )
	       --        OR (
	       --               s.IsOnlyAccessTech = t.isAccess
	       --               AND s.IsOnlyAccessTech <> 0
	       --           )
	       --        OR (s.IsAllAvailableTech = 1)
	       --    )
	       AND CAST(DATEPART(yyyy, s.[StartDate]) AS VARCHAR) = @SearchText
	       AND (
	               (
	                   SELECT COUNT(b.PKBidID)
	                   FROM   Bid b
	                   WHERE  b.FKShowID = s.PKShowID
	                          AND b.FKTechnicianID = t.PKTechnicianID
	                          AND b.isApproved = 1
	               ) > 0
	           )
	
	DECLARE @Year TABLE (YEAR NVARCHAR(4))
	INSERT INTO @Year
	SELECT DISTINCT DATENAME(yyyy, [StartDate]) AS YEAR
	FROM   [dbo].[Show] s
	       INNER JOIN Technician t
	            ON  s.isPublished = t.isApproved
	WHERE  t.PKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID
	       AND (
	               s.PKShowID IN (SELECT FKShowID
	                              FROM   ShowPositions sp
	                              WHERE  sp.FKPositionID IN (SELECT tp.FKPositionID
	                                                         FROM   
	                                                                TechnicianPositions 
	                                                                tp
	                                                         WHERE  tp.FKTechnicianID = 
	                                                                @PKTechnicianID
	                                                                AND tp.StatusID = 
	                                                                    1))
	           )
	       AND (
	               (
	                   s.IsOnlyTechWithPassport = t.hasPassport
	                   AND s.IsOnlyTechWithPassport <> 0
	               )
	               OR (
	                      s.IsOnlyShareRoomTech = t.ishotelshare
	                      AND s.IsOnlyShareRoomTech <> 0
	                  )
	               OR (
	                      s.IsOnlyAccessTech = t.isAccess
	                      AND s.IsOnlyAccessTech <> 0
	                  )
	               OR (s.IsAllAvailableTech = 1)
	           )
	       AND (
	               (
	                   SELECT COUNT(b.PKBidID)
	                   FROM   Bid b
	                   WHERE  b.FKShowID = s.PKShowID
	                          AND b.FKTechnicianID = t.PKTechnicianID
	                          AND b.isApproved = 1
	               ) > 0
	           )
	
	IF (
	       (
	           SELECT COUNT(YEAR)
	           FROM   @Year
	           WHERE  [YEAR] = DATENAME(yyyy, GETDATE())
	       ) = 0
	   )
	BEGIN
	    INSERT INTO @Year
	    SELECT DISTINCT DATENAME(yyyy, GETDATE())
	END
	
	SELECT *
	FROM   @Year
	       
	       
	       
	       
	       
	       
	       


GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[MyConfirmredProgramsCalenderViewSelectAllByMonth]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
--SELECT * FROM Position p WHERE p.PKPositionID NOT IN (SELECT sp.FKPositionID
--                                                      FROM ShowPositions sp)
---exec [MyConfirmredProgramsCalenderViewSelectAllByMonth] 122,2012,12
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[MyConfirmredProgramsCalenderViewSelectAllByMonth] (@PKTechnicianID INT, @Year INT , @Month int)
AS
	SELECT s.[PKShowID],
	       s.[Title],
	       (
	           SELECT STUFF(
	                      (
	                          SELECT DISTINCT '##' + CAST(TravelDate AS VARCHAR)
	                          FROM   ShowTravelDate
	                          WHERE  FKShowID = s.PKShowID
	                                 FOR XML PATH('')
	                      ),
	                      1,
	                      2,
	                      ''
	                  )
	       ) AS TravelDates,
	       DATEPART(yyyy, [StartDate]) AS YEAR,
	       (
	           (DATEDIFF(d, [StartDate], [EndDate]) + 1) -(
	               SELECT COUNT(FKShowID)
	               FROM   ShowTravelDate std
	               WHERE  std.FKShowID = s.PKShowID
	           )
	       ) AS ShowDays,
	       (
	           SELECT COUNT(FKShowID)
	           FROM   ShowTravelDate std
	           WHERE  std.FKShowID = s.PKShowID
	       ) AS TravelDays,
	       (DATEDIFF(d, [StartDate], [EndDate]) + 1) AS TotalDays,
	       s.[FkCustomerID],
	       s.[DayRateValue],
	       s.[isPublished],
	       s.[StartDate],
	       s.[EndDate]
	FROM   [Show] s
	       INNER JOIN Technician t
	            ON  s.isPublished = t.isApproved
	WHERE  t.PKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID
	       --AND (
	       --        s.PKShowID IN (SELECT FKShowID
	       --                       FROM   ShowPositions sp
	       --                       WHERE  sp.FKPositionID IN (SELECT tp.FKPositionID
	       --                                                  FROM   
	       --                                                         TechnicianPositions 
	       --                                                         tp
	       --                                                  WHERE  tp.FKTechnicianID = 
	       --                                                         @PKTechnicianID
	       --                                                         AND tp.StatusID = 
	       --                                                             1))
	       --    )
	       --AND (
	       --        (
	       --            s.IsOnlyTechWithPassport = t.hasPassport
	       --            AND s.IsOnlyTechWithPassport <> 0
	       --        )
	       --        OR (
	       --               s.IsOnlyShareRoomTech = t.ishotelshare
	       --               AND s.IsOnlyShareRoomTech <> 0
	       --           )
	       --        OR (
	       --               s.IsOnlyAccessTech = t.isAccess
	       --               AND s.IsOnlyAccessTech <> 0
	       --           )
	       --        OR (s.IsAllAvailableTech = 1)
	       --    )
	       AND CAST(DATEPART(yyyy, s.[StartDate]) AS int) = @Year
	       AND CAST(DATEPART(mm, s.[StartDate]) AS int) = @Month
	       AND (
	               (
	                   SELECT COUNT(b.PKBidID)
	                   FROM   Bid b
	                   WHERE  b.FKShowID = s.PKShowID
	                          AND b.FKTechnicianID = t.PKTechnicianID
	                          AND b.isApproved = 1
	               ) > 0
	           )
	
	
	       
	       

GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[MyConfirmredProgramsSelectAll]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

--SELECT * FROM Position p WHERE p.PKPositionID NOT IN (SELECT sp.FKPositionID
--                                                      FROM ShowPositions sp)
---exec [MyConfirmredProgramsSelectAll]  1,30,'Title','Desc','2012',122
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[MyConfirmredProgramsSelectAll] (
    @PageIndex       INT,
    @RecordsPerPage  INT,
    @SortBy          NVARCHAR(50),
    @OrderBy         NVARCHAR(50),
    @SearchText      NVARCHAR(50),
    @PKTechnicianID  INT
    
)
AS
	SET NOCOUNT ON
	DECLARE @startRowIndex  INT;
	DECLARE @endRowIndex    INT;
	DECLARE @Str            NVARCHAR(MAX)
	SET @endRowIndex = (@PageIndex * @RecordsPerPage);
	SET @startRowIndex = (@endRowIndex - @RecordsPerPage) + 1;
	
	
	
	SET @Str = 'select * from (
	SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ' + @SortBy + ' ' + @OrderBy +') as Row,
	s.[PKShowID],
	s.[Title],
	s.[Email],
	s.[Description],
	s.[FkCustomerID],
	s.[City],
	s.[State],
	s.[Country],
	s.[NearestAirport],	
	s.[LogoPath],
	s.[bidStartDate],
	s.[bidEndDate],
	s.[DayRateValue],
	s.[isPublished],
	s.[PublishedDate],
	s.[isActive],
	s.[IsAllTech],
	s.[IsAllAvailableTech],
	s.[IsOnlyAccessTech],
	s.[IsOnlyTechWithPassport],
	s.[IsOnlyShareRoomTech],	
	s.[StartDate],
	s.[EndDate],
	(SELECT  STUFF((  
	select DISTINCT ''##''+ cast(TravelDate AS VARCHAR)
	FROM ShowTravelDate  where FKShowID = s.PKShowID
	FOR XML PATH('''')),1,2,'''')) as TravelDates,
	datepart(yyyy,[StartDate]) as Year,
	(SELECT  STUFF((  
	 select DISTINCT '', ''+ CAST( (select PositionName from Position where PKPositionID = FKPositionID) as varchar)
	 +''(''+cast(NoOfPosition as varchar)+'')'' FROM ShowPositions   where FKShowID = PKShowID	FOR XML PATH('''')),1,1,'''')) as Positions,	
	((datediff (d, [StartDate], [EndDate]) + 1) - (SELECT COUNT(FKShowID) FROM ShowTravelDate std WHERE std.FKShowID = s.PKShowID)) AS ShowDays,
	(SELECT COUNT(FKShowID) FROM ShowTravelDate std WHERE std.FKShowID = s.PKShowID) AS TravelDays,	
	(datediff (d, [StartDate], [EndDate]) + 1) AS TotalDays,	
	case when(datename(mm,[StartDate]) = datename(mm,[EndDate]))
	then
	SUBSTRING(datename(mm,[StartDate]),0,4)+'' ''+ CAST(datepart(dd,[StartDate]) as varchar) 
	+''-'' +CAST(datepart(dd,[EndDate])as varchar)	
	else
	SUBSTRING(datename(mm,[StartDate]),0,4)+'' ''+ CAST(datepart(dd,[StartDate]) as varchar) +''-''
	+SUBSTRING(datename(mm,[EndDate]),0,4)+'' ''+ CAST(datepart(dd,[EndDate])as varchar)	
	End as ShowDates,
	(select Count(*) from ShowPositions where FKShowID = PKShowID) as PositionCount,
	(select Count(*) from Bid where FKShowID = PKShowID) as BidCount	
FROM
	[Show] s INNER JOIN Technician t ON s.isPublished = t.isApproved 
	where 
	--s.[Title] like ''%'' + @SearchText+''%'' and
	t.PKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID 
	--AND 
	--(s.PKShowID IN (SELECT FKShowID FROM ShowPositions sp WHERE sp.FKPositionID IN 
	--(SELECT tp.FKPositionID FROM TechnicianPositions tp WHERE tp.FKTechnicianID  = @PKTechnicianID and tp.StatusID = 1) ))
	--AND
	--((s.IsOnlyTechWithPassport = t.hasPassport AND s.IsOnlyTechWithPassport <> 0)OR
	-- (s.IsOnlyShareRoomTech = t.ishotelshare AND s.IsOnlyShareRoomTech <> 0)OR
	-- (s.IsOnlyAccessTech = t.isAccess AND s.IsOnlyAccessTech <> 0) OR
	-- (s.IsAllAvailableTech = 1)
	--)
	and cast(datepart(yyyy,s.[StartDate]) as varchar) = @SearchText
	and(
	(SELECT COUNT(b.PKBidID)
                         FROM   Bid b
                         WHERE  b.FKShowID = s.PKShowID
                                AND b.FKTechnicianID = t.PKTechnicianID
                                AND b.isApproved = 1) > 0)
	) as tmpTable
	WHERE Row between 
	@startRowIndex and @endRowIndex;'
	
	
	PRINT(@STR)
	
	
	-- Table 1: Content record
	EXEC sp_executesql @STR,
	     N'	@endRowIndex INT = NULL,
								@startRowIndex INT = NULL,
								@SortBy nvarchar(50)=null,
								@OrderBy nvarchar(50)=null,
								@SearchText nvarchar(50)=null,
								@PKTechnicianID int = null',
								@endRowIndex,
								@startRowIndex,
								@SortBy,
								@OrderBy,
								@SearchText,
								@PKTechnicianID;
	
	SELECT COUNT(*)
	FROM   [dbo].[Show] s
	       INNER JOIN Technician t
	            ON  s.isPublished = t.isApproved
	WHERE  t.PKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID
	       --AND (
	       --        s.PKShowID IN (SELECT FKShowID
	       --                       FROM   ShowPositions sp
	       --                       WHERE  sp.FKPositionID IN (SELECT tp.FKPositionID
	       --                                                  FROM   
	       --                                                         TechnicianPositions 
	       --                                                         tp
	       --                                                  WHERE  tp.FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID AND tp.StatusID = 1))
	       --    )
	       --AND (
	       --        (
	       --            s.IsOnlyTechWithPassport = t.hasPassport
	       --            AND s.IsOnlyTechWithPassport <> 0
	       --        )
	       --        OR (
	       --               s.IsOnlyShareRoomTech = t.ishotelshare
	       --               AND s.IsOnlyShareRoomTech <> 0
	       --           )
	       --        OR (
	       --               s.IsOnlyAccessTech = t.isAccess
	       --               AND s.IsOnlyAccessTech <> 0
	       --           )
	       --        OR (s.IsAllAvailableTech = 1)
	       --)
	       and cast(datepart(yyyy,s.[StartDate]) as varchar) = @SearchText
	       and(
	(SELECT COUNT(b.PKBidID)
                         FROM   Bid b
                         WHERE  b.FKShowID = s.PKShowID
                                AND b.FKTechnicianID = t.PKTechnicianID
                                AND b.isApproved = 1) > 0)
	       --AND [Title] LIKE '%' + @SearchText + '%'
	DECLARE @Year TABLE (YEAR NVARCHAR(4))
	INSERT INTO @Year
	SELECT distinct datename(yyyy,[StartDate]) as Year
	FROM   [dbo].[Show] s
	       INNER JOIN Technician t
	            ON  s.isPublished = t.isApproved
	WHERE  t.PKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID
	       --AND (
	       --        s.PKShowID IN (SELECT FKShowID
	       --                       FROM   ShowPositions sp
	       --                       WHERE  sp.FKPositionID IN (SELECT tp.FKPositionID
	       --                                                  FROM   
	       --                                                         TechnicianPositions 
	       --                                                         tp
	       --                                                  WHERE  tp.FKTechnicianID = 
	       --                                                         @PKTechnicianID AND tp.StatusID = 1))
	       --    )
	       --AND (
	       --        (
	       --            s.IsOnlyTechWithPassport = t.hasPassport
	       --            AND s.IsOnlyTechWithPassport <> 0
	       --        )
	       --        OR (
	       --               s.IsOnlyShareRoomTech = t.ishotelshare
	       --               AND s.IsOnlyShareRoomTech <> 0
	       --           )
	       --        OR (
	       --               s.IsOnlyAccessTech = t.isAccess
	       --               AND s.IsOnlyAccessTech <> 0
	       --           )
	       --        OR (s.IsAllAvailableTech = 1)
	       --)
	       and(
	(SELECT COUNT(b.PKBidID)
                         FROM   Bid b
                         WHERE  b.FKShowID = s.PKShowID
                                AND b.FKTechnicianID = t.PKTechnicianID
                                AND b.isApproved = 1) > 0)
	IF ((SELECT COUNT(YEAR) FROM @Year WHERE [YEAR] = datename(yyyy,GETDATE())) = 0 )
	BEGIN
		INSERT INTO @Year
		SELECT distinct datename(yyyy,GETDATE())
	END
	       
	SELECT * FROM @Year
	       --AND  s.[StartDate] between @FromDate and @ToDate
	       
	       
	       
	       
	       
	       
	       


GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[MyPerformance]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
  
  
  
---  exec MyPerformance 160,'2012-09-01','2012-12-31'  
CREATE Procedure [dbo].[MyPerformance](@TechnicianID int,@FromDate datetime, @ToDate datetime)  
as  
Begin  
--------- For First Table  
--WITH tmp   
--AS  
--(     
----select row_number() over (order by AVG(r.AverateRate) desc) as Rank, isnull(cast(AVG(r.AverateRate) as float),0) as AvgRating , t.PkTechnicianID from technician t left join Ratings r on t.PKTechnicianID = r.FKTechnicianID group by t.PKTechnicianID,
----t.dtApprovaldate  
-- select row_number() over (order by isnull(t.Rating,0) desc, t.CreatedDate) as RANK,CAST(isnull(t.Rating,0) AS DECIMAL(3,2)) AS AvgRating, t.PKTechnicianID FROM Technician t  WHERE t.isApproved = 1 
--)  
--SELECT 1,(select count(*) FROM tmp) as TotalTechs,PKTechnicianID, Rank,AvgRating,  
-- isnull((select cast(AVG(r.AverateRate) as float) from show s left join Ratings r on s.PKShowID = r.FKShowID where r.FKTechnicianID = @TechnicianID and  DATEPART(yyyy, s.[StartDate]) = DATEPART(yyyy, @FromDate) group by r.FKTechnicianID),0) as YearlyRating ,  
--isnull( (select cast(AVG(r.AverateRate) as float) from show s left join Ratings r on s.PKShowID = r.FKShowID where r.FKTechnicianID = @TechnicianID and  DATEPART(yyyy, s.[StartDate]) = DATEPART(yyyy, @FromDate) and (s.StartDate between @FromDate and @ToDate) group by r.FKTechnicianID),0) as QuaterlyRating ,  
-- isnull((select top 1 cast(r.AverateRate as float) from show s left join Ratings r on s.PKShowID = r.FKShowID where r.FKTechnicianID = @TechnicianID and isnull(r.AverateRate,0) <> 0 order by s.StartDate desc),0) as LastShowRating ,  
-- isnull((select cast(AVG(Past5) as float) from(select row_number() over (order by s.StartDate desc) as Row, cast(AVG(r.AverateRate) as float) as Past5 from show s left join Ratings r on s.PKShowID = r.FKShowID where r.FKTechnicianID = @TechnicianID and isnull(r.AverateRate,0) <> 0 group by s.StartDate) as tmp where Row < 6),0) as Past5Rating from tmp  where PKTechnicianID = @TechnicianID   
  declare @tmpTechShows TABLE
(
	Rating FLOAT,
	StartDate DATETIME,
	PKShowID int	
)

INSERT INTO @tmpTechShows
SELECT CAST(ISNULL(r.AverateRate,0) as float) AS Rating, s.StartDate,s.PKShowID
  from show s left join Ratings r on s.PKShowID = r.FKShowID where r.FKTechnicianID = @TechnicianID ORDER BY s.StartDate


SELECT 1,
@TechnicianID AS PKTechnicianID, 
ISNULL((SELECT AVG(Rating) FROM @tmpTechShows),0) AS AvgRating,
isnull((select AVG(Rating) from @tmpTechShows where DATEPART(yyyy, StartDate) = DATEPART(yyyy, @FromDate) group by Rating),0) as YearlyRating ,  
isnull((select AVG(Rating) from @tmpTechShows where DATEPART(yyyy, StartDate) = DATEPART(yyyy, @FromDate) and (StartDate between @FromDate and @ToDate) group by Rating),0) as QuaterlyRating ,  
isnull((select top 1 AVG(Rating) from @tmpTechShows where isnull(Rating,0) <> 0),0) as LastShowRating ,  
isnull((SELECT TOP 5 AVG(Rating) from @tmpTechShows where isnull(Rating,0) <> 0),0) as Past5Rating ,
(SELECT RANK FROM (select row_number() over (order by isnull(t.Rating,0) desc, t.CreatedDate) as RANK,t.PKTechnicianID 
FROM Technician t WHERE t.isApproved = 1 ) AS tmp WHERE tmp.PKTechnicianID = @TechnicianID) AS Rank,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Technician t WHERE t.isApproved = 1)  AS Totaltechs
  
  
 ----------- For PositionWise Ratings  
  
  
DECLARE @tblPositionWiseRating TABLE (  
 Rank INT,  
 AvgRating float,  
 PositionName VARCHAR(50),  
 TechnicianID int  
)  
  
  
  
  Declare @FKPositionID int      
  Declare Tech_Positions CURSOR FOR   
  SELECT FKPositionID FROM TechnicianPositions WHERE FKTechnicianID=@TechnicianID  
  OPEN Tech_Positions      
  
  FETCH NEXT FROM Tech_Positions INTO @FKPositionID      
  WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0        
  BEGIN   
   INSERT INTO @tblPositionWiseRating  
   (  
    [Rank],  
    AvgRating,      
	TechnicianID,  
	PositionName  
   )  
  
SELECT tmp.[RANK],tmp.AvgRating,tmp.PKTechnicianID,tmp.PositionName  
FROM   (  
            SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY AVG(r.AverateRate) DESC,t.CreatedDate) AS RANK  
                 ,ISNULL(CAST(AVG(r.AverateRate) AS float),0) AS AvgRating, t.PKTechnicianID  
                 ,(select top 1 PositionName from Position p where p.PkPositionID = t.FKPositionID ) as PositionName  
			FROM (select tt.PKTechnicianID,tt.CreatedDate, tp.FKPositionID from  technician tt left join TechnicianPositions tp on tt.PKTechnicianId = tp.FKTechnicianID WHERE tp.StatusID = 1 and tp.FKPositionID = @FKPositionID) as t  
                  LEFT JOIN (  
                           SELECT *  
                           FROM   Ratings rr  
                           WHERE  rr.FKPositionID = @FKPositionID  
                       ) AS r  
                       ON  t.PKTechnicianID = r.FKTechnicianID  
           GROUP BY  
                  t.PKTechnicianID,t.FKPositionID,t.CreatedDate  
       ) AS tmp  
WHERE  PKtechnicianID = @TechnicianID  
  
   FETCH NEXT FROM Tech_Positions INTO @FKPositionID      
  END        
  
  CLOSE Tech_Positions      
  
  DEALLOCATE Tech_Positions    
  
SELECT * FROM @tblPositionWiseRating  
  
--------- Ends Here  
  
  
  
End  

GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[MyPerformanceSelectAll]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[MyPerformanceSelectAll] (
	@PageIndex INT,
	@RecordsPerPage INT,
	@SortBy nvarchar(50),
	@OrderBy nvarchar(50),
	@TechnicianID int,
	@SearchText nvarchar(50)
	)AS

SET NOCOUNT ON
	Declare @startRowIndex INT;
	Declare @endRowIndex INT;
	declare @Str nvarchar(max)
	set @endRowIndex = (@PageIndex * @RecordsPerPage);
	set @startRowIndex = (@endRowIndex - @RecordsPerPage) + 1;



set @Str =	'select * from (
			SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY '+@SortBy+' '+@OrderBy+') as Row, s.PKShowID, s.Title,
			datename(mm,s.[StartDate])+'' ''+ CAST(datepart(dd,s.[StartDate]) as varchar) +'', '' +CAST(datepart(yyyy,s.[StartDate])as varchar)	as StartDate,
			p.PositionName as PositionName,
			ISNULL(cast(r.AverateRate as decimal(10,2)),0) as AvgRating
			from Show s left join Ratings r on s.PKShowID = r.FKShowID left join Position p on r.FkPositionID = p.PkPositionID  where FKTechnicianID = @TechnicianID
			and s.[Title] like ''%'' + @SearchText+''%'') as tmpTable
			WHERE Row between @startRowIndex and @endRowIndex;'


			print(@STR)
	
	
	-- Table 1: Content record
	EXEC sp_executesql @STR, N'	@endRowIndex INT = NULL,
								@startRowIndex INT = NULL,
								@SortBy nvarchar(50)=null,
								@OrderBy nvarchar(50)=null,
								@SearchText nvarchar(50)=null,
								@TechnicianID int = null',
								@endRowIndex,
								@startRowIndex,
								@SortBy,
								@OrderBy,
								@SearchText,
								@TechnicianID;
	
	SELECT COUNT(*) from Show s left join Ratings r on s.PKShowID = r.FKShowID left join Position p on r.FkPositionID = p.PkPositionID  where FKTechnicianID = @TechnicianID and
     s.[Title] like '%' + @SearchText+'%'

GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[MyProspectsSelectAll]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
--SELECT * FROM Technician t
--SELECT * FROM Position p WHERE p.PKPositionID NOT IN (SELECT sp.FKPositionID
--                                                      FROM ShowPositions sp)
---exec [MyProspectsSelectAll]  1,30,'Title','Desc','',187,'01/07/2010', '12/07/2015'
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[MyProspectsSelectAll] (
    @PageIndex       INT,
    @RecordsPerPage  INT,
    @SortBy          NVARCHAR(50),
    @OrderBy         NVARCHAR(50),
    @SearchText      NVARCHAR(50),
    @PKTechnicianID  INT,
    @FromDate		 DATETIME = NULL,
    @ToDate			 DATETIME = NULL
)
AS
	SET NOCOUNT ON
	DECLARE @startRowIndex  INT;
	DECLARE @endRowIndex    INT;
	DECLARE @Str            NVARCHAR(MAX)
	SET @endRowIndex = (@PageIndex * @RecordsPerPage);
	SET @startRowIndex = (@endRowIndex - @RecordsPerPage) + 1;
	
	
	
	SET @Str = 'select * from (
	SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ' + @SortBy + ' ' + @OrderBy +') as Row,
	s.[PKShowID],
	s.[Title],
	s.[Email],
	s.[Description],
	s.[FkCustomerID],
	s.[City],
	s.[State],
	s.[Country],
	s.[NearestAirport],	
	s.[LogoPath],
	s.[bidStartDate],
	s.[bidEndDate],
	s.[DayRateValue],
	s.[isPublished],
	s.[PublishedDate],
	s.[isActive],
	s.[IsAllTech],
	s.[IsAllAvailableTech],
	s.[IsOnlyAccessTech],
	s.[IsOnlyTechWithPassport],
	s.[IsOnlyShareRoomTech],	
	s.[StartDate],
	s.[EndDate],
	(SELECT  STUFF((  
	select DISTINCT ''##''+ cast(TravelDate AS VARCHAR)
	FROM ShowTravelDate  where FKShowID = s.PKShowID
	FOR XML PATH('''')),1,2,'''')) as TravelDates,
	datepart(yyyy,[StartDate]) as Year,
	(SELECT  STUFF((  
	 select DISTINCT '', ''+ CAST( (select PositionName from Position where PKPositionID = FKPositionID) as varchar)
	 +''(''+cast(NoOfPosition as varchar)+'')'' FROM ShowPositions   where FKShowID = PKShowID	FOR XML PATH('''')),1,1,'''')) as Positions,
	
	((datediff (d, [StartDate], [EndDate]) + 1) - (SELECT COUNT(FKShowID) FROM ShowTravelDate std WHERE std.FKShowID = s.PKShowID)) AS ShowDays,
	(SELECT COUNT(FKShowID) FROM ShowTravelDate std WHERE std.FKShowID = s.PKShowID) AS TravelDays,
	
	
	(datediff (d, [StartDate], [EndDate]) + 1) AS TotalDays,
	
	case when(datename(mm,[StartDate]) = datename(mm,[EndDate]))
	then
	SUBSTRING(datename(mm,[StartDate]),0,4)+'' ''+ CAST(datepart(dd,[StartDate]) as varchar) 
	+''-'' +CAST(datepart(dd,[EndDate])as varchar)	
	else
	SUBSTRING(datename(mm,[StartDate]),0,4)+'' ''+ CAST(datepart(dd,[StartDate]) as varchar) +''-''
	+SUBSTRING(datename(mm,[EndDate]),0,4)+'' ''+ CAST(datepart(dd,[EndDate])as varchar)	
	End as ShowDates,
	(select Count(*) from ShowPositions where FKShowID = PKShowID) as PositionCount,
	(select Count(*) from Bid where FKShowID = PKShowID) as BidCount,
	CASE WHEN ((SELECT COUNT(b.PKBidID) FROM Bid b WHERE  b.FKShowID = s.PKShowID AND b.FKTechnicianID = t.PKTechnicianID AND b.isApproved = 1 ) > 0 ) THEN ''Confirm''
            WHEN ((SELECT COUNT(b.PKBidID) FROM Bid b WHERE  b.FKShowID = s.PKShowID AND b.FKTechnicianID = t.PKTechnicianID AND (b.isApproved = 0 OR b.isApproved IS null)) > 0) THEN ''Pending''
            ELSE ''Intrested'' END AS Status	
FROM
	[Show] s INNER JOIN Technician t ON s.isPublished = t.isApproved 
	where
	t.PKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID
	And s.[StartDate] between @FromDate and @ToDate AND 
	((s.PKShowID IN (SELECT FKShowID FROM ShowPositions sp WHERE sp.FKPositionID IN 
	(SELECT tp.FKPositionID FROM TechnicianPositions tp WHERE tp.FKTechnicianID  = @PKTechnicianID and tp.StatusID = 1) ))
	AND
	((s.IsOnlyTechWithPassport = t.hasPassport or isnull(s.IsOnlyTechWithPassport,0) = 0 )And
	 (s.IsOnlyShareRoomTech = t.ishotelshare or isnull(s.IsOnlyShareRoomTech,0) = 0)And
	 (s.IsOnlyAccessTech = t.isAccess or isnull(s.IsOnlyAccessTech,0) = 0) And
	 (s.IsAllAvailableTech = 0 or ((SELECT count(*) FROM Show cs WHERE cs.PKShowID <> s.PKShowID and cs.PKShowID IN (SELECT FKShowID FROM bid WHERE FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID AND isApproved = 1)
		AND ((s.StartDate BETWEEN cs.StartDate AND cs.EndDate) OR (s.EndDate BETWEEN cs.StartDate AND cs.EndDate))) = 0))
	)
	and ((s.bidEndDate > DATEADD(d,-1,GETDATE()) AND s.bidStartDate < GETDATE()) or(( SELECT COUNT(b.PKBidID) FROM Bid b WHERE  b.FKShowID = s.PKShowID AND b.FKTechnicianID = t.PKTechnicianID) > 0))
	OR(( SELECT COUNT(b.PKBidID) FROM Bid b WHERE  b.FKShowID = s.PKShowID AND b.FKTechnicianID = t.PKTechnicianID AND B.IsApproved = 1) > 0))
	
	) as tmpTable
	WHERE Row between 
	@startRowIndex and @endRowIndex;'
	--AND
	--((s.IsOnlyTechWithPassport = t.hasPassport AND s.IsOnlyTechWithPassport <> 0)OR
	-- (s.IsOnlyShareRoomTech = t.ishotelshare AND s.IsOnlyShareRoomTech <> 0)OR
	-- (s.IsOnlyAccessTech = t.isAccess AND s.IsOnlyAccessTech <> 0) OR
	-- (s.IsAllAvailableTech = 0 or ((SELECT count(*) FROM Show cs WHERE cs.PKShowID IN (SELECT FKShowID FROM bid WHERE FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID AND isApproved = 1)
 --   AND ((cs.StartDate BETWEEN s.StartDate AND s.EndDate) OR (cs.EndDate BETWEEN s.StartDate AND s.EndDate))) = 0))
	--)
	
	
	--CASE when((datediff (d, [StartDate], [EndDate]) - 1) > 0)
	--THEN
	--	(datediff (d, [StartDate], [EndDate]) - 1)
	--ELSE
	--	(datediff (d, [StartDate], [EndDate]) + 1)
	--END AS ShowDays,
	--CASE when((datediff (d, [StartDate], [EndDate]) - 1) > 0)
	--THEN
	--2
	--ELSE
	--	0
	--END AS TravelDays,
	
	PRINT(@STR)
	
	
	-- Table 1: Content record
	EXEC sp_executesql @STR,
	     N'	@endRowIndex INT = NULL,
								@startRowIndex INT = NULL,
								@SortBy nvarchar(50)=null,
								@OrderBy nvarchar(50)=null,
								@SearchText nvarchar(50)=null,
								@PKTechnicianID int = null,
								@FromDate DATETIME = NULL,
							    @ToDate	DATETIME = NULL',
								@endRowIndex,
								@startRowIndex,
								@SortBy,
								@OrderBy,
								@SearchText,
								@PKTechnicianID,
								@FromDate,
								@ToDate;
	
	SELECT COUNT(*)
	FROM   [dbo].[Show] s
	       INNER JOIN Technician t
	            ON  s.isPublished = t.isApproved
	WHERE  t.PKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID
	           AND (
	               s.PKShowID IN (SELECT FKShowID
	                              FROM   ShowPositions sp
	                              WHERE  sp.FKPositionID IN (SELECT tp.FKPositionID
	                                                         FROM   
	                                                                TechnicianPositions 
	                                                                tp
	                                                         WHERE  tp.FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID AND tp.StatusID = 1))
	           )
	           AND
				((s.IsOnlyTechWithPassport = t.hasPassport or isnull(s.IsOnlyTechWithPassport,0) = 0 )And
				(s.IsOnlyShareRoomTech = t.ishotelshare or isnull(s.IsOnlyShareRoomTech,0) = 0)And
				(s.IsOnlyAccessTech = t.isAccess or isnull(s.IsOnlyAccessTech,0) = 0) And
				(s.IsAllAvailableTech = 0 or ((SELECT count(*) FROM Show cs WHERE cs.PKShowID <> s.PKShowID and cs.PKShowID IN (SELECT FKShowID FROM bid WHERE FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID AND isApproved = 1)
				AND ((s.StartDate BETWEEN cs.StartDate AND cs.EndDate) OR (s.EndDate BETWEEN cs.StartDate AND cs.EndDate))) = 0))
				)
	    --   AND (
	    --           (
	    --               s.IsOnlyTechWithPassport = t.hasPassport
	    --               AND s.IsOnlyTechWithPassport <> 0
	    --           )
	    --           OR (
	    --                  s.IsOnlyShareRoomTech = t.ishotelshare
	    --                  AND s.IsOnlyShareRoomTech <> 0
	    --              )
	    --           OR (
	    --                  s.IsOnlyAccessTech = t.isAccess
	    --                  AND s.IsOnlyAccessTech <> 0
	    --              )
	    --           OR --(s.IsAllAvailableTech = 1)
	    --           (s.IsAllAvailableTech = 0 or ((SELECT count(*) FROM Show cs WHERE cs.PKShowID IN (SELECT FKShowID FROM bid WHERE FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID AND isApproved = 1)
					--AND ((cs.StartDate BETWEEN s.StartDate AND s.EndDate) OR (cs.EndDate BETWEEN s.StartDate AND s.EndDate))) = 0))
	    --   )
	       AND  s.[StartDate] between @FromDate and @ToDate
	       and ((s.bidEndDate > DATEADD(d,-1,GETDATE()) AND s.bidStartDate < GETDATE()) or(( SELECT COUNT(b.PKBidID) FROM Bid b WHERE  b.FKShowID = s.PKShowID AND b.FKTechnicianID = t.PKTechnicianID) > 0) )
	       
	       --AND [Title] LIKE '%' + @SearchText + '%'
	DECLARE @Year TABLE (YEAR NVARCHAR(4))
	INSERT INTO @Year
	SELECT distinct datename(yyyy,[StartDate]) as Year
	FROM   [dbo].[Show] s
	       INNER JOIN Technician t
	            ON  s.isPublished = t.isApproved
	WHERE  t.PKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID
	       AND (
	               s.PKShowID IN (SELECT FKShowID
	                              FROM   ShowPositions sp
	                              WHERE  sp.FKPositionID IN (SELECT tp.FKPositionID
	                                                         FROM   
	                                                                TechnicianPositions 
	                                                                tp
	                                                         WHERE  tp.FKTechnicianID = 
	                                                                @PKTechnicianID AND tp.StatusID = 1))
	           )
			AND
				((s.IsOnlyTechWithPassport = t.hasPassport or isnull(s.IsOnlyTechWithPassport,0) = 0 )And
				(s.IsOnlyShareRoomTech = t.ishotelshare or isnull(s.IsOnlyShareRoomTech,0) = 0)And
				(s.IsOnlyAccessTech = t.isAccess or isnull(s.IsOnlyAccessTech,0) = 0) And
				(s.IsAllAvailableTech = 0 or ((SELECT count(*) FROM Show cs WHERE cs.PKShowID <> s.PKShowID and cs.PKShowID IN (SELECT FKShowID FROM bid WHERE FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID AND isApproved = 1)
				AND ((s.StartDate BETWEEN cs.StartDate AND cs.EndDate) OR (s.EndDate BETWEEN cs.StartDate AND cs.EndDate))) = 0))
			   )
	IF ((SELECT COUNT(YEAR) FROM @Year WHERE [YEAR] = datename(yyyy,GETDATE())) = 0 )
	BEGIN
		INSERT INTO @Year
		SELECT distinct datename(yyyy,GETDATE())
	END
	       
	SELECT * FROM @Year
	       --AND  s.[StartDate] between @FromDate and @ToDate
	       
	       
	       
	       
	       
	       
	       


GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[MyProspectsSelectAllShows]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

--SELECT * FROM Position p WHERE p.PKPositionID NOT IN (SELECT sp.FKPositionID
--                                                      FROM ShowPositions sp)
---		exec [MyProspectsSelectAllShows]  1,30,'Title','Desc','',122
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[MyProspectsSelectAllShows] (
    @PageIndex       INT,
    @RecordsPerPage  INT,
    @SortBy          NVARCHAR(50),
    @OrderBy         NVARCHAR(50),
    @SearchText      NVARCHAR(50),
    @PKTechnicianID  INT
)
AS
	SET NOCOUNT ON
	DECLARE @startRowIndex  INT;
	DECLARE @endRowIndex    INT;
	DECLARE @Str            NVARCHAR(MAX)
	SET @endRowIndex = (@PageIndex * @RecordsPerPage);
	SET @startRowIndex = (@endRowIndex - @RecordsPerPage) + 1;
	
	
	
	SET @Str = 'select * from (
	SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ' + @SortBy + ' ' + @OrderBy +') as Row,
	s.[PKShowID],
	s.[Title],
	s.[Email],
	s.[Description],
	s.[FkCustomerID],
	s.[City],
	s.[State],
	s.[Country],
	s.[NearestAirport],	
	s.[LogoPath],
	s.[bidStartDate],
	s.[bidEndDate],
	s.[DayRateValue],
	s.[isPublished],
	s.[PublishedDate],
	s.[isActive],
	s.[IsAllTech],
	s.[IsAllAvailableTech],
	s.[IsOnlyAccessTech],
	s.[IsOnlyTechWithPassport],
	s.[IsOnlyShareRoomTech],	
	s.[StartDate],
	s.[EndDate],
	(SELECT  STUFF((  
	select DISTINCT ''##''+ cast(TravelDate AS VARCHAR)
	FROM ShowTravelDate  where FKShowID = s.PKShowID
	FOR XML PATH('''')),1,2,'''')) as TravelDates,
	datepart(yyyy,[StartDate]) as Year,
	(SELECT  STUFF((  
	 select DISTINCT '', ''+ CAST( (select PositionName from Position where PKPositionID = FKPositionID) as varchar)
	 +''(''+cast(NoOfPosition as varchar)+'')'' FROM ShowPositions   where FKShowID = PKShowID	FOR XML PATH('''')),1,1,'''')) as Positions,
	
	((datediff (d, [StartDate], [EndDate]) + 1) - (SELECT COUNT(FKShowID) FROM ShowTravelDate std WHERE std.FKShowID = s.PKShowID)) AS ShowDays,
	(SELECT COUNT(FKShowID) FROM ShowTravelDate std WHERE std.FKShowID = s.PKShowID) AS TravelDays,
	
	
	(datediff (d, [StartDate], [EndDate]) + 1) AS TotalDays,
	
	case when(datename(mm,[StartDate]) = datename(mm,[EndDate]))
	then
	SUBSTRING(datename(mm,[StartDate]),0,4)+'' ''+ CAST(datepart(dd,[StartDate]) as varchar) 
	+''-'' +CAST(datepart(dd,[EndDate])as varchar)	
	else
	SUBSTRING(datename(mm,[StartDate]),0,4)+'' ''+ CAST(datepart(dd,[StartDate]) as varchar) +''-''
	+SUBSTRING(datename(mm,[EndDate]),0,4)+'' ''+ CAST(datepart(dd,[EndDate])as varchar)	
	End as ShowDates,
	(select Count(*) from ShowPositions where FKShowID = PKShowID) as PositionCount,
	(select Count(*) from Bid where FKShowID = PKShowID) as BidCount,
	CASE WHEN ((SELECT COUNT(b.PKBidID) FROM Bid b WHERE  b.FKShowID = s.PKShowID AND b.FKTechnicianID = t.PKTechnicianID AND b.isApproved = 1 ) > 0 ) THEN ''Confirm''
            WHEN ((SELECT COUNT(b.PKBidID) FROM Bid b WHERE  b.FKShowID = s.PKShowID AND b.FKTechnicianID = t.PKTechnicianID AND (b.isApproved = 0 OR b.isApproved IS null)) > 0) THEN ''Pending''
            ELSE ''Intrested'' END AS Status	
FROM
	[Show] s INNER JOIN Technician t ON s.isPublished = t.isApproved 
	where
	t.PKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID And
	-- s.[StartDate] between @FromDate and @ToDate AND 
	((s.PKShowID IN (SELECT FKShowID FROM ShowPositions sp WHERE sp.FKPositionID IN 
	(SELECT tp.FKPositionID FROM TechnicianPositions tp WHERE tp.FKTechnicianID  = @PKTechnicianID and tp.StatusID = 1) ))
	AND
	((s.IsOnlyTechWithPassport = t.hasPassport or isnull(s.IsOnlyTechWithPassport,0) = 0 )And
	 (s.IsOnlyShareRoomTech = t.ishotelshare or isnull(s.IsOnlyShareRoomTech,0) = 0)And
	 (s.IsOnlyAccessTech = t.isAccess or isnull(s.IsOnlyAccessTech,0) = 0) And
	 (s.IsAllAvailableTech = 0 or ((SELECT count(*) FROM Show cs WHERE cs.PKShowID <> s.PKShowID and cs.PKShowID IN (SELECT FKShowID FROM bid WHERE FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID AND isApproved = 1)
		AND ((s.StartDate BETWEEN cs.StartDate AND cs.EndDate) OR (s.EndDate BETWEEN cs.StartDate AND cs.EndDate))) = 0))
	)
	and ((s.bidEndDate > DATEADD(d,-1,GETDATE()) AND s.bidStartDate < GETDATE()) or(( SELECT COUNT(b.PKBidID) FROM Bid b WHERE  b.FKShowID = s.PKShowID AND b.FKTechnicianID = t.PKTechnicianID) > 0))
	OR(( SELECT COUNT(b.PKBidID) FROM Bid b WHERE  b.FKShowID = s.PKShowID AND b.FKTechnicianID = t.PKTechnicianID AND B.IsApproved = 1) > 0))
	
	) as tmpTable
	WHERE Row between 
	@startRowIndex and @endRowIndex;'
	--AND
	--((s.IsOnlyTechWithPassport = t.hasPassport AND s.IsOnlyTechWithPassport <> 0)OR
	-- (s.IsOnlyShareRoomTech = t.ishotelshare AND s.IsOnlyShareRoomTech <> 0)OR
	-- (s.IsOnlyAccessTech = t.isAccess AND s.IsOnlyAccessTech <> 0) OR
	-- (s.IsAllAvailableTech = 0 or ((SELECT count(*) FROM Show cs WHERE cs.PKShowID IN (SELECT FKShowID FROM bid WHERE FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID AND isApproved = 1)
 --   AND ((cs.StartDate BETWEEN s.StartDate AND s.EndDate) OR (cs.EndDate BETWEEN s.StartDate AND s.EndDate))) = 0))
	--)
	
	
	--CASE when((datediff (d, [StartDate], [EndDate]) - 1) > 0)
	--THEN
	--	(datediff (d, [StartDate], [EndDate]) - 1)
	--ELSE
	--	(datediff (d, [StartDate], [EndDate]) + 1)
	--END AS ShowDays,
	--CASE when((datediff (d, [StartDate], [EndDate]) - 1) > 0)
	--THEN
	--2
	--ELSE
	--	0
	--END AS TravelDays,
	
	PRINT(@STR)
	
	
	-- Table 1: Content record
	EXEC sp_executesql @STR,
	     N'	@endRowIndex INT = NULL,
								@startRowIndex INT = NULL,
								@SortBy nvarchar(50)=null,
								@OrderBy nvarchar(50)=null,
								@SearchText nvarchar(50)=null,
								@PKTechnicianID int = null',
								@endRowIndex,
								@startRowIndex,
								@SortBy,
								@OrderBy,
								@SearchText,
								@PKTechnicianID;
	
	SELECT COUNT(*)
	FROM   [dbo].[Show] s
	       INNER JOIN Technician t
	            ON  s.isPublished = t.isApproved
	WHERE  t.PKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID
	           AND (
	               s.PKShowID IN (SELECT FKShowID
	                              FROM   ShowPositions sp
	                              WHERE  sp.FKPositionID IN (SELECT tp.FKPositionID
	                                                         FROM   
	                                                                TechnicianPositions 
	                                                                tp
	                                                         WHERE  tp.FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID AND tp.StatusID = 1))
	           )
	           AND
				((s.IsOnlyTechWithPassport = t.hasPassport or isnull(s.IsOnlyTechWithPassport,0) = 0 )And
				(s.IsOnlyShareRoomTech = t.ishotelshare or isnull(s.IsOnlyShareRoomTech,0) = 0)And
				(s.IsOnlyAccessTech = t.isAccess or isnull(s.IsOnlyAccessTech,0) = 0) And
				(s.IsAllAvailableTech = 0 or ((SELECT count(*) FROM Show cs WHERE cs.PKShowID <> s.PKShowID and cs.PKShowID IN (SELECT FKShowID FROM bid WHERE FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID AND isApproved = 1)
				AND ((s.StartDate BETWEEN cs.StartDate AND cs.EndDate) OR (s.EndDate BETWEEN cs.StartDate AND cs.EndDate))) = 0))
				)
	    --   AND (
	    --           (
	    --               s.IsOnlyTechWithPassport = t.hasPassport
	    --               AND s.IsOnlyTechWithPassport <> 0
	    --           )
	    --           OR (
	    --                  s.IsOnlyShareRoomTech = t.ishotelshare
	    --                  AND s.IsOnlyShareRoomTech <> 0
	    --              )
	    --           OR (
	    --                  s.IsOnlyAccessTech = t.isAccess
	    --                  AND s.IsOnlyAccessTech <> 0
	    --              )
	    --           OR --(s.IsAllAvailableTech = 1)
	    --           (s.IsAllAvailableTech = 0 or ((SELECT count(*) FROM Show cs WHERE cs.PKShowID IN (SELECT FKShowID FROM bid WHERE FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID AND isApproved = 1)
					--AND ((cs.StartDate BETWEEN s.StartDate AND s.EndDate) OR (cs.EndDate BETWEEN s.StartDate AND s.EndDate))) = 0))
	    --   )
	      -- AND  s.[StartDate] between @FromDate and @ToDate
	       and ((s.bidEndDate > DATEADD(d,-1,GETDATE()) AND s.bidStartDate < GETDATE()) or(( SELECT COUNT(b.PKBidID) FROM Bid b WHERE  b.FKShowID = s.PKShowID AND b.FKTechnicianID = t.PKTechnicianID) > 0) )
	       
	       --AND [Title] LIKE '%' + @SearchText + '%'
	--DECLARE @Year TABLE (YEAR NVARCHAR(4))
	--INSERT INTO @Year
	--SELECT distinct datename(yyyy,[StartDate]) as Year
	--FROM   [dbo].[Show] s
	--       INNER JOIN Technician t
	--            ON  s.isPublished = t.isApproved
	--WHERE  t.PKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID
	--       AND (
	--               s.PKShowID IN (SELECT FKShowID
	--                              FROM   ShowPositions sp
	--                              WHERE  sp.FKPositionID IN (SELECT tp.FKPositionID
	--                                                         FROM   
	--                                                                TechnicianPositions 
	--                                                                tp
	--                                                         WHERE  tp.FKTechnicianID = 
	--                                                                @PKTechnicianID AND tp.StatusID = 1))
	--           )
	--		AND
	--			((s.IsOnlyTechWithPassport = t.hasPassport or isnull(s.IsOnlyTechWithPassport,0) = 0 )And
	--			(s.IsOnlyShareRoomTech = t.ishotelshare or isnull(s.IsOnlyShareRoomTech,0) = 0)And
	--			(s.IsOnlyAccessTech = t.isAccess or isnull(s.IsOnlyAccessTech,0) = 0) And
	--			(s.IsAllAvailableTech = 0 or ((SELECT count(*) FROM Show cs WHERE cs.PKShowID <> s.PKShowID and cs.PKShowID IN (SELECT FKShowID FROM bid WHERE FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID AND isApproved = 1)
	--			AND ((s.StartDate BETWEEN cs.StartDate AND cs.EndDate) OR (s.EndDate BETWEEN cs.StartDate AND cs.EndDate))) = 0))
	--		   )
	--IF ((SELECT COUNT(YEAR) FROM @Year WHERE [YEAR] = datename(yyyy,GETDATE())) = 0 )
	--BEGIN
	--	INSERT INTO @Year
	--	SELECT distinct datename(yyyy,GETDATE())
	--END
	--       
	--SELECT * FROM @Year
	       --AND  s.[StartDate] between @FromDate and @ToDate
	       
	       
	       
	       
	       
	       
	       


GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[New_SelectShowPositions]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO


CREATE procedure [dbo].[New_SelectShowPositions]
(
	@ShowID INT 
)
AS 
BEGIN 
SELECT DISTINCT pp.fkPostionId, ( SELECT  CAST(min(p.TravelDate) AS VARCHAR(12))
                                             FROM   PositionWiseShowTravelDates 
                                                    p
                                             WHERE  p.FKPostionID = 
                                                    pp.FKPostionID  and p.FKShowID = @ShowID
                                                    
       )  AS fromDate,
	   
	   ( SELECT  CAST(max(p.TravelDate) AS VARCHAR(12))
                                             FROM   PositionWiseShowTravelDates 
                                                    p
                                             WHERE  p.FKPostionID = 
                                                    pp.FKPostionID and p.FKShowID = @ShowID
                                                    
       )  AS toDate
	   
	   
FROM PositionWiseShowTravelDates pp WHERE pp.FKShowID = @ShowID
end
	 	
GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[NewMessageInsert]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO






CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[NewMessageInsert] (
    @MessageDate     DATETIME,
    @Description     TEXT,
    @SenderID        INT,
    @LevelID         INT,
    @IsReply         BIT,
    @ParentID        INT,
    @RecieversID     VARCHAR(MAX)
)
AS
	SET NOCOUNT ON
	
	
	
	DECLARE @NewMessageID INT 
	
	INSERT INTO [Message]
	  (
	    [MessageDate],
	    [Description],
	    [SenderID],
	    [LevelID],
	    [IsReply],
	    [ParentID]
	  )
	VALUES
	  (
	    @MessageDate,
	    @Description,
	    @SenderID,
	    @LevelID,
	    @IsReply,
	    @ParentID
	  )
	
	SET @NewMessageID = (
	        SELECT SCOPE_IDENTITY()
	    )
	
	IF (@RecieversID = '0')
	BEGIN
	    INSERT INTO [SentMessage]
	      (
	        [FKMessageID],
	        [RecieverID],
	        [IsRead],
	        [IsDeleted]
	      )
	    SELECT @NewMessageID,
	           t.PKTechnicianID,
	           0,
	           0
	    FROM Technician t WHERE t.isApproved = 1 
	END
	ELSE
	BEGIN
	    INSERT INTO [SentMessage]
	      (
	        [FKMessageID],
	        [RecieverID],
	        [IsRead],
	        [IsDeleted]
	      )
	    SELECT @NewMessageID,
	           CAST(val AS INT),
	           0,
	           0
	    FROM   dbo.fnParseArray(@RecieversID, ',')
	END
	
	
	
	
	
	
	SELECT @NewMessageID AS PKMessageID

GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[NotifyAdminBeforeWeek]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
CREATE procedure [dbo].[NotifyAdminBeforeWeek]
(
@BidID int ,
@ToNotify bit,
@EmailAddress nvarchar(255)

)
as
begin
update bid set  ToNotify = @ToNotify , Email = @EmailAddress
 ,IsNotifiedAdmin = 0
 where PKBidID = @BidID
end

/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[PeopleStats]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO


---		Exec PeopleStats 2


CREATE Procedure [dbo].[PeopleStats]
(
	@PositionID int 
)
as

begin
-- Positions
select PositionName, PKPositionID from Position
if(@PositionID = 0)
begin
set @PositionID = (select top 1 PKPositionID from Position)
end

-- Top 10 Performers
select top 10 row_number() over (order by AVG(r.AverateRate) desc) as Rank,t.PkTechnicianID, t.Firstname from technician t left join Ratings r on t.PKTechnicianID = r.FKTechnicianID        
group by t.PKTechnicianID,t.dtApprovaldate,t.Firstname

-- Top 10 Performers by Position
SELECT top 10 ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY AVG(r.AverateRate) DESC) AS Rank  
                 ,ISNULL(CAST(AVG(r.AverateRate) AS float),0) AS AvgRating, t.PKTechnicianID , t.FirstName 
                 ,(select top 1 PositionName from Position p where p.PkPositionID = t.FKPositionID ) as PositionName  
				  FROM (select tt.PKTechnicianID, tt.dtApprovaldate,tt.Firstname , tp.FKPositionID from  technician tt left join TechnicianPositions tp on tt.PKTechnicianId = tp.FKTechnicianID WHERE  tp.StatusID = 1 and tp.FKPositionID = @PositionID) as t  
                  LEFT JOIN (  
                           SELECT *  
                           FROM [Ratings] rr  
                           WHERE  rr.FKPositionID = @PositionID
                       ) AS r  
                       ON  t.PKTechnicianID = r.FKTechnicianID  
GROUP BY t.PKTechnicianID,t.dtApprovaldate,t.Firstname,t.FKPositionID 

-- People stats
select 1,
 (Select ISNULL(AVG(cr.AverageRate),0) from Show s    
  inner join CustomerShowRating cr on cr.FKShowID = s.PKShowID 
  where StartDate <= GETDATE()) as NetAvg, 
 (select COUNT(PKShowID) from Show where StartDate <= GETDATE()) As ShowToDate,
 (select COUNT(PKShowID) from Show where StartDate > GETDATE()) As ShowsRemaining,
 (select cast(avg(Rating) as decimal(3,2)) from Technician where isApproved = 1) as AvgRating ,
 (select count(PKTechnicianID) from Technician where isApproved = 1) as TotalTechs, 
 (select count(PKTechnicianID) from Technician ) as TechsInSystem,
 (select CAST(AVG(BidAmount) as decimal(10,2)) from Bid) as AvgCost


end


GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[PeopleStatsByPosition]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO



--	exec [PeopleStatsByPosition] 2
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[PeopleStatsByPosition]
(@PositionID INT)
AS
BEGIN
	-- Top 10 Performers by Position
	SELECT TOP 10 ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY AVG(r.AverateRate) DESC) AS RANK,
	       ISNULL(CAST(AVG(r.AverateRate) AS FLOAT), 0) AS AvgRating,
	       t.PKTechnicianID,
	       t.FirstName,
	       (
	           SELECT TOP 1        PositionName
	           FROM   Position     p
	           WHERE  p.PkPositionID = t.FKPositionID
	       ) AS PositionName
				FROM   (SELECT tt.PKTechnicianID,tt.dtApprovaldate,tt.Firstname,tp.FKPositionID FROM technician tt LEFT JOIN TechnicianPositions tp ON  tt.PKTechnicianId = tp.FKTechnicianID WHERE  tp.StatusID = 1 AND tp.FKPositionID = @PositionID) AS t
	       LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM Ratings rr WHERE  rr.FKPositionID = @PositionID) AS r ON  t.PKTechnicianID = r.FKTechnicianID
	GROUP BY
	       t.PKTechnicianID,
	       t.dtApprovaldate,
	       t.Firstname,
	       t.FKPositionID
END
GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[PMDashBoard]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
  
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[PMDashBoard]   
(  
 @UserID int   
)  
  
AS  
  
 SET NOCOUNT ON  
  
 DECLARE @CurrentDate DATETIME  
  
 SET @CurrentDate = GETDATE()    
  
 DECLARE @PreviousSDate DATETIME,@PreviousEDate DATETIME  
  
 SET @PreviousSDate = DATEADD(dd, -(DATEPART(dw, @CurrentDate-1)), @CurrentDate +1)  
 SET @PreviousEDate = DATEADD(dd, 7-(DATEPART(dw, @CurrentDate-1)), @CurrentDate )  
  
 DECLARE @NextSDate DATETIME,@NextEDate DATETIME  
  
 SET @NextSDate =  DATEADD(dd, 7-(DATEPART(dw, @CurrentDate-1)), @CurrentDate +1)  
 SET @NextEDate = DATEADD(dd, 14-(DATEPART(dw, @CurrentDate-1)), @CurrentDate )  
   
  
 SELECT TOP 4 PKShowID,  
  
        Title,  
  
        Title + ' "'+ SUBSTRING(CAST((DATEPART(yy, StartDate)) AS VARCHAR), 3, 2) AS ShowTitleWithYear  
  
 FROM   [Show] inner join ShowManagers on Show.PKShowID=ShowManagers.FKShowID and ShowManagers.FKAccountID=@UserID  
  
 WHERE  StartDate BETWEEN cast(cast(@PreviousSDate as varchar(12)) as datetime) AND @PreviousEDate  
  
 SELECT TOP 4 PKShowID,  
  
        Title,  
  
        Title +' "'+ SUBSTRING(CAST((DATEPART(yy, StartDate)) AS VARCHAR), 3, 2) AS ShowTitleWithYear  
  
 FROM   [Show] inner join ShowManagers on Show.PKShowID=ShowManagers.FKShowID and ShowManagers.FKAccountID=@UserID  
  
 WHERE  StartDate BETWEEN cast(cast(@NextSDate as varchar(12)) as datetime) AND @NextEDate  
  
 SELECT cast(avg(t.Rating) as float) as AvgRating FROM [dbo].[Technician] t      
 inner join Bid b  on b.FKTechnicianID = t.PKTechnicianID      
 inner join Show s on s.PKShowID = b.FKShowID      
 inner join ShowManagers sm on sm.FKShowID = s.PKShowID      
 where sm.FKAccountID = @UserID            
 and t.isApproved = 1    
 and b.isApproved = 1  
   
   
  
   
  
 -- For Basic Information  
  
   
  
GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[PositionCheckDelete]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[PositionCheckDelete]
(
	@PKPositionID int
)
AS
BEGIN
	select 1,
		(select Count(FKShowPositionID) FROM Bid WHERE FKShowPositionID = @PKPositionID) as Bids,
		(select Count(FKPositionID) FROM ShowPositions WHERE FKPositionID  = @PKPositionID) as Shows,
		(select Count(FKPositionID) FROM TechnicianPositions WHERE FKPositionID = @PKPositionID) as Technicians
END
GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[PositionDelete]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[PositionDelete] (

	@PKPositionID int
)
AS
begin
SET NOCOUNT ON

--if exists (select null from TechnicianPositions where FKPositionID  = @PKPositionID)

--begin

--select -2

--END

--ELSE IF EXISTS(select null from ShowPositions where FKPositionID  = @PKPositionID)

--BEGIN

--select -1

--END

--else

--begin



--DELETE FROM

--	[Position]

--WHERE

--	[PKPositionID] = @PKPositionID

--select @PKPositionID

--end

--end

DELETE FROM Ratings WHERE FKPositionID = @PKPositionID

DELETE FROM Bid WHERE FKShowPositionID = @PKPositionID



UPDATE Technician set Rating=(select cast(avg(AverateRate)as float) from Ratings where FKTechnicianID=PKTechnicianID) 

where PKTechnicianID IN (SELECT tp.FKTechnicianID FROM TechnicianPositions tp WHERE tp.FKPositionID = @PKPositionID) 


DELETE from PositionWiseShowTravelDates where FKPostionID = @PKPositionID

DELETE FROM ShowPositions WHERE FKPositionID  = @PKPositionID

DELETE FROM TechnicianPositions WHERE FKPositionID = @PKPositionID

DELETE FROM	[Position] WHERE [PKPositionID] = @PKPositionID

select @PKPositionID

end



GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[PositionInsert]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[PositionInsert] (
    @PositionName         VARCHAR(150),
    @PositionDescription  VARCHAR(500)
)
AS
BEGIN
	SET NOCOUNT ON
	IF EXISTS (
	       SELECT NULL
	       FROM   Position
	       WHERE  PositionName = @PositionName
	   )
	BEGIN
	    SELECT -2
	END
	ELSE
	BEGIN
	    INSERT INTO [Position]
	      (
	        [PositionName],
	        [PositionDescription]
	      )
	    VALUES
	      (
	        @PositionName,
	        @PositionDescription
	      )
	    
	    SELECT SCOPE_IDENTITY() AS PKPositionID
	END
END


GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[PositionSearch]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[PositionSearch] (
	@PositionName varchar(150)	
)
AS
begin
SET NOCOUNT ON
select * from Position where PositionName like '%'+ @PositionName +'%'
end

/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[PositionSelectAll]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
-- exec [PositionSelectAll] 1,10,'PositionName','Asc',''
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[PositionSelectAll]
(
    @PageIndex       INT,
    @RecordsPerPage  INT,
    @SortBy          NVARCHAR(50),
    @OrderBy         NVARCHAR(50),
    @SearchText      NVARCHAR(50)
)
AS
	SET NOCOUNT ON
	DECLARE @startRowIndex  INT;    
	DECLARE @endRowIndex    INT;    
	DECLARE @Str            NVARCHAR(MAX)    
	SET @endRowIndex = (@PageIndex * @RecordsPerPage);    
	SET @startRowIndex = (@endRowIndex - @RecordsPerPage) + 1;  
	SET @Str = 'select * from (    
			   SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ' + @SortBy + ' ' + @OrderBy +') as Row, [PKPositionID],
	           [PositionName],
	           [PositionDescription]
			   FROM [Position] where    
			   [PositionName] like ''%'' + @SearchText+''%'') as tmpTable  WHERE Row between @startRowIndex and @endRowIndex;' 
			   
			   
print(@STR)    
     
     
 -- Table 1: Content record    
 EXEC sp_executesql @STR, N' @endRowIndex INT = NULL,    
        @startRowIndex INT = NULL,    
        @SortBy nvarchar(50)=null,    
        @OrderBy nvarchar(50)=null,    
        @SearchText nvarchar(50)=null',    
        @endRowIndex,    
        @startRowIndex,    
        @SortBy,    
        @OrderBy,    
        @SearchText;    
     
 SELECT COUNT(*) FROM [dbo].[Position] where    
      PositionName like '%' + @SearchText+'%'


GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[PositionSelectAllForBindings]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[PositionSelectAllForBindings] 

AS



begin



SELECT PKPositionID,PositionName,PositionDescription FROM [Position] ORDER BY PositionName



end

/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[PositionUpdate]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
Create PROCEDURE [dbo].[PositionUpdate] (  
 @PKPositionID int,  
 @PositionName varchar(150),  
 @PositionDescription varchar(500)  
)  
AS  
  
begin  
  
SET NOCOUNT ON  
if exists (select null from Position where PositionName = @PositionName and [PKPositionID] <> @PKPositionID)  
begin  
select -2  
end  
else  
begin  
  
UPDATE  
 [Position]  
SET  
 [PositionName] = @PositionName,  
 [PositionDescription] = @PositionDescription  
WHERE  
  [PKPositionID] = @PKPositionID  
select @PKPositionID  
end  
end


GO

/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[RatingsInsert]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[RatingsInsert] (  
 @FKTechnicianID int,  
 @FKShowID int,  
 --@FeedbackDate datetime,  
 @Email varchar(50),  
 @RatingBy int,  
 @IsHireAgain bit,  
 @Description varchar(500),  
 @Prompt float(53),  
 @Professional float(53),  
 @Experience float(53),  
 @Attitude float(53),  
 @OverAndAbove float(53)  
 --@AverateRate float(53)  
)  
AS  
  --SELECT s.StartDate , DATEADD(d,-1,GETDATE()) FROM Show s WHERE s.PKShowID = 8
SET NOCOUNT ON  
BEGIN
if Exists(Select null from Show s where s.PKShowID = @FKShowID and s.StartDate <  DATEADD(d,-1,GETDATE()))
BEGIN
select -2
END
ELSE
BEGIN
INSERT INTO [Ratings] (  
 [FKTechnicianID],  
 [FKShowID],  
 [FeedbackDate],  
 [Email],  
 [RatingBy],  
 [IsHireAgain],  
 [Description],  
 [Prompt],  
 [Professional],  
 [Experience],  
 [Attitude],  
 [OverAndAbove],  
 [AverateRate],
 [FKPositionID]  
) VALUES (  
 @FKTechnicianID,  
 @FKShowID,  
 GETDATE(),  
 @Email,  
 @RatingBy,  
 @IsHireAgain,  
 @Description,  
 @Prompt,  
 @Professional,  
 @Experience,  
 @Attitude,  
 @OverAndAbove,  
 (@Prompt+@Professional+@Experience+@Attitude+@OverAndAbove)/5,
 (select top 1 b.FKShowPositionID from Bid b where b.FKShowID = @FKShowID and b.FKTechnicianID = @FKTechnicianID and b.isApproved = 1)    
)  
exec TechnicianUpdateRating @FKTechnicianID   
SELECT SCOPE_IDENTITY() AS PKRatingID  
END
END  





GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[RatingsSelect]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[RatingsSelect] (
	@PKRatingID int
)
AS

SET NOCOUNT ON

SELECT
	[PKRatingID],
	[FKTechnicianID],
	[FKShowID],
	[FeedbackDate],
	[Email],
	[RatingBy],
	[IsHireAgain],
	[Description],
	[Prompt],
	[Professional],
	[Experience],
	[Attitude],
	[OverAndAbove],
	[AverateRate]
FROM
	[Ratings]
WHERE
	[PKRatingID] = @PKRatingID


GO

GO

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[RatingsSelectByRatingBy] (
	@RatingBy int
)
AS

SET NOCOUNT ON

SELECT
	[PKRatingID],
	[FKTechnicianID],
	[FKShowID],
	[FeedbackDate],
	[Email],
	[RatingBy],
	[IsHireAgain],
	[Description],
	[Prompt],
	[Professional],
	[Experience],
	[Attitude],
	[OverAndAbove],
	[AverateRate]
FROM
	[Ratings]
WHERE
	[RatingBy] = @RatingBy


GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[RatingsUpdate]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

    
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[RatingsUpdate] (    
 @PKRatingID int,    
 @FKTechnicianID int,    
 @FKShowID int,    
-- @FeedbackDate datetime,    
 @Email varchar(50),    
 @RatingBy int,    
 @IsHireAgain bit,    
 @Description varchar(500),    
 @Prompt float(53),    
 @Professional float(53),    
 @Experience float(53),    
 @Attitude float(53),    
 @OverAndAbove float(53)    
 --@AverateRate float(53)    
)    
AS    
    
SET NOCOUNT ON  
BEGIN  
if Exists(Select null from Show s where s.PKShowID = @FKShowID and s.StartDate < DATEADD(d,-1,GETDATE()))
BEGIN
select -2
END
ELSE
BEGIN
UPDATE    
 [Ratings]    
SET    
 [FKTechnicianID] = @FKTechnicianID,    
 [FKShowID] = @FKShowID,    
 [FeedbackDate] = GETDATE(),    
 [Email] = @Email,    
 [RatingBy] = @RatingBy,    
 [IsHireAgain] = @IsHireAgain,    
 [Description] = @Description,    
 [Prompt] = @Prompt,    
 [Professional] = @Professional,    
 [Experience] = @Experience,    
 [Attitude] = @Attitude,    
 [OverAndAbove] = @OverAndAbove,    
 [AverateRate] = ((@Prompt+@Professional+@Experience+@Attitude+@OverAndAbove)/5)
WHERE    
  [PKRatingID] = @PKRatingID 
  
exec TechnicianUpdateRating @FKTechnicianID 
 
SELECT @PKRatingID  
END
END 

GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[RequestMorePosition]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[RequestMorePosition]
(
	@RequestedPositions nvarchar(max),
	@PKTechnicianID int
)
AS
BEGIN
	Insert into TechnicianPositions (FKPositionID,FKTechnicianID,StatusID)     
	select cast(val as int),@PKTechnicianID,0 from dbo.fnParseArray(@RequestedPositions, ',')
END

GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[RightsGetAll]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO


CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[RightsGetAll]
	@LevelID int
AS
begin
	select 
	p.PKPageID,
	p.PageName,
	p.Title,
	case when(pr.[CanView] is null) then 0 else pr.[CanView] end as [CanView],
	case when(pr.[CanAdd] is null) then 0 else pr.[CanAdd] end as [CanAdd],
	case when(pr.[CanEdit] is null) then 0 else pr.[CanEdit] end as [CanEdit],
	case when(pr.[CanDelete] is null) then 0 else pr.[CanDelete] end as [CanDelete]
	from Pages p
	left join [PageRights] pr on p.PKPageID=pr.FKPageID
	and pr.FKLevelID = @LevelID
end

GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[SearchAirports]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

-- exec SearchAirports 'bn%'

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[SearchAirports]
(
	@Prefix varchar(50)
)
AS
BEGIN
	Select CityAreaServed as City,AirportCode+'_'+AirportName as Airport from Airports where CityAreaServed like @Prefix or AirportCode like @Prefix

--truncate table Airports
--select * from Airports  Order by AirportCode

END


GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[SelectByShowAndTechnician]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
---		exec [SelectByShowAndTechnician] 60 ,122        



CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[SelectByShowAndTechnician] (          



 @FKShowID int,        



 @FKTechnicianID int          



)          



AS          



          



SET NOCOUNT ON          



          



SELECT          



 [PKRatingID],          



 [FKTechnicianID],          



 [FKShowID],          



 [FeedbackDate],          



 [Email],          



 [RatingBy],          



 [IsHireAgain],          



 [Description],          



 [Prompt],       



 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Bid where FKTechnicianID = @FKTechnicianID and isApproved = 1) as TotalShows ,         



 [Professional],          



 [Experience],          



 [Attitude],          



 [OverAndAbove],      



 [AverateRate],        



 (SELECT Title FROM Show  where PKShowID=@FKShowID) as Title,        



 (select (Firstname +' ' +LastName) as Name from Technician where PKTechnicianID=@FKTechnicianID) as FullName        



FROM          



 [Ratings]          



WHERE          



 [FKShowID] = @FKShowID AND FKTechnicianID=@FKTechnicianID       



       



 --SELECT RANK,



 --       AvgRating,



 --       temp.PKTechnicianID



 --FROM   (



 --           SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY AVG(r.AverateRate) DESC) AS RANK,



 --                  CAST(AVG(r.AverateRate) AS FLOAT) AS AvgRating,



 --                  t.PkTechnicianID



 --           FROM   technician t



 --                  LEFT JOIN Ratings r



 --                       ON  t.PKTechnicianID = r.FKTechnicianID



 --           GROUP BY



 --                  t.PKTechnicianID



 --       ) AS temp



 --WHERE  temp.PKTechnicianID = @FKTechnicianID 



 



 SELECT cast(isnull(Rating,0) AS DECIMAL(10,2)) AS AvgRating,PKTechnicianID,



	 (SELECT RANK FROM (select row_number() over (order by isnull(t.Rating,0) desc, t.CreatedDate) as RANK,t.PKTechnicianID



			                      FROM Technician t WHERE t.isApproved = 1 ) AS tmp WHERE tmp.PKTechnicianID = Technician.PKTechnicianID) AS RANK



	FROM Technician    WHERE  PKTechnicianID = @FKTechnicianID



 



 

GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[SelectDiscussionPeople]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
-- =============================================
-- Author:		<Author,,Name>
-- Create date: <Create Date,,>
-- Description:	<Description,,>
-- =============================================
-- exec SelectDiscussionPeople 'ad'
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[SelectDiscussionPeople]
	-- Add the parameters for the stored procedure here
	@Name varchar(max)
AS
BEGIN
	-- SET NOCOUNT ON added to prevent extra result sets from
	-- interfering with SELECT statements.
	SET NOCOUNT ON;

    -- Insert statements for procedure here
	SELECT top 5 (Firstname+' ' +LastName)as FullName,PKAccountID from Account where FirstName like '%'+@Name +'%'
END

GO

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[SelectEvalsByShow] AS

SET NOCOUNT ON

SELECT
	[PKShowID],
	[Title],
	[Title] + ' ' + CAST(datepart(YYYY,[EndDate])as varchar) as ShowTitle,
	[Description],
	[City],
	[State],
	[Country],
	[NearestAirport],
	[StartDate],
	[EndDate],
	'A1' as Position,
	'7.5' AS AvRating,
	datename(mm,[StartDate]) +' ' + datename(dd,[StartDate]) +','+datename(yyyy,[StartDate]) as ShowDate
	
	--[LogoPath],
	--[bidStartDate],
	--[bidEndDate],
	--[DayRateValue],
	--[isPublished],
	--[PublishedDate],
	--[isActive],
	--[IsAllTech],
	--[IsAllAvailableTech],
	--[IsOnlyAccessTech],
	--[IsOnlyTechWithPassport],
	--[IsOnlyShareRoomTech],
	--(SELECT  STUFF((  
	-- select DISTINCT ', '+ CAST( (select PositionName from Position where PKPositionID = FKPositionID) as varchar) +'('+cast(NoOfPosition as varchar)+')' FROM ShowPositions   where FKShowID = PKShowID
	--FOR XML PATH('')),1,1,'')) as Positions,
	--case when(datename(mm,[StartDate]) = datename(mm,[EndDate]))
	--then
	--SUBSTRING(datename(mm,[StartDate]),0,4)+' '+ CAST(datepart(dd,[StartDate]) as varchar) +'-' +CAST(datepart(dd,[EndDate])as varchar)	
	--else
	--SUBSTRING(datename(mm,[StartDate]),0,4)+' '+ CAST(datepart(dd,[StartDate]) as varchar) +'-'+SUBSTRING(datename(mm,[EndDate]),0,4)+' '+ CAST(datepart(dd,[EndDate])as varchar)	
	--End as ShowDates
	
FROM
	[Show]


GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[SelectRecentAdmins]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
---- Exec SelectRecentAdmins 122,10





CREATE Procedure [dbo].[SelectRecentAdmins]

(

@TechnicianID int,

@AdminID int

)

as

begin

	select FirstName + dbo.RemoveLastDashChars(LastName) as Name , PKAccountID as AdminID from Account where PKAccountID in

	(

	select distinct top 4 val  from dbo.fnParseArray((SELECT  STUFF((  

	select ','+ cast(adminIDs AS VARCHAR)

	from Discussion where FKTechnicianID = @TechnicianID and FKAdminID = @AdminID order by UpdatedDate desc 

	FOR XML PATH('')),1,1,'')), ',') where isnull(val,'') <> ''

	)


	Select FirstName, LastName, Email from Technician where PKTechnicianID = @TechnicianID

	end
GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[SelectShowPositions]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
-- exec SelectShowPositions 6942
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[SelectShowPositions]
(
	@ShowID INT 
)
AS 
BEGIN 
SELECT sp.FKPositionID, sp.FKShowID, sp.NoOfPosition, p.PositionName
  FROM ShowPositions sp INNER JOIN Position p ON sp.FKPositionID = p.PKPositionID WHERE sp.FKShowID = @ShowID   
  
  SELECT DISTINCT p.fkPostionId, (
            STUFF((
                                             SELECT '##' + CAST(p.TravelDate AS VARCHAR)
                                             FROM   PositionWiseShowTravelDates 
                                                    p
                                             WHERE  p.FKPostionID = 
                                                    FKPostionID
                                                    FOR XML PATH('')
                                         
                                
                        
                      ),
                      1,
                      2,
                      '' 
                  )
       )  AS dates FROM PositionWiseShowTravelDates p WHERE p.FKShowID = @ShowID 
  
  SELECT * FROM PositionWiseShowTravelDates
END
GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[SelectTaskTimeByDate]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
-- select * from timeentry

-- exec SelectTaskTimeByDate  '2013-06-19','2013-06-20',43,122 

CREATE procedure [dbo].[SelectTaskTimeByDate]             



 (                



  @FromDate varchar(100)=null,                



  @ToDate varchar(100)=null,                



  @FKShowID INT=NULL,          



  @FKTechnicianID INT=NULL              



 )                



AS                



BEGIN                



           



 SELECT          

 PKTimeEntryID,

 FKTechnicianID,

 FKShowID,

 StartTime,

  StartTime as Hours,

--DATEPART(HH,TaskDate) [Hours],

 EndTime,

 TotalHours,

 Title,

 Description,

 TaskDate,

 NextDayDay=DATENAME(dw,TaskDate),              

 NextDayDate=DATEPART(d,TaskDate),          

   NextDayMonth=DATEPART(m,TaskDate),
   Start_Min,
   End_Min

FROM          



 timeentry



 

 WHERE FKShowID=@FKShowID and FKTechnicianID = @FKTechnicianID



 AND TaskDate>=cast(@FromDate as datetime)           



 AND TaskDate<=cast(@ToDate as datetime)

 --ORDER BY tcrr.dt_Book_From_Date          



            



END 



GO

/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[SelectTechnicians]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[SelectTechnicians] AS

SET NOCOUNT ON

SELECT
	[PKTechnicianID],
	[Firstname] + ' ' +LastName as Name,
	case when(ISNULL([Address],'') = '')
	then
	[City]
	else
	[Address] + ' , ' + [City]
	end	as Location,
	[Address],
	[City],
	[State],
	[ZipCode],
	[Country],
	[Phone1],
	[Phone2],
	[Fax],
	[Mobile],
	[Email],
	[PhotoPath],
	[ResumePath],
	[hasPassport],
	[isInterviewed],
	[NearestAirport],
	[ishotelshare],
	[isApproved],
	[isAccess],
	[Rank],
	[Rating],
	[UserName],
	[Password],
	[OvationRef],
	[BirthDate],
	[LinkedInURL],
	[ShirtSize],
	(select ISNULL(avg(BidAmount),0) from Bid where FKTechnicianID = PKTechnicianID) as AvgBid,
	(SELECT  STUFF((  
	select DISTINCT ', '+ CAST( (select PositionName from Position where PKPositionID = FKPositionID) as varchar) FROM TechnicianPositions   where FKTechnicianID = PKTechnicianID
	FOR XML PATH('')),1,1,'')) as Positions
FROM
	[Technician]


GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[SelectTechPositions]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
/************************************************************
 * Code formatted by SoftTree SQL Assistant © v4.5.9
 * Time: 12/11/2012 12:40:29 PM
 ************************************************************/

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[SelectTechPositions](@TechnicianID INT)
AS
BEGIN
	SELECT DISTINCT p.PKPositionID,
	       p.PositionName,
		   p.PositionDescription,
	       ISNULL(tp.StatusID, 3) AS StatusID,
	       CASE 
	            WHEN (tp.FKPositionID IS NULL) THEN 'Position'
	            WHEN (tp.StatusID = 0) THEN 'Requested'
	            WHEN (tp.StatusID = 1) THEN 'Approved'
	            WHEN (tp.StatusID = 2) THEN 'Rejected'
	            ELSE 'Position'
	       END AS PositionStatus
	FROM   Position p
	       LEFT JOIN (
	                SELECT *
	                FROM   TechnicianPositions
	                WHERE  FKTechnicianID = @TechnicianID
	            ) tp
	            ON  p.PKPositionID = tp.FKPositionID
END


GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[SelectToNotifyShowAdmins]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
CREATE procedure [dbo].[SelectToNotifyShowAdmins]
as
begin

select 
(select PositionName from Position where PKPositionID = b.FKShowPositionID) as PositionName,
'$' + cast( b.BidAmount as varchar ) + '/hr' as Rate,b.PKBidID,
s.Title,
CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), s.StartDate , 101) as StartDate,
CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), s.EndDate , 101) as EndDate,
--s.StartDate, s.EndDate, 
s.PKShowID, s.Email as ShowEmail,b.Email as BidEmail,
( select FirstName + ' '+LastName as Name from Technician where PKTechnicianID = b.FKTechnicianID) as Name
 from Show s inner join bid b on s.PKShowID = b.FKShowID where --PKShowID in (1,2,3) and
cast(cast(s.StartDate as varchar(12)) as datetime) between DATEADD(dd,-7, cast(cast(getdate() as varchar(12)) as datetime))
and cast(cast(getdate() as varchar(12)) as datetime) and b.ToNotify = 1 and isnull(b.IsNotifiedAdmin ,0) = 0 and isnull(b.Email,'') <> ''

end


GO

	[Settings]

	[PKSettingID] = @PKSettingID

/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[SettingsInsert]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[SettingsInsert] (
	@Email1 nvarchar(255),
	@Email2 nvarchar(255),
	@Email3 nvarchar(255),
	@Daily bit,
	@MonWedFriday bit,
	@Weekly bit
)
AS

SET NOCOUNT ON
if exists (select * from Settings)
begin
declare @SettingID int 
set @SettingID = (select Top 1 PKSettingID from Settings)
UPDATE
	[Settings]
SET
	[Email1] = @Email1,
	[Email2] = @Email2,
	[Email3] = @Email3,
	[Daily] = @Daily,
	[MonWedFriday] = @MonWedFriday,
	[Weekly] = @Weekly
WHERE
	 [PKSettingID] = @SettingID
end
else
begin
INSERT INTO [Settings] (
	[Email1],
	[Email2],
	[Email3],
	[Daily],
	[MonWedFriday],
	[Weekly]
) VALUES (
	@Email1,
	@Email2,
	@Email3,
	@Daily,
	@MonWedFriday,
	@Weekly
)
SELECT SCOPE_IDENTITY() AS PKSettingID
end


GO
