/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[ShowBids]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[ShowBids] (
    @FKShowID          INT,
    @FKTechnicianID    INT,
    @tmpShowPositions  tmpShowPositions READONLY
)
AS
BEGIN
	IF EXISTS(
	       SELECT NULL
	       FROM   bid b
	       WHERE  b.FKShowID = @FKShowID
	              AND b.FKTechnicianID = @FKTechnicianID
	              AND B.isApproved = 1
	   )
	BEGIN
	    SELECT -2
	END
	ELSE
	BEGIN
	    SET NOCOUNT ON
	    --DELETE FROM [dbo].[ShowPositions] WHERE [FKShowID] = @PKShowID
	    BEGIN TRANSACTION          
	    DECLARE @FKShowPositionID     INT
	    DECLARE @BidAmount            INT  
	    
	    DECLARE Cur_tmpShowPositions  CURSOR  
	    FOR
	        SELECT FKPositionID,
	               NoOfPosition       
	        FROM   @tmpShowPositions
	    
	    OPEN Cur_tmpShowPositions
	    
	    FETCH NEXT FROM Cur_tmpShowPositions INTO @FKShowPositionID,@BidAmount                                                                                                                                                                                                        
	    WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
	    BEGIN
	        IF EXISTS(
	               SELECT NULL
	               FROM   bid b
	               WHERE  b.FKShowID = @FKShowID
	                      AND b.FKTechnicianID = @FKTechnicianID
	                      AND B.FKShowPositionID = @FKShowPositionID
	           )
	        BEGIN
	            UPDATE bid
	            SET    BidAmount = @BidAmount
	            WHERE  FKShowID = @FKShowID
	                   AND FKTechnicianID = @FKTechnicianID
	                   AND FKShowPositionID = @FKShowPositionID
	        END
	        ELSE
	        BEGIN
	            INSERT INTO bid
	              (
	                FKShowID,
	                FKTechnicianID,
	                FKShowPositionID,
	                BidAmount
	              )
	            VALUES
	              (
	                @FKShowID,
	                @FKTechnicianID,
	                @FKShowPositionID,
	                @BidAmount
	              )
	        END
	        
	        FETCH NEXT FROM Cur_tmpShowPositions INTO @FKShowPositionID,@BidAmount
	    END 
	    
	    CLOSE Cur_tmpShowPositions
	    
	    DEALLOCATE Cur_tmpShowPositions
	    
	    COMMIT TRANSACTION
	    SELECT 0
	END
END


GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[ShowCompanyOverview]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[ShowCompanyOverview] 

(@CustomerID INT)
AS
BEGIN
	SELECT 1,
	       (
	           SELECT ISNULL(AVG(csr.AverageRate), 0) AS NetAvg
	           FROM   CustomerShowRating csr
	                  LEFT JOIN (
	                           SELECT PKCustomerID,
	                                  CreatedDate
	                           FROM   customer
	                           WHERE  CONVERT(VARCHAR, CreatedDate, 101) < CONVERT(VARCHAR, GETDATE(), 101)
	                       ) AS r
	                       ON  csr.FKCustomerID = r.PKCustomerID
	           WHERE (csr.FKCustomerID = @CustomerID OR @CustomerID = 0)
	           GROUP BY	                 
	                  r.CreatedDate
	                  
	       )  AS PastNetAvg,
	       (
	           SELECT ISNULL(AVG(cr.AverageRate), 0) AS NetAvg
	           FROM   Show s
	                  INNER JOIN CustomerShowRating cr
	                       ON  cr.FKShowID = s.PKShowID
	                       AND (s.FKCustomerID = @CustomerID OR @CustomerID = 0)
	           WHERE  StartDate <= GETDATE()
	       )  AS CurrentNetAvg 
	
	
	
	SELECT COUNT(PKShowID) AS ShowCount
	FROM   Show
	WHERE  StartDate <= GETDATE()
	       AND (FKCustomerID = @CustomerID OR @CustomerID = 0)
END

GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[ShowDelete]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
--EXEC [ShowDelete] 29
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[ShowDelete] (@PKShowID INT)
AS
	SET NOCOUNT ON
	BEGIN
		--IF EXISTS (
		--       SELECT NULL
		--       FROM   Bid
		--       WHERE  FKShowID = @PKShowID
		--   )
		--BEGIN
		--    SELECT -2
		--END
		--ELSE
		--BEGIN
			delete from Ratings where FKShowID = @PKShowID
			delete FROM   Bid WHERE  FKShowID = @PKShowID
			DELETE FROM ShowManagers WHERE FKShowID = @PKShowID 
			delete from PositionWiseShowTravelDates WHERE FKShowID = @PKShowID 
			DELETE FROM ShowTravelDate WHERE FKShowID = @PKShowID
		    DELETE 
		    FROM   ShowPositions
		    WHERE  FKShowID = @PKShowID
		    
		    DELETE 
		    FROM   ShowDocuments
		    WHERE  FKShowID = @PKShowID
		    
			DELETE 
		    FROM   TimeEntry
		    WHERE  FKShowID = @PKShowID

		    DELETE 
		    FROM   [Show]
		    WHERE  [PKShowID] = @PKShowID
		    
		    SELECT @PKShowID
		--END
	END




GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[ShowEvaluationByTechnicianID]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[ShowEvaluationByTechnicianID]                

(                

 @PageIndex INT,                  

 @RecordsPerPage INT,                  

 @SortBy nvarchar(50),                  

 @OrderBy nvarchar(50),                  

 @FKTechnicianID int                

)                

AS                

SET NOCOUNT ON              

 Declare @startRowIndex INT;                  

 Declare @endRowIndex INT;                  

 declare @Str nvarchar(max)                  

 set @endRowIndex = (@PageIndex * @RecordsPerPage);                  

 set @startRowIndex = (@endRowIndex - @RecordsPerPage) + 1;                  

                

                 

 set @Str = 'select * from (                  

  SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY '+@SortBy+' '+@OrderBy+') as Row,                

 b.PKBidID,b.BidAmount,s.Title as ShowName,          

 b.FKShowID,r.PKRatingID,r.AverateRate,          

 b.FKShowPositionID,p.PositionName,          

  @FKTechnicianID AS TechnicianID             

 from Bid  b                

 inner join Show s on s.PKShowID = b.FKShowID                

 inner join Ratings r on r.FKShowID = b.FKShowID and b.FKTechnicianID = r.FKTechnicianID                 

 inner join Position p on p.PKPositionID = b.FKShowPositionID                

  where b.FKTechnicianID = @FKTechnicianID                 

   and b.ISApproved = 1) as tmpTable                  

  WHERE Row between                   

  @startRowIndex and @endRowIndex;'                  

            

print @STR                

EXEC sp_executesql @STR, N' @endRowIndex INT = NULL,                  

        @startRowIndex INT = NULL,                  

        @SortBy nvarchar(50)=null,                  

        @OrderBy nvarchar(50)=null,                  

        @FKTechnicianID nvarchar(50)=null',                  

        @endRowIndex,                  

        @startRowIndex,                  

        @SortBy,                  

        @OrderBy,                  

        @FKTechnicianID;                  

           

                   

 SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Bid where FKTechnicianID = @FKTechnicianID and isApproved = 1        

           

 -- Another Query To Get Rank And rating ogf Technician          

           

  --SELECT RANK,

  --       AvgRating,

  --       temp.PKTechnicianID,

  --       temp.FullName

  --FROM   (

  --           SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY AVG(r.AverateRate) DESC) AS RANK,

  --                  CAST(AVG(r.AverateRate) AS FLOAT) AS AvgRating,

  --                  t.PkTechnicianID,

  --                  (t.Firstname + ' ' + t.LastName) AS FullName

  --           FROM   technician t

  --                  LEFT JOIN Ratings r

  --                       ON  t.PKTechnicianID = r.FKTechnicianID

  --           GROUP BY

  --                  t.PKTechnicianID,

  --                  t.Firstname,

  --                  t.LastName

  --       ) AS temp

  --WHERE  temp.PKTechnicianID = @FKTechnicianID        

   

    SELECT CAST(ISNULL(t.Rating, 0) AS DECIMAL(10, 2)) AS AvgRating,

            (t.Firstname + ' ' + t.LastName) AS FullName,

            t.PkTechnicianID,

             (SELECT RANK FROM (select row_number() over (order by isnull(t.Rating,0) desc, t.CreatedDate) as RANK,t.PKTechnicianID

			FROM Technician t WHERE t.isApproved = 1 ) AS tmp WHERE tmp.PKTechnicianID = t.PKTechnicianID) AS Rank

     FROM   Technician t WHERE t.PKTechnicianID = @FKTechnicianID    

             

GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[ShowEvaluationByTechnicianID_PMID]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[ShowEvaluationByTechnicianID_PMID]                

(                

 @PageIndex INT,                  

 @RecordsPerPage INT,                  

 @SortBy nvarchar(50),                  

 @OrderBy nvarchar(50),                  

 @FKTechnicianID int,          

 @FKAccountID int                

)                

AS                

SET NOCOUNT ON              

 Declare @startRowIndex INT;                  

 Declare @endRowIndex INT;                  

 declare @Str nvarchar(max)                  

 set @endRowIndex = (@PageIndex * @RecordsPerPage);                  

 set @startRowIndex = (@endRowIndex - @RecordsPerPage) + 1;                  

                

                 

 set @Str = 'select * from (                  

  SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY '+@SortBy+' '+@OrderBy+') as Row,                

 b.PKBidID,b.BidAmount,s.Title as ShowName,b.FKShowID,r.PKRatingID,        

 r.AverateRate,b.FKShowPositionID,p.PositionName,            

  @FKTechnicianID AS TechnicianID             

 from Bid  b                

 inner join Show s on s.PKShowID = b.FKShowID                

 inner join Ratings r on r.FKShowID = b.FKShowID and b.FKTechnicianID = r.FKTechnicianID                

 inner join Position p on p.PKPositionID = b.FKShowPositionID          

 inner join ShowManagers sm on sm.FKShowID = s.PKShowID and sm.FKAccountID = @FKAccountID                

  where b.FKTechnicianID = @FKTechnicianID                 

   and b.ISApproved = 1) as tmpTable                  

  WHERE Row between                   

  @startRowIndex and @endRowIndex;'                  

            

print @STR                

EXEC sp_executesql @STR, N' @endRowIndex INT = NULL,                  

        @startRowIndex INT = NULL,                  

        @SortBy nvarchar(50)=null,                  

        @OrderBy nvarchar(50)=null,                  

        @FKTechnicianID nvarchar(50)=null,          

        @FKAccountID int = NULL',                  

        @endRowIndex,                  

        @startRowIndex,                  

        @SortBy,                  

        @OrderBy,                  

        @FKTechnicianID,          

        @FKAccountID;                  

                   

 select  COUNT(*) from Bid where FKTechnicianID = @FKTechnicianID and isApproved = 1   

       

     --SELECT RANK,

     --       AvgRating,

     --       temp.PKTechnicianID,

     --       temp.FullName

     --FROM   (

     --           SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY AVG(r.AverateRate) DESC) AS 

     --                  RANK,

     --                  CAST(AVG(r.AverateRate) AS FLOAT) AS AvgRating,

     --                  t.PkTechnicianID,

     --                  (t.Firstname + ' ' + t.LastName) AS FullName

     --           FROM   technician t

     --                  LEFT JOIN Ratings r

     --                       ON  t.PKTechnicianID = r.FKTechnicianID

     --           GROUP BY

     --                  t.PKTechnicianID,

     --                  t.Firstname,

     --                  t.LastName

     --       ) AS temp

     --WHERE  temp.PKTechnicianID = @FKTechnicianID    

     

     

     SELECT CAST(ISNULL(t.Rating, 0) AS DECIMAL(10, 2)) AS AvgRating,

            (t.Firstname + ' ' + t.LastName) AS FullName,

            t.PkTechnicianID,

             (SELECT RANK FROM (select row_number() over (order by isnull(t.Rating,0) desc, t.CreatedDate) as RANK,t.PKTechnicianID

			FROM Technician t WHERE t.isApproved = 1 ) AS tmp WHERE tmp.PKTechnicianID = t.PKTechnicianID) AS Rank

     FROM   Technician t WHERE t.PKTechnicianID = @FKTechnicianID   

         

     

       

GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[ShowInsert]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[ShowInsert] (
    @Title                   VARCHAR(100),
    @Description             VARCHAR(500),
    @City                    VARCHAR(50),
    @State                   VARCHAR(50),
    @Country                 VARCHAR(50),
    @NearestAirport          VARCHAR(50),
    @StartDate               DATETIME,
    @EndDate                 DATETIME,
    @LogoPath                VARCHAR(100),
    @bidStartDate            DATETIME,
    @bidEndDate              DATETIME,
    @DayRateValue            FLOAT(53),
    @isPublished             BIT,
    @PublishedDate           DATETIME,
    @isActive                BIT,
    @IsAllTech               BIT,
    @IsAllAvailableTech      BIT,
    @IsOnlyAccessTech        BIT,
    @IsOnlyTechWithPassport  BIT,
    @IsOnlyShareRoomTech     BIT,
    @ImportantDocPath        NVARCHAR(250),
    @tmpShowPositions        tmpShowPositions READONLY,	
    @tmpPositionWiseTravelDates tmpPositionWiseTravelDates Readonly,
    @Email                   VARCHAR(150),
    @TravelDays              VARCHAR(255),
    @FKCustomerID			 INT,
    @ProjectManagers		 VARCHAR(255)
    
)
AS
BEGIN
	IF EXISTS(
	       SELECT NULL
	       FROM   Show s
	       WHERE  s.Title = @Title
	   )
	BEGIN
	    SELECT -2
	END
	ELSE
	BEGIN
	    SET NOCOUNT ON
	    
	    INSERT INTO [Show]
	      (
	        [Title],
	        [Description],
	        [City],
	        [State],
	        [Country],
	        [NearestAirport],
	        [StartDate],
	        [EndDate],
	        [LogoPath],
	        [bidStartDate],
	        [bidEndDate],
	        [DayRateValue],
	        [isPublished],
	        [PublishedDate],
	        [isActive],
	        [IsAllTech],
	        [IsAllAvailableTech],
	        [IsOnlyAccessTech],
	        [IsOnlyTechWithPassport],
	        [IsOnlyShareRoomTech],
	        [Email],
	        FKCustomerID
	        
	      )
	    VALUES
	      (
	        @Title,
	        @Description,
	        @City,
	        @State,
	        @Country,
	        @NearestAirport,
	        @StartDate,
	        @EndDate,
	        @LogoPath,
	        @bidStartDate,
	        @bidEndDate,
	        @DayRateValue,
	        @isPublished,
	        @PublishedDate,
	        @isActive,
	        @IsAllTech,
	        @IsAllAvailableTech,
	        @IsOnlyAccessTech,
	        @IsOnlyTechWithPassport,
	        @IsOnlyShareRoomTech,
	        @Email,
	        @FKCustomerID
	      )
	    DECLARE @PKShowID INT 
	    SET @PKShowID = (
	            SELECT SCOPE_IDENTITY()
	        )
	    
	    SELECT @PKShowID
	    IF (@ImportantDocPath IS NOT NULL AND @ImportantDocPath != '')
	    BEGIN
	        INSERT INTO ShowDocuments
	          (
	            FKShowID,
	            DocumentPath
	          )
	        SELECT @PKShowID,
	               val
	        FROM   dbo.fnParseArray(@ImportantDocPath, '&')
	    END
	    
	    IF (@TravelDays IS NOT NULL AND @TravelDays != '')
	    BEGIN
	        INSERT INTO ShowTravelDate
	          (
	            FKShowID,
	            TravelDate
	          )
	        SELECT @PKShowID,
	              CAST( val AS DATETIME)
	        FROM   dbo.fnParseArray(@TravelDays, '&')
	    END
	    
	    
	    IF (@ProjectManagers IS NOT NULL AND @ProjectManagers != '')
	    BEGIN
	        INSERT INTO ShowManagers
	          (
	            FKShowID,
	            FKAccountID
	          )
	        SELECT @PKShowID,
	              CAST( val AS int)
	        FROM   dbo.fnParseArray(@ProjectManagers, ',')
	    END
	    
	    BEGIN TRANSACTION          
	    DECLARE @FKPositionID         INT
	    DECLARE @NoOfPosition         INT  
	    Declare @Maxbidrate			  INT
	    DECLARE Cur_tmpShowPositions       CURSOR  
	    FOR
	        SELECT FKPositionID,
	               NoOfPosition   ,
				   Maxbidrate         
	        FROM   @tmpShowPositions
	    
	    OPEN Cur_tmpShowPositions
	    
	    FETCH NEXT FROM Cur_tmpShowPositions INTO @FKPositionID,@NoOfPosition ,@Maxbidrate                                          
	    WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
	    BEGIN
	        INSERT INTO [dbo].[ShowPositions]
	          (
	            [FKPositionID],
	            [FKShowID],
	            [NoOfPosition],
				Maxbidrate
	          )
	        VALUES
	          (
	            @FKPositionID,
	            @PKShowID,
	            @NoOfPosition,
				@Maxbidrate
	          )
	        
	        FETCH NEXT FROM Cur_tmpShowPositions INTO @FKPositionID,@NoOfPosition,@Maxbidrate
	    END 
	    
	    CLOSE Cur_tmpShowPositions
	    
	    DEALLOCATE Cur_tmpShowPositions
	    
	    COMMIT TRANSACTION



		---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	   
	    DELETE FROM [dbo].[PositionWiseShowTravelDates] WHERE [FKShowID] = @PKShowID
	    BEGIN TRANSACTION          
	    DECLARE @PositionId         INT
	    DECLARE @pdate        NVARCHAR(MAX)
	    
	    DECLARE Cur_tmpPositionWiseTravelDates       CURSOR  
	    FOR
	        SELECT PositionId,
	               pdate            
	        FROM   @tmpPositionWiseTravelDates
	    
	    OPEN Cur_tmpPositionWiseTravelDates
	    
	    FETCH NEXT FROM Cur_tmpPositionWiseTravelDates INTO @PositionId,@pdate                                           
	    WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
	    BEGIN
	        INSERT INTO [dbo].[PositionWiseShowTravelDates]
	          (
	             [FKShowID]
				,[FKPostionID]
				,[TravelDate]
	          )
	          SELECT @PKShowID,
	                 @PositionId,
	                 CAST(val AS DATETIME)
	          FROM   dbo.fnParseArray(@pdate, '&')
	           	        
	        FETCH NEXT FROM Cur_tmpPositionWiseTravelDates INTO @PositionId,@pdate    
	    END 
	    
	    CLOSE Cur_tmpPositionWiseTravelDates
	    
	    DEALLOCATE Cur_tmpPositionWiseTravelDates
	    
	    COMMIT TRANSACTION
	   
	   ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	END
	select @PKShowID
END


GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[ShowListingSelectAll]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
--	exec [ShowListingSelectAll]  1,30,'PublishedDate','Desc','','PublishedDate'
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[ShowListingSelectAll] (
	@PageIndex INT,
	@RecordsPerPage INT,
	@SortBy nvarchar(50),
	@OrderBy nvarchar(50),
	@SearchText nvarchar(50),
	@SearchColumn nvarchar(50)
	)AS

SET NOCOUNT ON
	Declare @startRowIndex INT;
	Declare @endRowIndex INT;
	declare @Str nvarchar(max)
	set @endRowIndex = (@PageIndex * @RecordsPerPage);
	set @startRowIndex = (@endRowIndex - @RecordsPerPage) + 1;

	IF(ISNULL(@SearchColumn,'PublishedDate') = 'PublishedDate')
	BEGIN
	SET @SearchColumn = 'Title'	
	--SET @SortBy = 'PublishedDate'
	END
	

set @Str =	'select * from (
	SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY '+@SortBy+' '+@OrderBy+') as Row, tmpShows.* FROM (
	SELECT 	
	[Title],
	
	[Email],
	[FKCustomerID],
	(SELECT CustomerName FROM Customer where PkCustomerID = FKCustomerID) as ClientName,
	[Description],
	[City],
	[State],
	[Country],
	[NearestAirport],	
	[LogoPath],
	[bidStartDate],
	[bidEndDate],
	[DayRateValue],
	[isPublished],
	[PublishedDate],
	[isActive],
	[IsAllTech],
	[IsAllAvailableTech],
	[IsOnlyAccessTech],
	[IsOnlyTechWithPassport],
	[IsOnlyShareRoomTech],
	[StartDate],
	[EndDate],
	(SELECT  STUFF((  
	select DISTINCT ''##''+ cast(TravelDate AS VARCHAR)
	FROM ShowTravelDate  where FKShowID = PKShowID
	FOR XML PATH('''')),1,2,'''')) as TravelDates,
	(SELECT  STUFF((  
	 select DISTINCT '', ''+ CAST( (select PositionName from Position where PKPositionID = FKPositionID) as varchar) +''(''+cast(NoOfPosition as varchar)+'')'' FROM ShowPositions   where FKShowID = PKShowID
	FOR XML PATH('''')),1,1,'''')) as Positions,
	--CASE when((datediff (d, [StartDate], [EndDate]) - 1) > 0)
	--THEN
	--	(datediff (d, [StartDate], [EndDate]) - 1)
	--ELSE
	--	(datediff (d, [StartDate], [EndDate]) + 1)
	--END AS ShowDays,
	--CASE when((datediff (d, [StartDate], [EndDate]) - 1) > 0)
	--THEN
	--2
	--ELSE
	--	0
	--END AS TravelDays,
	((datediff (d, [StartDate], [EndDate]) + 1) - (SELECT COUNT(FKShowID) FROM ShowTravelDate std WHERE std.FKShowID = show.PKShowID)) AS ShowDays,
	(SELECT COUNT(FKShowID) FROM ShowTravelDate std WHERE std.FKShowID = show.PKShowID) AS TravelDays,
	[PKShowID],
	
	(datediff (d, [StartDate], [EndDate]) + 1) AS TotalDays,
	
	case when(datename(mm,[StartDate]) = datename(mm,[EndDate]))
	then
	SUBSTRING(datename(mm,[StartDate]),0,4)+'' ''+ CAST(datepart(dd,[StartDate]) as varchar) +''-'' +CAST(datepart(dd,[EndDate])as varchar)	
	else
	SUBSTRING(datename(mm,[StartDate]),0,4)+'' ''+ CAST(datepart(dd,[StartDate]) as varchar) +''-''+SUBSTRING(datename(mm,[EndDate]),0,4)+'' ''+ CAST(datepart(dd,[EndDate])as varchar)	
	End as ShowDates,
	(select Count(*) from ShowPositions where FKShowID = PKShowID) as PositionCount,
	(select Count(*) from Bid where FKShowID = PKShowID) as BidCount	
FROM
	[Show] ) as tmpShows where '+@SearchColumn+' like ''%'' + @SearchText+''%'') as tmpTable
	WHERE Row between 
	@startRowIndex and @endRowIndex;'
	
	
	print(@STR)
	
	
	-- Table 1: Content record
	EXEC sp_executesql @STR, N'	@endRowIndex INT = NULL,
								@startRowIndex INT = NULL,
								@SortBy nvarchar(50)=null,
								@OrderBy nvarchar(50)=null,
								@SearchText nvarchar(50)=null,
								@SearchColumn nvarchar(50)=null',
								@endRowIndex,
								@startRowIndex,
								@SortBy,
								@OrderBy,
								@SearchText,
								@SearchColumn;
	
--SELECT COUNT(*) FROM [dbo].[Show] where
--[Title] like '%' + @SearchText+'%'
DECLARE @CountShows NVARCHAR(MAX)
SET @CountShows = 'select count(*) from (
	SELECT tmpShows.* FROM (
	SELECT 	
	[Title],	
	(SELECT CustomerName FROM Customer where PkCustomerID = FKCustomerID) as ClientName,
	[PublishedDate]
    FROM
	[Show] ) as tmpShows where '+@SearchColumn+' like ''%'' + @SearchText+''%'') as tmpTable'
	
	
	EXEC sp_executesql @CountShows, N'	@SearchText nvarchar(50)=null,
								@SearchColumn nvarchar(50)=null',
								@SearchText,
								@SearchColumn;


GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[ShowListingSelectAllNEW]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

--select * from Customer
--	exec [ShowListingSelectAll]  1,30,'PublishedDate','Desc','s','ClientName'
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[ShowListingSelectAllNEW] (
	@PageIndex INT,
	@RecordsPerPage INT,
	@SortBy nvarchar(50),
	@OrderBy nvarchar(50),
	@SearchText nvarchar(50),
	@SearchColumn nvarchar(50)
	)AS

SET NOCOUNT ON
	Declare @startRowIndex INT;
	Declare @endRowIndex INT;
	declare @Str nvarchar(max)
	set @endRowIndex = (@PageIndex * @RecordsPerPage);
	set @startRowIndex = (@endRowIndex - @RecordsPerPage) + 1;

	IF(ISNULL(@SearchColumn,'StartDate') = 'StartDate')
	BEGIN
	SET @SearchColumn = 'Title'	
	--SET @SortBy = 'PublishedDate'
	END
	

set @Str =	'select * from (
	SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY '+@SortBy+' '+@OrderBy+') as Row, tmpShows.* FROM (
	SELECT 	
	[Title],
	
	[Email],
	[FKCustomerID],
	(SELECT CustomerName FROM Customer where PkCustomerID = FKCustomerID) as ClientName,
	[Description],
	[City],
	[State],
	[Country],
	[NearestAirport],	
	[LogoPath],
	[bidStartDate],
	[bidEndDate],
	[DayRateValue],
	[isPublished],
	[PublishedDate],
	[isActive],
	[IsAllTech],
	[IsAllAvailableTech],
	[IsOnlyAccessTech],
	[IsOnlyTechWithPassport],
	[IsOnlyShareRoomTech],
	[StartDate],
	[EndDate],
	(SELECT  STUFF((  
	select DISTINCT ''##''+ cast(TravelDate AS VARCHAR)
	FROM ShowTravelDate  where FKShowID = PKShowID
	FOR XML PATH('''')),1,2,'''')) as TravelDates,
	(SELECT  STUFF((  
	 select DISTINCT '', ''+ CAST( (select PositionName from Position where PKPositionID = FKPositionID) as varchar) +''(''+cast(NoOfPosition as varchar)+'')'' FROM ShowPositions   where FKShowID = PKShowID
	FOR XML PATH('''')),1,1,'''')) as Positions,
	--CASE when((datediff (d, [StartDate], [EndDate]) - 1) > 0)
	--THEN
	--	(datediff (d, [StartDate], [EndDate]) - 1)
	--ELSE
	--	(datediff (d, [StartDate], [EndDate]) + 1)
	--END AS ShowDays,
	--CASE when((datediff (d, [StartDate], [EndDate]) - 1) > 0)
	--THEN
	--2
	--ELSE
	--	0
	--END AS TravelDays,
	((datediff (d, [StartDate], [EndDate]) + 1) - (SELECT COUNT(FKShowID) FROM ShowTravelDate std WHERE std.FKShowID = show.PKShowID)) AS ShowDays,
	(SELECT COUNT(FKShowID) FROM ShowTravelDate std WHERE std.FKShowID = show.PKShowID) AS TravelDays,
	[PKShowID],
	
	(datediff (d, [StartDate], [EndDate]) + 1) AS TotalDays,
	
	case when(datename(mm,[StartDate]) = datename(mm,[EndDate]))
	then
	SUBSTRING(datename(mm,[StartDate]),0,4)+'' ''+ CAST(datepart(dd,[StartDate]) as varchar) +''-'' +CAST(datepart(dd,[EndDate])as varchar)	
	else
	SUBSTRING(datename(mm,[StartDate]),0,4)+'' ''+ CAST(datepart(dd,[StartDate]) as varchar) +''-''+SUBSTRING(datename(mm,[EndDate]),0,4)+'' ''+ CAST(datepart(dd,[EndDate])as varchar)	
	End as ShowDates,
	(select Count(*) from ShowPositions where FKShowID = PKShowID) as PositionCount,
	(select Count(*) from Bid where FKShowID = PKShowID) as BidCount	
FROM
	[Show] ) as tmpShows where '+@SearchColumn+' like ''%'' + @SearchText+''%'') as tmpTable
	WHERE Row between 
	@startRowIndex and @endRowIndex;'
	
	
	print(@STR)
	
	
	-- Table 1: Content record
	EXEC sp_executesql @STR, N'	@endRowIndex INT = NULL,
								@startRowIndex INT = NULL,
								@SortBy nvarchar(50)=null,
								@OrderBy nvarchar(50)=null,
								@SearchText nvarchar(50)=null,
								@SearchColumn nvarchar(50)=null',
								@endRowIndex,
								@startRowIndex,
								@SortBy,
								@OrderBy,
								@SearchText,
								@SearchColumn;
	
--SELECT COUNT(*) FROM [dbo].[Show] where
--[Title] like '%' + @SearchText+'%'
DECLARE @CountShows NVARCHAR(MAX)
SET @CountShows = 'select count(*) from (
	SELECT tmpShows.* FROM (
	SELECT 	
	[Title],	
	(SELECT CustomerName FROM Customer where PkCustomerID = FKCustomerID) as ClientName,
	[PublishedDate]
    FROM
	[Show] ) as tmpShows where '+@SearchColumn+' like ''%'' + @SearchText+''%'') as tmpTable'
	
	
	EXEC sp_executesql @CountShows, N'	@SearchText nvarchar(50)=null,
								@SearchColumn nvarchar(50)=null',
								@SearchText,
								@SearchColumn;


GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[ShowManagerShowList]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

--exec [ShowManagerShowList]  1,20,'Title','Desc','',12
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[ShowManagerShowList] (
	@PageIndex INT,
	@RecordsPerPage INT,
	@SortBy nvarchar(50),
	@OrderBy nvarchar(50),
	@SearchText nvarchar(50),
	@AccountID nvarchar(50)
	)AS

SET NOCOUNT ON
	Declare @startRowIndex INT;
	Declare @endRowIndex INT;
	declare @Str nvarchar(max)
	set @endRowIndex = (@PageIndex * @RecordsPerPage);
	set @startRowIndex = (@endRowIndex - @RecordsPerPage) + 1;



set @Str =	'select * from (
	SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY '+@SortBy+' '+@OrderBy+') as Row,
	
	[Title],
	[Email],
	[FKCustomerID],
	[Description],
	[City],
	[State],
	[Country],
	[NearestAirport],	
	[LogoPath],
	[bidStartDate],
	[bidEndDate],
	[DayRateValue],
	[isPublished],
	[PublishedDate],
	[isActive],
	[IsAllTech],
	[IsAllAvailableTech],
	[IsOnlyAccessTech],
	[IsOnlyTechWithPassport],
	[IsOnlyShareRoomTech],
	[StartDate],
	[EndDate],
	(SELECT  STUFF((  
	select DISTINCT ''##''+ cast(TravelDate AS VARCHAR)
	FROM ShowTravelDate  where FKShowID = PKShowID
	FOR XML PATH('''')),1,2,'''')) as TravelDates,
	(SELECT  STUFF((  
	 select DISTINCT '', ''+ CAST( (select PositionName from Position where PKPositionID = FKPositionID) as varchar) +''(''+cast(NoOfPosition as varchar)+'')'' FROM ShowPositions   where FKShowID = PKShowID
	FOR XML PATH('''')),1,1,'''')) as Positions,
	((datediff (d, [StartDate], [EndDate]) + 1) - (SELECT COUNT(FKShowID) FROM ShowTravelDate std WHERE std.FKShowID = show.PKShowID)) AS ShowDays,
	(SELECT COUNT(FKShowID) FROM ShowTravelDate std WHERE std.FKShowID = show.PKShowID) AS TravelDays,
	[PKShowID],
	
	(datediff (d, [StartDate], [EndDate]) + 1) AS TotalDays,
	
	case when(datename(mm,[StartDate]) = datename(mm,[EndDate]))
	then
	SUBSTRING(datename(mm,[StartDate]),0,4)+'' ''+ CAST(datepart(dd,[StartDate]) as varchar) +''-'' +CAST(datepart(dd,[EndDate])as varchar)	
	else
	SUBSTRING(datename(mm,[StartDate]),0,4)+'' ''+ CAST(datepart(dd,[StartDate]) as varchar) +''-''+SUBSTRING(datename(mm,[EndDate]),0,4)+'' ''+ CAST(datepart(dd,[EndDate])as varchar)	
	End as ShowDates,
	(select Count(*) from ShowPositions where FKShowID = PKShowID) as PositionCount,
	(select Count(*) from Bid where FKShowID = PKShowID) as BidCount	
FROM
	[Show] inner join ShowManagers sm on Show.PKShowID=sm.FKShowID and sm.FKAccountID=@AccountID  where [Title] like ''%'' + @SearchText+''%'') as tmpTable
	WHERE Row between 
	@startRowIndex and @endRowIndex;'
	
	
	print(@STR)
	
	
	-- Table 1: Content record
	EXEC sp_executesql @STR, N'	@endRowIndex INT = NULL,
								@startRowIndex INT = NULL,
								@SortBy nvarchar(50)=null,
								@OrderBy nvarchar(50)=null,
								@SearchText nvarchar(50)=null,
								@AccountID nvarchar(50)=null',
								@endRowIndex,
								@startRowIndex,
								@SortBy,
								@OrderBy,
								@SearchText,
								@AccountID;
	
	SELECT COUNT(*) FROM [Show] inner join ShowManagers sm on Show.PKShowID=sm.FKShowID and sm.FKAccountID=@AccountID  where [Title] like '%' + @SearchText+'%' 



GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[ShowNetPromoterScore]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
--exec ShowNetPromoterScore 1,10,'Title','asc','',0    
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[ShowNetPromoterScore]    
(    
 @PageIndex INT,      
 @RecordsPerPage INT,      
 @SortBy nvarchar(50),      
 @OrderBy nvarchar(50),      
 @SearchText nvarchar(50),  
 @CustomerID int    
)    
AS    
BEGIN    
 Declare @startRowIndex INT;      
 Declare @endRowIndex INT;      
 declare @Str nvarchar(max)      
 set @endRowIndex = (@PageIndex * @RecordsPerPage);      
 set @startRowIndex = (@endRowIndex - @RecordsPerPage) + 1;      
    
SET @Str = 'select * from (      
 SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY '+@SortBy+' '+@OrderBy+') as Row,     
  s.PKShowID,s.Title,c.CustomerName,csr.AverageRate,csr.PKCustomerShowRatingID    
   from Show s    
   inner join Customer c on c.PKCustomerID  = s.FKCustomerID    
   left outer join CustomerShowRating csr on csr.FKShowID = s.PKShowID    
   where s.StartDate <= GETDATE() and (s.FKCustomerID = @CustomerID OR @CustomerID = 0)  
   AND (s.Title like ''%'' + @SearchText+''%'' OR c.CustomerName like ''%'' + @SearchText+''%'')    
  ) AS tmpTable    
  WHERE Row between       
  @startRowIndex and @endRowIndex;'     
PRINT @Str    
    
 EXEC sp_executesql @STR, N' @endRowIndex INT = NULL,      
        @startRowIndex INT = NULL,      
        @SortBy nvarchar(50)=null,      
        @OrderBy nvarchar(50)=null,      
        @SearchText nvarchar(50)=null,  
        @CustomerID int = NULL',      
        @endRowIndex,      
        @startRowIndex,      
        @SortBy,      
        @OrderBy,      
        @SearchText,  
        @CustomerID;    
            
Select COUNT(*) from  Show s    
   inner join Customer c on c.PKCustomerID  = s.FKCustomerID    
   where s.StartDate <= GETDATE() and (s.FKCustomerID = @CustomerID OR @CustomerID = 0)  
   AND (s.Title like '%' + @SearchText+'%' OR c.CustomerName like '%' + @SearchText +'%')           
END 

GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[ShowPositionsDelete]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[ShowPositionsDelete] (
	@PKShowPositionID int
)
AS

SET NOCOUNT ON

DELETE FROM
	[ShowPositions]
WHERE
	[PKShowPositionID] = @PKShowPositionID


GO

GO
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[ShowPositionsDeleteByFKPositionID] (
	@FKPositionID int
)
AS

SET NOCOUNT ON

DELETE FROM
	[ShowPositions]
WHERE
	[FKPositionID] = @FKPositionID


GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[ShowPositionsDeleteByFKShowID]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[ShowPositionsDeleteByFKShowID] (
	@FKShowID int
)
AS

SET NOCOUNT ON

DELETE FROM
	[ShowPositions]
WHERE
	[FKShowID] = @FKShowID


GO

SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[ShowPositionsInsert] (

	@FKPositionID int,

	@FKShowID int,

	@NoOfPosition int,
	@MaxBidRate int

)

AS



SET NOCOUNT ON



INSERT INTO [ShowPositions] (

	[FKPositionID],

	[FKShowID],

	[NoOfPosition],
	MaxBidRate

) VALUES (

	@FKPositionID,

	@FKShowID,

	@NoOfPosition,
	@MaxBidRate

)



SELECT SCOPE_IDENTITY() AS PKShowPositionID



GO

	@PKShowPositionID int

	[PKShowPositionID],

	[FKPositionID],

	[FKShowID],

	[NoOfPosition],
	maxbidrate

FROM

	[ShowPositions]

WHERE

	[PKShowPositionID] = @PKShowPositionID

/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[ShowPositionsSelectByFKShowID]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[ShowPositionsSelectByFKShowID] (

	@FKShowID int

)

AS



SET NOCOUNT ON



SELECT

	[PKShowPositionID],

	[FKPositionID],

	[FKShowID],

	[NoOfPosition],


	(SELECT p.PositionName FROM Position p WHERE p.PKPositionID = [ShowPositions].FKPositionID) AS PositionName,
	Maxbidrate

FROM

	[ShowPositions]

WHERE

	[FKShowID] = @FKShowID



GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[ShowPositionsSelectByFKShowIDforMakeBid]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
-- exec ShowPositionsSelectByFKShowIDforMakeBid 24,13

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[ShowPositionsSelectByFKShowIDforMakeBid] (@FKShowID INT,@PKTechnicianID int)

AS

	SET NOCOUNT ON

	

	SELECT sp.[PKShowPositionID],

	       sp.[FKPositionID],

	       sp.[FKShowID],
		   sp.MaxBidRate,

	       sp.[NoOfPosition],

	       (

	           SELECT p.PositionName

	           FROM   Position p

	           WHERE  p.PKPositionID = sp.FKPositionID

	       ) AS PositionName

	FROM   [ShowPositions] sp

	WHERE  sp.[FKShowID] = @FKShowID AND (sp.FKPositionID IN (SELECT tp.FKPositionID

	                                                         FROM   

	                                                                TechnicianPositions 

	                                                                tp

	                                                         WHERE  tp.FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID AND tp.StatusID = 1))

	



GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[ShowPositionsUpdate]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[ShowPositionsUpdate] (

	@PKShowPositionID int,

	@FKPositionID int,

	@FKShowID int,

	@NoOfPosition int,
	@MaxBidRate int

)

AS



SET NOCOUNT ON



UPDATE

	[ShowPositions]

SET

	[FKPositionID] = @FKPositionID,

	[FKShowID] = @FKShowID,

	[NoOfPosition] = @NoOfPosition,
	MaxBidRate=@MaxBidRate

WHERE

	 [PKShowPositionID] = @PKShowPositionID



GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[ShowQualifiedQuaTechs]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
--122
--316
--339
--409
--443
-- New 122,158,179,258,259,369,409,122,177,179
--select * from Show
-- Exec [ShowQualifiedQuaTechs] 46, 'Ahm, Ahmedabad','122','7'
CREATE procedure [dbo].[ShowQualifiedQuaTechs]

(

@ShowID int,
@Locations nvarchar(max),
@Peoples nvarchar(max),
@Rating nvarchar(50)

)

as

begin
declare @TechIds nvarchar(max)
set @TechIds = ''
print(@TechIds)
if(isnull(@Locations,'') <> '')
begin
set @TechIds += (SELECT  STUFF((  
	 select DISTINCT ',' + cast(PKTechnicianID as varchar) 
	 FROM Technician where City in ( SELECT rtrim(ltrim(val)) FROM dbo.fnParseArray(@Locations, ','))	FOR XML PATH('')),1,1,''))
end
print(@TechIds)
if(isnull(@Peoples,'') <> '')
begin
set @TechIds += [dbo].[AppendCharIFNotNull]((SELECT  STUFF((  
	 select DISTINCT ',' + cast(PKTechnicianID as varchar) FROM Technician where PKTechnicianID in ( SELECT cast(val as int) FROM dbo.fnParseArray(@Peoples, ','))
	 FOR XML PATH('')),1,1,'')),',')

end
print(@TechIds)
if(isnull(@Rating,'') <> '')
begin
set @TechIds +=  [dbo].[AppendCharIFNotNull]((SELECT  STUFF((  
	 select DISTINCT ',' + cast(PKTechnicianID as varchar) FROM Technician where Rating >= cast(@Rating as decimal)	FOR XML PATH('')),1,1,'')),',')

end
print(@TechIds)
select t.PKTechnicianID, t.FirstName,t.LastName, t.Email, s.PKShowID,s.StartDate as ShowStartDate, s.BidStartDate as BidStartDate,
s.title,(SELECT  STUFF((  
	 select DISTINCT ', '+ CAST( (select PositionName from Position where PKPositionID = FKPositionID) as varchar)
	 +'('+cast(NoOfPosition as varchar)+')' FROM ShowPositions   where FKShowID = PKShowID	FOR XML PATH('')),1,1,'')) as Positions
	  from Technician t cross join Show s where isnull(t.email,'') != '' And
	s.PKShowID = @ShowID
	And
	s.PKShowID IN (SELECT FKShowID FROM ShowPositions sp WHERE sp.FKPositionID IN (SELECT tp.FKPositionID FROM TechnicianPositions tp WHERE tp.FKTechnicianID  = t.PKTechnicianID and tp.StatusID = 1))
	AND
	(
	 --(t.PKTechnicianID in (select distinct cast(val as int) from [dbo].[fnParseArray](@TechIds,',')))
	 --or
	 (
	 (s.IsOnlyTechWithPassport = t.hasPassport or isnull(s.IsOnlyTechWithPassport,0) = 0 )And
	 (s.IsOnlyTechWithPassport = t.hasPassport or isnull(s.IsOnlyTechWithPassport,0) = 0 )And
	 (s.IsOnlyAccessTech = t.isAccess or isnull(s.IsOnlyAccessTech,0) = 0) 
	 and
	 (s.IsAllAvailableTech = 0 
	 or ((SELECT count(*) FROM Show cs WHERE cs.PKShowID <> s.PKShowID and cs.PKShowID IN (SELECT FKShowID FROM bid WHERE FKTechnicianID = t.PKTechnicianID AND isApproved = 1)
     AND ((s.StartDate BETWEEN cs.StartDate AND cs.EndDate) OR (s.EndDate BETWEEN cs.StartDate AND cs.EndDate))) = 0 ))
	))



--from Technician t cross join Show s	where	isnull(t.email,'') != '' And
--	 s.PKShowID = @ShowID
--	And
--	((s.PKShowID IN (SELECT FKShowID FROM ShowPositions sp WHERE sp.FKPositionID IN (SELECT tp.FKPositionID FROM TechnicianPositions tp WHERE tp.FKTechnicianID  = t.PKTechnicianID and tp.StatusID = 1) ))
--	AND
--	(
--	 (s.IsOnlyTechWithPassport = t.hasPassport or isnull(s.IsOnlyTechWithPassport,0) = 0 )And
--	 (s.IsOnlyShareRoomTech = t.ishotelshare or isnull(s.IsOnlyShareRoomTech,0) = 0)And
--	 (s.IsOnlyAccessTech = t.isAccess or isnull(s.IsOnlyAccessTech,0) = 0) And
--	 (s.IsAllAvailableTech = 0 or ((SELECT count(*) FROM Show cs WHERE cs.PKShowID <> s.PKShowID and cs.PKShowID IN (SELECT FKShowID FROM bid WHERE FKTechnicianID = t.PKTechnicianID AND isApproved = 1)
--	 AND ((s.StartDate BETWEEN cs.StartDate AND cs.EndDate) OR (s.EndDate BETWEEN cs.StartDate AND cs.EndDate))) = 0)))
--	 )
--	 
--	--and ((s.bidEndDate > DATEADD(d,-1,GETDATE()) AND s.bidStartDate < GETDATE()) or(( SELECT COUNT(b.PKBidID) FROM Bid b WHERE  b.FKShowID = s.PKShowID AND b.FKTechnicianID = t.PKTechnicianID) > 0))
--	-- OR(( SELECT COUNT(b.PKBidID) FROM Bid b WHERE  b.FKShowID = s.PKShowID AND b.FKTechnicianID = t.PKTechnicianID AND B.IsApproved = 1) > 0))

	End
GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[ShowSelect]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
--Webcasting Op(2)//04/04/2013##04/09/2013##03/13/2013##03/15/2013||Asst. Cameraman(2)//||Test 2(2)//||Test 1(2)//
---- exec ShowSelect 33
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[ShowSelect] (
	@PKShowID int
)
AS

SET NOCOUNT ON

SELECT
	[PKShowID],
	[Title],
	[Description],
	[City],
	[FKCustomerID],
	[State],
	[Country],
	[NearestAirport],
	[StartDate],
	[EndDate],
	[LogoPath],
	[Email],
	[bidStartDate],
	[bidEndDate],
	[DayRateValue],
	[isPublished],
	[PublishedDate],
	[isActive],
	[IsAllTech],
	[IsAllAvailableTech],
	[IsOnlyAccessTech],
	[IsOnlyTechWithPassport],
	[IsOnlyShareRoomTech],
	
	(SELECT  STUFF((  
	 select DISTINCT ', '+ CAST( (select PositionName from Position where PKPositionID = FKPositionID) as varchar) +'('+cast(NoOfPosition as varchar)+')' FROM ShowPositions   where FKShowID = PKShowID
	FOR XML PATH('')),1,1,'')) as Positions,

	(SELECT  STUFF((  
	 select DISTINCT ', '+ (select '<a target="_blank" href="@'+ cast(PkTechnicianID as varchar)+'@">' + FirstName + ' ' + LastName +'</a>' from Technician where PkTechnicianID = FKTechnicianID) + ' Approved for ' 
	 + (select PositionName from Position where PKPositionID = FKShowPositionID) FROM [dbo].[Bid] where FKShowID = PKShowID and isApproved = 1
	FOR XML PATH('')),1,1,'')) as ApprovedTechs,
	
	(SELECT  STUFF((  
	select DISTINCT ','+CAST( FKAccountID AS VARCHAR)
	FROM ShowManagers  where FKShowID = PKShowID
	FOR XML PATH('')),1,1,'')) as ProjectManagers,
	
	(SELECT  STUFF((  
	select DISTINCT '##'+ DocumentPath
	FROM ShowDocuments  where FKShowID = PKShowID
	FOR XML PATH('')),1,2,'')) as ImportantDocPath,
	
	--(SELECT  STUFF((  
	--select DISTINCT '##'+ cast(TravelDate AS VARCHAR)
	--FROM ShowTravelDate  where FKShowID = PKShowID
	--FOR XML PATH('')),1,2,'')) as TravelDays,

	  
	(select cast(min(TravelDate) AS VARCHAR) +'##' + cast(max(TravelDate) AS VARCHAR) 
	FROM ShowTravelDate  where FKShowID = PKShowID
	) as TravelDays,
	
	(
           SELECT STUFF(
                      (
                          SELECT  '||' + CAST(
                                     (
                                         SELECT PositionName
                                         FROM   Position
                                         WHERE  PKPositionID = FKPositionID
                                     ) AS VARCHAR
                                 ) +'('+cast(NoOfPosition as varchar)+')'+'//'+ ( 
                                     STUFF(
                                         ISNULL((
                                             SELECT '##' + CAST(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),p.TravelDate,101) AS VARCHAR)
                                             FROM   PositionWiseShowTravelDates 
                                                    p
                                             WHERE  p.FKPostionID = 
                                                    FKPositionID AND p.FKShowID = PKShowID
                                                    FOR XML PATH('')
                                         ),'##'),
                                         1,
                                         2,
                                         ''
                                     )
                                 ) 
                          FROM   ShowPositions
                          WHERE  FKShowID = PKShowID
                                 FOR XML PATH('')
                      ),
                      1,
                      2,
                      ''
                  )
       ) PositionTravelDays,	  
	
	(
           SELECT STUFF(
                      (
                          SELECT  '||' + CAST(
                                     (
                                         SELECT PositionName
                                         FROM   Position
                                         WHERE  PKPositionID = FKPositionID
                                     ) AS VARCHAR
                                 ) +'('+cast(NoOfPosition as varchar)+')'+'//'+ ( 
                                     STUFF(
                                         ISNULL((
                                             SELECT '## ( ' + CAST(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),min(p.TravelDate),101) AS VARCHAR) + ' to ' + + CAST(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),max(p.TravelDate),101) AS VARCHAR) +' )'
                                             FROM   PositionWiseShowTravelDates 
                                                    p
                                             WHERE  p.FKPostionID = 
                                                    FKPositionID AND p.FKShowID = PKShowID
                                                    FOR XML PATH('')
                                         ),'##'),
                                         1,
                                         2,
                                         ''
                                     )
                                 ) 
                          FROM   ShowPositions
                          WHERE  FKShowID = PKShowID
                                 FOR XML PATH('')
                      ),
                      1,
                      2,
                      ''
                  )
       ) FTPositionTravelDays
	
	
	FROM
	[Show]
WHERE
	[PKShowID] = @PKShowID


GO

SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
