SET NOCOUNT ON

SELECT
	[PKShowID],
	[Title],
	[Description],
	[City],
	[State],
	[Country],
	[FKCustomerID],
	[Email],
	[NearestAirport],
	[StartDate],
	[EndDate],
	[LogoPath],
	[bidStartDate],
	[bidEndDate],
	[DayRateValue],
	[isPublished],
	[PublishedDate],
	[isActive],
	[IsAllTech],
	[IsAllAvailableTech],
	[IsOnlyAccessTech],
	[IsOnlyTechWithPassport],
	[IsOnlyShareRoomTech]
FROM
	[Show]


GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[ShowUpdate]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[ShowUpdate] (
    @PKShowID                INT,
    @Title                   VARCHAR(100),
    @Description             VARCHAR(500),
    @City                    VARCHAR(50),
    @State                   VARCHAR(50),
    @Country                 VARCHAR(50),
    @NearestAirport          VARCHAR(50),
    @StartDate               DATETIME,
    @EndDate                 DATETIME,
    @LogoPath                VARCHAR(100),
    @bidStartDate            DATETIME,
    @bidEndDate              DATETIME,
    @DayRateValue            FLOAT(53),
    @isPublished             BIT,
    @PublishedDate           DATETIME,
    @isActive                BIT,
    @IsAllTech               BIT,
    @IsAllAvailableTech      BIT,
    @IsOnlyAccessTech        BIT,
    @IsOnlyTechWithPassport  BIT,
    @IsOnlyShareRoomTech     BIT,
    @ImportantDocPath        NVARCHAR(250),
    @tmpShowPositions        tmpShowPositions READONLY,
    @tmpPositionWiseTravelDates tmpPositionWiseTravelDates Readonly,
    @Email varchar(150),
    @TravelDays              VARCHAR(255),
    @FKCustomerID			 INT,
    @ProjectManagers		 VARCHAR(255)
)
AS
BEGIN
	IF EXISTS(
	       SELECT NULL
	       FROM   Show s
	       WHERE  s.Title = @Title
	              AND s.[PKShowID] <> @PKShowID
	   )
	BEGIN
	    SELECT -2
	END
	ELSE
	BEGIN
	    SET NOCOUNT ON
	    
	    UPDATE [Show]
	    SET    [Title] = @Title,
	           [Description] = @Description,
	           [City] = @City,
	           [State] = @State,
	           [Country] = @Country,
	           [NearestAirport] = @NearestAirport,
	           [StartDate] = @StartDate,
	           [EndDate] = @EndDate,
	           [LogoPath] = @LogoPath,
	           [bidStartDate] = @bidStartDate,
	           [bidEndDate] = @bidEndDate,
	           [DayRateValue] = @DayRateValue,
	           [isPublished] = @isPublished,
	           [PublishedDate] = @PublishedDate,
	           [isActive] = @isActive,
	           [IsAllTech] = @IsAllTech,
	           [IsAllAvailableTech] = @IsAllAvailableTech,
	           [IsOnlyAccessTech] = @IsOnlyAccessTech,
	           [IsOnlyTechWithPassport] = @IsOnlyTechWithPassport,
	           [IsOnlyShareRoomTech] = @IsOnlyShareRoomTech,
	           [Email] = @Email,
	           FKCustomerID = @FKCustomerID
	    WHERE  [PKShowID] = @PKShowID
	    
	   DELETE from ShowDocuments WHERE FKShowID = @PKShowID
	    if(@ImportantDocPath is not null AND @ImportantDocPath != '')
	    BEGIN
	    	
	    	
	    	insert into ShowDocuments (FKShowID, DocumentPath)
			select @PKShowID, val from dbo.fnParseArray(@ImportantDocPath, '&') 
			
	    end
	    DELETE from ShowTravelDate WHERE FKShowID = @PKShowID
	     IF (@TravelDays IS NOT NULL AND @TravelDays != '')
			BEGIN
	    	
	        INSERT INTO ShowTravelDate
	          (
	            FKShowID,
	            TravelDate
	          )
	        SELECT @PKShowID,
	              CAST( val AS DATETIME)
	        FROM   dbo.fnParseArray(@TravelDays, '&')
	    END
	    DELETE FROM ShowManagers WHERE FKShowID = @PKShowID
	    IF (@ProjectManagers IS NOT NULL AND @ProjectManagers != '')
	    BEGIN
	    	
	        INSERT INTO ShowManagers
	          (
	            FKShowID,
	            FKAccountID
	          )
	        SELECT @PKShowID,
	              CAST( val AS int)
	        FROM   dbo.fnParseArray(@ProjectManagers, ',')
	    END
	    
	    
	    DELETE FROM [dbo].[ShowPositions] WHERE [FKShowID] = @PKShowID
	    BEGIN TRANSACTION          
	    DECLARE @FKPositionID         INT
	    DECLARE @NoOfPosition         INT  
	    Declare @Maxbidrate			  INT
	    DECLARE Cur_tmpShowPositions       CURSOR  
	    FOR
	        SELECT FKPositionID,
	               NoOfPosition ,
				   Maxbidrate           
	        FROM   @tmpShowPositions
	    
	    OPEN Cur_tmpShowPositions
	    
	    FETCH NEXT FROM Cur_tmpShowPositions INTO @FKPositionID,@NoOfPosition,@Maxbidrate                                           
	    WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
	    BEGIN
	        INSERT INTO [dbo].[ShowPositions]
	          (
	            [FKPositionID],
	            [FKShowID],
	            [NoOfPosition],
				[Maxbidrate]
	          )
	        VALUES
	          (
	            @FKPositionID,
	            @PKShowID,
	            @NoOfPosition,
				@Maxbidrate
	          )
	      
	        FETCH NEXT FROM Cur_tmpShowPositions INTO @FKPositionID,@NoOfPosition,@Maxbidrate
	    END 
	    
	    CLOSE Cur_tmpShowPositions
	    
	    DEALLOCATE Cur_tmpShowPositions
	    
	    COMMIT TRANSACTION
	    
	    
	   ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	   
	    DELETE FROM [dbo].[PositionWiseShowTravelDates] WHERE [FKShowID] = @PKShowID
	    BEGIN TRANSACTION          
	    DECLARE @PositionId         INT
	    DECLARE @pdate        NVARCHAR(MAX)
	    
	    DECLARE Cur_tmpPositionWiseTravelDates       CURSOR  
	    FOR
	        SELECT PositionId,
	               pdate            
	        FROM   @tmpPositionWiseTravelDates
	    
	    OPEN Cur_tmpPositionWiseTravelDates
	    
	    FETCH NEXT FROM Cur_tmpPositionWiseTravelDates INTO @PositionId,@pdate                                           
	    WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
	    BEGIN
	        INSERT INTO [dbo].[PositionWiseShowTravelDates]
	          (
	             [FKShowID]
				,[FKPostionID]
				,[TravelDate]
	          )
	          SELECT @PKShowID,
	                 @PositionId,
	                 CAST(val AS DATETIME)
	          FROM   dbo.fnParseArray(@pdate, '&')
	           	        
	        FETCH NEXT FROM Cur_tmpPositionWiseTravelDates INTO @PositionId,@pdate    
	    END 
	    
	    CLOSE Cur_tmpPositionWiseTravelDates
	    
	    DEALLOCATE Cur_tmpPositionWiseTravelDates
	    
	    COMMIT TRANSACTION
	   
	   ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	    
	    
	    
	    DELETE FROM bid WHERE FKShowID = @PKShowID AND FKShowPositionID NOT IN (SELECT sp.FKPositionID FROM ShowPositions sp WHERE sp.FKShowID = @PKShowID)
	     SELECT @PKShowID
	  
	END
END

GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[SP_ProgressBarInfo]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
--learnerid: efa57f5c-83a8-4399-b40e-fe3ba02f3d53
--unitid   : 5d1c7664-e0ed-4972-abd0-b6000a46d79e
-- exec [SP_ProgressBarInfo] 'efa57f5c-83a8-4399-b40e-fe3ba02f3d53', '5d1c7664-e0ed-4972-abd0-b6000a46d79e',0
--UserID : 3996bf29-21a2-48b5-8912-4f3a8648f48d
--UnitID : 2bc3de2e-7d76-4683-b1e1-4674636a3799
-- exec [SP_ProgressBarInfo] '3996bf29-21a2-48b5-8912-4f3a8648f48d', '2bc3de2e-7d76-4683-b1e1-4674636a3799',0
-- exec [SP_ProgressBarInfo] '2bc3de2e-7d76-4683-b1e1-4674636a3799','3996bf29-21a2-48b5-8912-4f3a8648f48d', 0



--19	3	19	96	0	Blue	15.789473684200	100.000000000000
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[SP_ProgressBarInfo]
	-- Add the parameters for the stored procedure here

	(@Userid  UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, @UnitID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER=null, @AllCourses bit = 0)
AS

Declare @Progress_AssessedPC as int
Declare @Progress_MappedPC as int
Declare @TimelinePercent as real
Declare @ExtensionTimelinePercent as real
Declare @TimelineColour as varchar(30)
Declare @Progress_TotalPC as int
Declare @EarliestStart as datetime
Declare @LastFinish as datetime
Declare @LastExtensionFinish as datetime

BEGIN
SET @Progress_TotalPC = 19
SET @Progress_AssessedPC = 3
SET @Progress_MappedPC = 19


SET @TimelinePercent = 96
SET @ExtensionTimelinePercent = 0

SET @TimelineColour = 'Blue'

        SELECT CAST(ISNULL(@Progress_TotalPC, 0) AS INT) AS Progress_TotalPC,
               CAST(ISNULL(@Progress_AssessedPC, 0) AS INT) AS
               Progress_AssessedPC,
               CAST(ISNULL(@Progress_MappedPC, 0) AS INT) AS Progress_MappedPC,
               CAST(ISNULL(@TimelinePercent, 0) AS INT) AS TimelinePercent,
               CAST(ISNULL(@ExtensionTimelinePercent, 0) AS INT) AS
               ExtensionTimelinePercent,
               @TimelineColour AS     TimelineColour,
               (
                   (
                       CAST(@Progress_AssessedPC AS DECIMAL(9, 2)) / CAST(@Progress_TotalPC AS DECIMAL(9, 2))
                   ) * 100
               )                   AS GreenBar,
               (
                   (
                       CAST(@Progress_MappedPC AS DECIMAL(9, 2)) / CAST(@Progress_TotalPC AS DECIMAL(9, 2))
                   ) * 100
               )                   AS OrangeBar

END


GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[SuggestOrConfirmBid]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
/************************************************************
 * Code formatted by SoftTree SQL Assistant © v4.5.9
 * Time: 12/12/2012 6:03:45 PM
 ************************************************************/
-- exec SuggestOrConfirmBid 58,554,1,1,'Confirm',10
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[SuggestOrConfirmBid](
    @ShowID        INT,
    @TechnicianID  INT,
    @PositionID    INT,
    @IsChecked     BIT,
    @Case          NVARCHAR(50),
    @UserID        INT
)
AS
BEGIN
	DECLARE @Str NVARCHAR(max)
	SET @Str = (
	        SELECT CASE @Case
	                    WHEN 'Suggest' THEN 
	                         'UPDATE bid
	                     SET IsSuggested = @IsChecked, SuggestedBy = @UserID
	                     WHERE FKShowID = @ShowID
	                     AND FKTechnicianID = @TechnicianID
	                     AND FKShowPositionID = @PositionID;
	                     select 1'
	                    WHEN 'Confirm' THEN --AND FKShowPositionID = @PositionID
	                           'IF EXISTS (SELECT NULL FROM Ratings WHERE FKShowID = @ShowID AND FKTechnicianID = @TechnicianID  and FKPositionID = @PositionID) AND @IsChecked = 0           
								BEGIN
           							SELECT -1
							    END 							     
							    Else IF EXISTS (SELECT NULL FROM bid WHERE FKShowID = @ShowID AND FKTechnicianID = @TechnicianID  and isApproved = 1) AND @IsChecked = 1           
								BEGIN
           							SELECT -2
							    END 
							    -- ELSE if exists(select null from Bid b inner join ShowPositions s on b.FKShowPositionID = s.FKPositionID  
								--where b.FKShowID  = s.FKShowID and b.FKShowID = @ShowID and b.FKShowPositionID = @PositionID and b.isApproved = 1
								--GROUP BY s.NoOfPosition having COUNT(*) >= s.NoOfPosition)  AND @IsChecked = 1 
								--begin
								--select -4
								--END
							    ELSE if ((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM bid WHERE FKShowID = @ShowID and FKShowPositionID = @PositionID and isApproved = 1) >= (select top 1 NoOfPosition from ShowPositions where FKShowID = @ShowID and FKPositionID = @PositionID))  AND @IsChecked = 1   
								begin
								select -4
								END
								ELSE
							    BEGIN
           							IF EXISTS(SELECT NULL FROM Show s LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM Show WHERE PKShowID = @ShowID) cs ON  s.isPublished = cs.isPublished
           							       WHERE s.PKShowID IN (SELECT FKShowID FROM bid WHERE FKTechnicianID = @TechnicianID AND isApproved = 1)
           							              AND ((cs.StartDate BETWEEN s.StartDate AND s.EndDate) OR (cs.EndDate BETWEEN s.StartDate AND s.EndDate))) AND @IsChecked = 1 
           							BEGIN
           							    SELECT -3
           							END
           							ELSE
           							BEGIN
           							    UPDATE bid
           							    SET    isApproved = @IsChecked,
           							           ApprovedBy = @UserID
           							    WHERE  FKShowID = @ShowID AND FKTechnicianID = @TechnicianID AND FKShowPositionID = @PositionID
           							    SELECT 1
           							END
           						END '
	                    ELSE ''
	               END
	    )
	
	PRINT(@Str)
	IF (@Str != '' AND @Str IS NOT NULL)
	BEGIN
	    EXEC sp_executesql @STR,
	         N'@ShowID INT = NULL,@TechnicianID INT = NULL,@PositionID int = null,@IsChecked bit, @UserID int',
	         @ShowID,
	         @TechnicianID,
	         @PositionID,
	         @IsChecked,
	         @UserID
	    
	    ;
	END
	ELSE
	BEGIN
	    SELECT -2
	END
END

GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[tblAccountDelete]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[tblAccountDelete] (  
 @PKAccountID int  
)  
AS  
  
SET NOCOUNT ON  
  
DELETE FROM  
 Account  
WHERE  
 [PKAccountID] = @PKAccountID


GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[tblAccountSelectAllforProtytype]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
--exec [GetRecords] 2,2

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[tblAccountSelectAllforProtytype] 
	
AS  
BEGIN  
SET NOCOUNT ON  
	Select *,(select Description from Level where PKLevelID = FKLevelID) as Level from Account
END


GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[TechInfo]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO



---		exec TechInfo 122
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechInfo](@TechnicianID INT)
AS
BEGIN
	DECLARE @PreviousDayRank INT, @Rank INT 
	SET @PreviousDayRank = (
	           SELECT RANK
	           FROM   (
	                      SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY AVG(ISNULL(r.AverateRate, 0)) DESC,t.CreatedDate) AS 
	                             RANK,
	                             t.PkTechnicianID
	                      FROM   technician t
	                             LEFT JOIN (
	                                      SELECT AverateRate,
	                                             FKTechnicianID
	                                      FROM   Ratings
	                                      WHERE  CONVERT(VARCHAR, FeedbackDate, 101) 
	                                             < CONVERT(VARCHAR, GETDATE(), 101)
	                                  ) AS r
	                                  ON  t.PKTechnicianID = r.FKTechnicianID
	                      GROUP BY
	                             t.PKTechnicianID,
	                             t.CreatedDate
	                  ) AS temp
	           WHERE  temp.PKTechnicianID = @TechnicianID) 
	SET @Rank =  (
	           SELECT RANK
	           FROM   (
	                      SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY ISNULL(t.Rating, 0) DESC, t.CreatedDate) AS 
	                             RANK,
	                             t.PKTechnicianID
	                      FROM   Technician t
	                      WHERE  t.isApproved = 1
	                  ) AS tmp
	           WHERE  tmp.PKTechnicianID = @TechnicianID
	       )   
	SELECT t.PKTechnicianID,
	       t.FirstName,
	       t.Password,
	       t.Email,
	       t.SSN,
	       t.FKLevelID,
	       t.Rating,
	       t.UserName,
	       t.PhotoPath,
	       (
	           SELECT COUNT(m.PKMessageID)
	           FROM   MESSAGE AS m
	                  INNER JOIN SentMessage AS sm
	                       ON  m.PKMessageID = sm.FKMessageID
	           WHERE  sm.IsDeleted = 0
	                  AND sm.IsRead = 0
	                  AND sm.RecieverID = t.[PKTechnicianID]
	       )           AS NewMessages,
	       @PreviousDayRank AS PreviousDayRank,
	       @Rank AS RANK,
	       CASE WHEN (@Rank >= @PreviousDayRank)
	       THEN 1 
	       ELSE 0 END
	       AS ArrowStatus,
	       (
	           SELECT COUNT(s.Title)
	           FROM   [Show] s
	                  INNER JOIN Technician t
	                       ON  s.isPublished = t.isApproved
	           WHERE  t.PKTechnicianID = @TechnicianID
	                  AND (
	                          s.PKShowID IN (SELECT FKShowID
	                                         FROM   ShowPositions sp
	                                         WHERE  sp.FKPositionID IN (SELECT 
	                                                                           tp.FKPositionID
	                                                                    FROM   
	                                                                           TechnicianPositions 
	                                                                           tp
	                                                                    WHERE  
	                                                                           tp.FKTechnicianID = 
	                                                                           @TechnicianID
	                                                                           AND 
	                                                                               tp.StatusID = 
	                                                                               1))
	                      )
	                  AND (
	                          (
	                              s.IsOnlyTechWithPassport = t.hasPassport
	                              OR ISNULL(s.IsOnlyTechWithPassport, 0) = 0
	                          )
	                          AND (
	                                  s.IsOnlyShareRoomTech = t.ishotelshare
	                                  OR ISNULL(s.IsOnlyShareRoomTech, 0) = 0
	                              )
	                          AND (
	                                  s.IsOnlyAccessTech = t.isAccess
	                                  OR ISNULL(s.IsOnlyAccessTech, 0) = 0
	                              )
	                          AND (
	                                  s.IsAllAvailableTech = 0
	                                  OR (
	                                         (
	                                             SELECT COUNT(*)
	                                             FROM   Show cs
	                                             WHERE  cs.PKShowID <> s.PKShowID
	                                                    AND cs.PKShowID IN (SELECT 
	                                                                               FKShowID
	                                                                        FROM   
	                                                                               bid
	                                                                        WHERE  
	                                                                               FKTechnicianID = 
	                                                                               @TechnicianID
	                                                                               AND 
	                                                                                   isApproved = 
	                                                                                   1)
	                                                    AND (
	                                                            (cs.StartDate BETWEEN s.StartDate AND s.EndDate)
	                                                            OR (cs.EndDate BETWEEN s.StartDate AND s.EndDate)
	                                                        )
	                                         ) = 0
	                                     )
	                              )
	                      )
	                  AND s.bidEndDate > DATEADD(d, -1, GETDATE())
	                  --AND s.bidStartDate < GETDATE()
	                  AND (
	                          SELECT COUNT(*)
	                          FROM   Bid b
	                          WHERE  b.FKShowID = s.PKShowID
	                                 AND b.FKTechnicianID = @TechnicianID
	                      ) = 0
	       )           AS NewProjects
	FROM   Technician     t
	WHERE  t.PKTechnicianID = @TechnicianID
END

GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[TechnicianAdminInsert]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
        
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechnicianAdminInsert] (                  
 @Firstname varchar(50),                  
 @LastName varchar(50),                  
 @Address varchar(450),                  
 @City varchar(50),                  
 @State varchar(50),                  
 @ZipCode varchar(50),                  
 @Country varchar(50),                  
 @Phone1 varchar(15),                  
 @Phone2 varchar(15),                  
 @Fax varchar(15),                  
 @Mobile varchar(15),                  
 @Email varchar(150),                  
 @PhotoPath varchar(100),                  
 @ResumePath varchar(100),                  
 @hasPassport bit,                  
 @isInterviewed bit,                  
 @NearestAirport varchar(255),                  
 @ishotelshare bit,                  
 @isApproved bit,                  
 @isAccess bit,                  
 @dtApprovaldate datetime,                  
 @ApprovedBy int,                  
 @Rank int,                  
 @Rating float(53),                  
 @UserName varchar(100),                  
 @Password varchar(100),                  
 @OvationRef varchar(100),                  
 @BirthDate datetime,                  
 @IsEmailSent bit = 0,        
 @dtPosition TBLPOSITION READONLY,  
 @SSN varchar(50) = null,
 @HomeAddress varchar(450) = NULL,   
 @Other VARCHAR(250),
 @LinkedInURL NVARCHAR(255),
 @ShirtSize NVARCHAR(2),
  @TechnicianReferences TechnicianReferences READONLY,
 @Gender bit,
 @NickName Nvarchar(50),
 @NearestMajorCity Nvarchar(50)
 	              
)                  
AS                  
                  
begin                  
                  
SET NOCOUNT ON                  
if exists (select null from [Technician] where Email = @Email  and @Email <> '')                  
begin                  
select -2                  
end                  
else if exists (select null from [Technician] where UserName = @UserName)                  
begin                  
select -1                  
end                  
else                  
begin                  
                  
INSERT INTO [Technician] (                  
 [Firstname],                  
 [LastName],                  
 [Address],                  
 [City],                  
 [State],                  
 [ZipCode],                  
 [Country],                  
 [Phone1],                  
 [Phone2],                  
 [Fax],                  
 [Mobile],                  
 [Email],                  
 [PhotoPath],                  
 [ResumePath],                  
 [hasPassport],                  
 [isInterviewed],                  
 [NearestAirport],                  
 [ishotelshare],                  
 [isApproved],                  
 [isAccess],                  
 [dtApprovaldate],                  
 [ApprovedBy],                  
 [Rank],                  
 [Rating],                  
 [UserName],                  
 [Password],                  
 [OvationRef],                  
 [BirthDate],                  
 FKLevelID,          
 IsEmailSent,  
 SSN,
 HomeAddress    ,
 Other    ,
 LinkedInURL,
 ShirtSize       ,
 Gender,
 NickName ,NearestMajorCity
        
) VALUES (                  
 @Firstname,                  
 @LastName,                  
 @Address,                  
 @City,                  
 @State,                  
 @ZipCode,                  
 @Country,                  
 @Phone1,                  
 @Phone2,                  
 @Fax,                  
 @Mobile,                  
 @Email,                  
 @PhotoPath,                  
 @ResumePath,                  
 @hasPassport,                  
 @isInterviewed,                  
 @NearestAirport,                  
 @ishotelshare,                  
 @isApproved,                  
 @isAccess,                  
 @dtApprovaldate,                  
 @ApprovedBy,                  
 @Rank,                  
 @Rating,                  
 @UserName,                  
 @Password,                  
 @OvationRef,                  
 @BirthDate,                  
 2,          
 @IsEmailSent,  
 @SSN,
 @HomeAddress  ,
 @Other    ,
 @LinkedInURL ,
 @ShirtSize  ,
 @Gender,
 @NickName ,
 @NearestMajorCity        
)                     
                  
declare @PKTechnicianID int                  
set @PKTechnicianID = (SELECT SCOPE_IDENTITY() )                  
select @PKTechnicianID    

if(isnull(@ResumePath,'') <>'')
  begin
  INSERT INTO [dbo].[TechnicianDocs]
        ([FKTechnicianID]
        ,[DocumentName]
        ,[DocumentPath]
        ,[DocumentType])
  values(@PKTechnicianID, @ResumePath ,@ResumePath,4)  
  end                      
--declare @T Table (val int,TechnicianID int)                  
--insert into @T                  
--select cast(val as int),@PKTechnicianID from dbo.fnParseArray(@TeckPositions, ',')                   
--Insert into TechnicianPositions (FKPositionID,FKTechnicianID,StatusID)                   
--select cast(val as int),@PKTechnicianID,0 from dbo.fnParseArray(@TeckPositions, ',')                   
--insert into TechnicianPositions(FKTechnicianID, FKPositionID,StatusID,ApprovedBy)                
--select @PKTechnicianID ,cast(val as int), 1,@ApprovedBy from dbo.fnParseArray(@TeckPositions, ',')               
              
--case when @isApproved = 1 then 1 else 0 end          
--   values ( @PKTechnicianID, @FKPositionID)                  
BEGIN TRANSACTION                      
  Declare @tmpFirstName VARCHAR(50)
  Declare @tmpLastName VARCHAR(50)
  Declare @tmpEmail NVARCHAR(255)
  Declare @tmpPhoneNumber VARCHAR(15)
  Declare TechnicianReferences CURSOR FOR Select FirstName, LastName, Email, PhoneNumber from @TechnicianReferences            
              
  OPEN TechnicianReferences            
              
  FETCH NEXT FROM TechnicianReferences INTO @tmpFirstName,@tmpLastName, @tmpEmail,@tmpPhoneNumber  
  WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0              
  BEGIN              
   INSERT INTO [dbo].[TechnicianReferences]
           ([FKTechnicianID]
           ,[FirstName]
           ,[LastName]
           ,[Email]
           ,[PhoneNumber])
     VALUES
           (@PKTechnicianID
           ,@tmpFirstName
           ,@tmpLastName
           ,@tmpEmail
           ,@tmpPhoneNumber)            
                 
   FETCH NEXT FROM TechnicianReferences INTO @tmpFirstName,@tmpLastName, @tmpEmail,@tmpPhoneNumber         
  END              
     
  CLOSE TechnicianReferences            
              
  DEALLOCATE TechnicianReferences            
            
 COMMIT TRANSACTION          
        
Declare @FKPositionID int            
  Declare @StatusID int                  
  Declare Tech_Positions CURSOR FOR select FKPositionID,StatusID from @dtPosition            
  OPEN Tech_Positions                  
               
  FETCH NEXT FROM Tech_Positions INTO @FKPositionID,@StatusID                  
  WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0                    
  BEGIN               
             
   Insert into TechnicianPositions (FKTechnicianID, FKPositionID,StatusID,ApprovedBy)                  
   values ( @PKTechnicianID, @FKPositionID,@StatusID,case when @StatusID > 0 then @ApprovedBy else NULL end )                  
          
   FETCH NEXT FROM Tech_Positions INTO @FKPositionID,@StatusID                  
  END                    
                    
  CLOSE Tech_Positions                  
                    
  DEALLOCATE Tech_Positions                       
end                  
end 
GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[TechnicianAdminUpdate]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechnicianAdminUpdate] (              
 @PKTechnicianID int,              
 @Firstname varchar(50),              
 @LastName varchar(50),              
 @Address varchar(450),              
 @City varchar(50),              
 @State varchar(50),              
 @ZipCode varchar(50),              
 @Country varchar(50),              
 @Phone1 varchar(15),              
 @Phone2 varchar(15),              
 @Fax varchar(15),              
 @Mobile varchar(15),              
 @Email varchar(150),              
 @PhotoPath varchar(100),              
 @ResumePath varchar(100),              
 @hasPassport bit,              
 @isInterviewed bit,              
 @NearestAirport varchar(255),              
 @ishotelshare bit,              
 @isApproved bit,              
 @isAccess bit,              
 @dtApprovaldate datetime,              
 @ApprovedBy int,              
 @Rank int,              
 @Rating float(53),              
 @UserName varchar(100),              
 @Password varchar(100),              
 @OvationRef varchar(100),              
 @BirthDate datetime,              
 @dtPosition TBLPOSITION READONLY,      
 @IsEmailSent bit = 0,  
 @SSN varchar(50) = null,
 @HomeAddress varchar(450) = null  ,
  @Other VARCHAR(250)  ,
  @TechnicianReferences TechnicianReferences READONLY ,
   @LinkedInURL NVARCHAR(255),
 @ShirtSize NVARCHAR(2)   ,
 @Gender bit,
 @NickName Nvarchar(50) ,
@NearestMajorCity Nvarchar(50)                       
)              
AS              
              
begin              
              
SET NOCOUNT ON              
if exists (select null from [Technician] where Email = @Email and [PKTechnicianID] <> @PKTechnicianID and @Email <> '')              
begin              
select -2              
end              
else if exists (select null from [Technician] where UserName = @UserName and [PKTechnicianID] <> @PKTechnicianID)              
begin              
select -1              
end              
else              
begin              
              
UPDATE              
 [Technician]              
SET              
 [Firstname] = @Firstname,              
 [LastName] = @LastName,              
 [Address] = @Address,              
 [City] = @City,              
 [State] = @State,              
 [ZipCode] = @ZipCode,              
 [Country] = @Country,              
 [Phone1] = @Phone1,              
 [Phone2] = @Phone2,              
 [Fax] = @Fax,              
 [Mobile] = @Mobile,              
 [Email] = @Email,              
 [PhotoPath] = @PhotoPath,              
 [ResumePath] = @ResumePath,              
 [hasPassport] = @hasPassport,              
 [isInterviewed] = @isInterviewed,              
 [NearestAirport] = @NearestAirport,              
 [ishotelshare] = @ishotelshare,              
 [isApproved] = @isApproved,              
 [isAccess] = @isAccess,              
 [dtApprovaldate] = @dtApprovaldate,              
 [ApprovedBy] = @ApprovedBy,              
 [Rank] = @Rank,              
 [Rating] = @Rating,              
 [UserName] = @UserName,              
 [Password] = @Password,              
 [OvationRef] = @OvationRef,              
 [BirthDate] = @BirthDate,      
 IsEmailSent = @IsEmailSent,  
 SSN = @SSN,
 HomeAddress = @HomeAddress  ,
  Other = @Other,
   LinkedInURL = @LinkedInURL,
  ShirtSize = @ShirtSize ,
  Gender = @Gender,
  NickName = @NickName   ,
  NearestMajorCity = @NearestMajorCity
               
WHERE              
  [PKTechnicianID] = @PKTechnicianID              
                
              
select @PKTechnicianID    

if(isnull(@ResumePath,'') <>'')
  begin  
  Delete from [TechnicianDocs] where [FKTechnicianID] = @PKTechnicianID and [DocumentType] = 4
  INSERT INTO [dbo].[TechnicianDocs]
        ([FKTechnicianID]
        ,[DocumentName]
        ,[DocumentPath]
        ,[DocumentType])
  values(@PKTechnicianID, @ResumePath ,@ResumePath,4)  
  end        
--delete from TechnicianPositions where FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID And (StatusID = 1 OR FKPositionID IN (select cast(val as int) from dbo.fnParseArray(@TeckPositions, ',')))            
--insert into TechnicianPositions(FKTechnicianID, FKPositionID,StatusID,ApprovedBy)              
--select @PKTechnicianID ,cast(val as int),1 ,@ApprovedBy from dbo.fnParseArray(@TeckPositions, ',')               
  --case when @isApproved = 1 then 1 else 0 end            
          
BEGIN TRANSACTION                        
  Declare @FKPositionID int        
  Declare @StatusID int              
  Declare Tech_Positions CURSOR FOR select FKPositionID,StatusID from @dtPosition        
  OPEN Tech_Positions              
           
  UPDATE TechnicianPositions SET StatusID = 0 where FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID                  
  FETCH NEXT FROM Tech_Positions INTO @FKPositionID,@StatusID              
  WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0                
  BEGIN           
 if not exists (select PKTechPositionID from TechnicianPositions where FKPositionID = @FKPositionID and FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID)                
 BEGIN          
   Insert into TechnicianPositions (FKTechnicianID, FKPositionID,StatusID,ApprovedBy)              
   values ( @PKTechnicianID, @FKPositionID,@StatusID,case when @StatusID > 0 then @ApprovedBy else NULL end )              
   END          
   ELSE          
   BEGIN          
   UPDATE TechnicianPositions         
 SET StatusID = @StatusID,         
  ApprovedBy = case when @StatusID > 0 then @ApprovedBy else NULL end         
   where FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID           
   and FKPositionID = @FKPositionID          
   END          
            
                   
   FETCH NEXT FROM Tech_Positions INTO @FKPositionID,@StatusID              
  END                
                
  CLOSE Tech_Positions              
                
  DEALLOCATE Tech_Positions              
              
 COMMIT TRANSACTION   
 BEGIN TRANSACTION  
 DELETE FROM TechnicianReferences WHERE FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID                    
  Declare @tmpFirstName VARCHAR(50)
  Declare @tmpLastName VARCHAR(50)
  Declare @tmpEmail NVARCHAR(255)
  Declare @tmpPhoneNumber VARCHAR(15)
  Declare TechnicianReferences CURSOR FOR Select FirstName, LastName, Email, PhoneNumber from @TechnicianReferences            
              
  OPEN TechnicianReferences            
              
  FETCH NEXT FROM TechnicianReferences INTO @tmpFirstName,@tmpLastName, @tmpEmail,@tmpPhoneNumber  
  WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0              
  BEGIN              
   INSERT INTO [dbo].[TechnicianReferences]
           ([FKTechnicianID]
           ,[FirstName]
           ,[LastName]
           ,[Email]
           ,[PhoneNumber])
     VALUES
           (@PKTechnicianID
           ,@tmpFirstName
           ,@tmpLastName
           ,@tmpEmail
           ,@tmpPhoneNumber)            
                 
   FETCH NEXT FROM TechnicianReferences INTO @tmpFirstName,@tmpLastName, @tmpEmail,@tmpPhoneNumber         
  END              
     
  CLOSE TechnicianReferences            
              
  DEALLOCATE TechnicianReferences            
            
 COMMIT TRANSACTION                  
end              
end 
GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[TechnicianBasicDetails]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
Create PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechnicianBasicDetails] (

	@PKTechnicianID int

)

AS



SET NOCOUNT ON



SELECT

	a.[PKTechnicianID],

	a.[FirstName],

	a.[LastName],

	a.[Email]	

FROM

	[dbo].[Technician] a 

WHERE

	a.[PKTechnicianID] = @PKTechnicianID 



GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[TechnicianCurrentStandings]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
-- exec [TechnicianCurrentStandings] 187    
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechnicianCurrentStandings] (@TechnicianID INT)    
AS    
 SET NOCOUNT ON    
 BEGIN    
      
      SELECT a.[PKTechnicianID],    
             a.[FirstName],    
             a.[LastName],    
             a.[UserName],    
             a.[Password],    
             a.[Email],    
			 --(select Rank from (select row_number() over (order by AVG(r.AverateRate) desc) as Rank,t.PkTechnicianID from technician t left join Ratings r on t.PKTechnicianID = r.FKTechnicianID        
			 -- group by t.PKTechnicianID,t.dtApprovaldate )as temp where  temp.PKTechnicianID= a.PKTechnicianID) as Rank, 
			 (SELECT RANK FROM (select row_number() over (order by isnull(t.Rating,0) desc, t.CreatedDate) as RANK,t.PKTechnicianID
			                      FROM Technician t WHERE t.isApproved = 1) AS tmp WHERE tmp.PKTechnicianID = a.PKTechnicianID) AS Rank,
             a.Rating,    
             a.[PhotoPath],    
             a.[isApproved],    
             a.FKLevelID,    
             l.[Description] AS [Level],    
             l.[LevelName] AS [LevelName],    
             (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Technician t WHERE t.isApproved = 1) AS TotalTechs,    
             10 AS YearlyRating    
      FROM   [dbo].[Technician] a    
             LEFT JOIN dbo.[Level] l    
                  ON  a.FKLevelID = l.PKLevelID    
      WHERE  a.PKTechnicianID = @TechnicianID    
             AND a.isApproved = 1    
               

--select * from (select row_number() over (order by AVG(r.AverateRate) desc) as Rank, cast(AVG(r.AverateRate) as decimal(3,2)) as AvgRating , t.PkTechnicianID from technician t left join Ratings r on t.PKTechnicianID = r.FKTechnicianID group by t.PKTechnicianID,t.dtApprovaldate) as Rank where PKTechnicianID = @TechnicianID

--SELECT count(s.Title) as NewProjects
-- FROM   [Show] s INNER JOIN Technician t ON s.isPublished = t.isApproved   
-- WHERE t.PKTechnicianID = @TechnicianID 
-- AND   
-- (s.PKShowID IN (SELECT FKShowID FROM ShowPositions sp WHERE sp.FKPositionID IN   
-- (SELECT tp.FKPositionID FROM TechnicianPositions tp WHERE tp.FKTechnicianID  = @TechnicianID) ))  
-- AND  
-- ((s.IsOnlyTechWithPassport = t.hasPassport or isnull(s.IsOnlyTechWithPassport,0) = 0 )And  
--  (s.IsOnlyShareRoomTech = t.ishotelshare or isnull(s.IsOnlyShareRoomTech,0) = 0)And  
--  (s.IsOnlyAccessTech = t.isAccess or isnull(s.IsOnlyAccessTech,0) = 0) And  
--  (s.IsAllAvailableTech = 0 or ((SELECT count(*) FROM Show cs WHERE cs.PKShowID <> s.PKShowID and cs.PKShowID IN (SELECT FKShowID FROM bid WHERE FKTechnicianID = @TechnicianID AND isApproved = 1)  
-- AND ((cs.StartDate BETWEEN s.StartDate AND s.EndDate) OR (cs.EndDate BETWEEN s.StartDate AND s.EndDate))) = 0))  
-- )
-- and s.bidEndDate > DATEADD(d,-1,getdate())  
-- and (select COUNT(*) FROM Bid b WHERE b.FKShowID = s.PKShowID and b.FKTechnicianID = @TechnicianID) = 0           
      
 END    
     
     
     
     
 --select FKLevelID from AccountLevel where FKAccountID = @PKAccountID    

GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[TechnicianDashBoard]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
  
  
-- Exec [TechnicianDashBoard] 187    
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechnicianDashBoard]    
(@PKTechnicianID INT)    
AS    
 SET NOCOUNT ON    
 SELECT CASE     
             WHEN (ISNULL([Country], '') = '') THEN [City]    
             ELSE [City] + ', ' + [Country]    
    END AS Location,    
    UserName,    
    [Password],    
            
        CASE WHEN(LEN(STUFF(    
                       (    
                           SELECT DISTINCT ', ' + CAST(p.PositionName AS VARCHAR)    
                           FROM   Technician t    
                                  INNER JOIN TechnicianPositions tp    
                                       ON  t.PKTechnicianID = tp.FKTechnicianID    
                                  INNER JOIN Position p    
                                       ON  p.PKPositionID = tp.FKPositionID    
                           WHERE  tp.FKTechnicianID = dbo.Technician.PKTechnicianID  and tp.StatusID = 1    
                                  FOR XML PATH('')),1,1,'')) > 55)    
                                  THEN    
        (    
           SUBSTRING(( SELECT STUFF(    
                       (    
                           SELECT DISTINCT ', ' + CAST(p.PositionName AS VARCHAR)    
                           FROM   Technician t    
                                  INNER JOIN TechnicianPositions tp    
                                       ON  t.PKTechnicianID = tp.FKTechnicianID    
                                  INNER JOIN Position p    
                                       ON  p.PKPositionID = tp.FKPositionID    
                           WHERE  tp.FKTechnicianID = dbo.Technician.PKTechnicianID  and tp.StatusID = 1    
                                  FOR XML PATH('')),1,1,'')    
        ),0,52))  +'...'    
        ELSE    
         (SELECT STUFF(    
                       (    
                           SELECT DISTINCT ', ' + CAST(p.PositionName AS VARCHAR)    
                           FROM   Technician t    
                                  INNER JOIN TechnicianPositions tp    
                                       ON  t.PKTechnicianID = tp.FKTechnicianID    
                                  INNER JOIN Position p    
                                       ON  p.PKPositionID = tp.FKPositionID    
                           WHERE  tp.FKTechnicianID = dbo.Technician.PKTechnicianID and tp.StatusID = 1    
                                  FOR XML PATH('')),1,1,''))    
        END    
        AS Positions,   
        (SELECT RANK FROM (select row_number() over (order by isnull(t.Rating,0) desc, t.CreatedDate) as RANK,t.PKTechnicianID  
                         FROM Technician t WHERE t.isApproved = 1 ) AS tmp WHERE tmp.PKTechnicianID = Technician.PKTechnicianID) AS Rank,   
    --     (select Rank from (select row_number() over (order by AVG(r.AverateRate) desc) as Rank,        
    --      t.PkTechnicianID from technician t left join Ratings r on t.PKTechnicianID = r.FKTechnicianID          
    --group by t.PKTechnicianID )as temp where  temp.PkTechnicianID=Technician.PKTechnicianID) as Rank,    
        Rating,Video    
 FROM   Technician    
 WHERE  PKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID    
     
     
     
 SELECT TOP 5 s.Title,    
        s.PKShowID,  
        s.IsAllAvailableTech,  
        CASE     
             WHEN (DATENAME(mm, [StartDate]) = DATENAME(mm, [EndDate])) THEN     
                  SUBSTRING(DATENAME(mm, [StartDate]), 0, 4) + ' ' + CAST(DATEPART(dd, [StartDate]) AS VARCHAR)     
                  + '-' + CAST(DATEPART(dd, [EndDate])AS VARCHAR) + ', ' +CAST(DATEPART(yy, [StartDate]) AS VARCHAR)     
             ELSE SUBSTRING(DATENAME(mm, [StartDate]), 0, 4) + ' ' + CAST(DATEPART(dd, [StartDate]) AS VARCHAR)     
                  + '-' + SUBSTRING(DATENAME(mm, [EndDate]), 0, 4) + ' ' +     
                  CAST(DATEPART(dd, [EndDate])AS VARCHAR) + ', ' +CAST(DATEPART(yy, [StartDate]) AS VARCHAR)     
        END AS ShowDates    
 FROM   [Show] s INNER JOIN Technician t ON s.isPublished = t.isApproved     
 WHERE t.PKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID   
 AND     
 (s.PKShowID IN (SELECT FKShowID FROM ShowPositions sp WHERE sp.FKPositionID IN     
 (SELECT tp.FKPositionID FROM TechnicianPositions tp WHERE tp.FKTechnicianID  = @PKTechnicianID and tp.StatusID = 1) ))    
 AND    
 ((s.IsOnlyTechWithPassport = t.hasPassport or isnull(s.IsOnlyTechWithPassport,0) = 0 )And    
  (s.IsOnlyShareRoomTech = t.ishotelshare or isnull(s.IsOnlyShareRoomTech,0) = 0)And    
  (s.IsOnlyAccessTech = t.isAccess or isnull(s.IsOnlyAccessTech,0) = 0) And    
  (s.IsAllAvailableTech = 0 or ((SELECT count(*) FROM Show cs WHERE cs.PKShowID <> s.PKShowID and cs.PKShowID IN (SELECT FKShowID FROM bid WHERE FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID AND isApproved = 1)    
 AND ((s.StartDate BETWEEN cs.StartDate AND cs.EndDate) OR (s.EndDate BETWEEN cs.StartDate AND cs.EndDate))) = 0))    
 )  
 and s.bidEndDate > DATEADD(d,-1,getdate())    
 and (select COUNT(*) FROM Bid b WHERE b.FKShowID = s.PKShowID and b.FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID ) = 0 ORDER BY s.PublishedDate DESC  
   
     
  
     
 --- for Calender view    
     
 SELECT s.[PKShowID],    
        s.[Title],    
        (    
            SELECT STUFF(    
                       (    
                           SELECT DISTINCT '##' + CAST(TravelDate AS VARCHAR)    
                           FROM   ShowTravelDate    
                           WHERE  FKShowID = s.PKShowID    
                                  FOR XML PATH('')    
                       ),    
                       1,    
                       2,    
                       ''    
                   )    
        ) AS TravelDates,    
        DATEPART(yyyy, [StartDate]) AS YEAR,    
        (    
            (DATEDIFF(d, [StartDate], [EndDate]) + 1) -(    
                SELECT COUNT(FKShowID)    
                FROM   ShowTravelDate std    
                WHERE  std.FKShowID = s.PKShowID    
            )    
        ) AS ShowDays,    
        (    
            SELECT COUNT(FKShowID)    
            FROM   ShowTravelDate std    
            WHERE  std.FKShowID = s.PKShowID    
        ) AS TravelDays,    
        (DATEDIFF(d, [StartDate], [EndDate]) + 1) AS TotalDays,    
        s.[FkCustomerID],    
        s.[DayRateValue],    
        s.[isPublished],    
        s.[StartDate],    
        s.[EndDate]    
 FROM   [Show] s    
        INNER JOIN Technician t    
             ON  s.isPublished = t.isApproved    
 WHERE  t.PKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID  
        AND CAST(DATEPART(yyyy, s.[StartDate]) AS int) = CAST(DATEPART(yyyy, GETDATE()) AS int)    
        AND CAST(DATEPART(mm, s.[StartDate]) AS int) = CAST(DATEPART(mm, GETDATE()) AS int)    
        AND (    
                (    
                    SELECT COUNT(b.PKBidID)    
                    FROM   Bid b    
                    WHERE  b.FKShowID = s.PKShowID    
                           AND b.FKTechnicianID = t.PKTechnicianID    
                           AND b.isApproved = 1    
                ) > 0    
            )    
   
GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[TechnicianDelete]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechnicianDelete] (      
 @PKTechnicianID int      
)      
AS      
      
SET NOCOUNT ON      
    
--if not exists( Select PKBidID from Bid where FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID)
--BEGIN 
delete from GroupMembers where FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID
DELETE FROM dbo.[Message] WHERE SenderID = @PKTechnicianID
DELETE FROM SentMessage WHERE RecieverID = @PKTechnicianID
DELETE FROM Bid WHERE FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID
DELETE FROM Ratings WHERE FKTechnicianID =@PKTechnicianID 
Delete From TechnicianPositions where FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID    
delete from technicianReferences where FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID  
delete from TechnicianDocs where FKTechnicianID =  @PKTechnicianID 
delete from TechShowSettings where FKTechnicianID =  @PKTechnicianID   
DELETE FROM [Technician]  WHERE [PKTechnicianID] = @PKTechnicianID 

select 1 as ReturnVal
--END
--ELSE
--BEGIN
--	select -1 as ReturnVal
--END

GO

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechnicianDocsInsert] (
	@FKTechnicianID int,
	@DocumentName nvarchar(255),
	@DocumentPath nvarchar(255),
	@DocumentType int
)
AS

SET NOCOUNT ON

INSERT INTO [TechnicianDocs] (
	[FKTechnicianID],
	[DocumentName],
	[DocumentPath],
	[DocumentType]
) VALUES (
	@FKTechnicianID,
	@DocumentName,
	@DocumentPath,
	@DocumentType
)

SELECT SCOPE_IDENTITY() AS PKDocumentID

GO

	@PKDocumentID int

	[FKTechnicianID],

	[DocumentPath],

	[PKDocumentID] = @PKDocumentID

---		Exec [TechnicianDocsSelectByFKTechnicianID] 122
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechnicianDocsSelectByFKTechnicianID] (
	@FKTechnicianID int
)
AS

SET NOCOUNT ON

SELECT
	[PKDocumentID],
	[FKTechnicianID],
	[DocumentName],
	[DocumentPath],
	isnull([DocumentType],0) as [DocumentType]
FROM
	[TechnicianDocs]
WHERE
	[FKTechnicianID] = @FKTechnicianID


	Select FirstName, LastName, Email from Technician where PKTechnicianID = @FKTechnicianID




GO

GO

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechnicianDocsUpdate] (
	@PKDocumentID int,
	@FKTechnicianID int,
	@DocumentName nvarchar(255),
	@DocumentPath nvarchar(255),
	@DocumentType int
)
AS

SET NOCOUNT ON

UPDATE
	[TechnicianDocs]
SET
	[FKTechnicianID] = @FKTechnicianID,
	[DocumentName] = @DocumentName,
	[DocumentPath] = @DocumentPath,
	[DocumentType] = @DocumentType
WHERE
	 [PKDocumentID] = @PKDocumentID

GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[TechnicianEvalByShow]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
-- =============================================        
-- Author:  Name        
-- Create date:         
-- Description:         
-- =============================================        
 -- exec TechnicianEvalByShow 159,13,3      
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechnicianEvalByShow]         
 -- Add the parameters for the stored procedure here        
 @FKTechnicianID int ,        
  @FKAccountID int,    
  @LevelID int        
AS        
BEGIN        
 -- SET NOCOUNT ON added to prevent extra result sets from        
 -- interfering with SELECT statements.        
 SET NOCOUNT ON;        
        
   if(@LevelID=3)    
   begin       
   select bid.FKShowID,Show.Title,ShowManagers.FKAccountID from Bid inner join Show         
  on Bid.FKShowID=Show.PKShowID  inner join ShowManagers on bid.FKShowID=ShowManagers.FKShowID      
  where Bid.FKTechnicianID=@FKTechnicianID and Bid.isApproved=1       
  and ShowManagers.FKAccountID = @FKAccountID       
 end    
     
 else    
 begin    
 select bid.FKShowID,Show.Title from Bid inner join Show         
 on Bid.FKShowID=Show.PKShowID      
 where Bid.FKTechnicianID=@FKTechnicianID and Bid.isApproved=1       
 end    
     
   select (firstname+' '+lastname)as FullName  from Technician where PKTechnicianID=@FKTechnicianID  
END 

GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[TechnicianInsert]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechnicianInsert] (            
 @Firstname varchar(50),            
 @LastName varchar(50),            
 @Address varchar(450),            
 @City varchar(50),            
 @State varchar(50),            
 @ZipCode varchar(50),            
 @Country varchar(50),            
 @Phone1 varchar(15),            
 @Phone2 varchar(15),            
 @Fax varchar(15),            
 @Mobile varchar(15),            
 @Email varchar(150),            
 @PhotoPath varchar(100),            
 @ResumePath varchar(100),            
 @hasPassport bit,            
 @isInterviewed bit,            
 @NearestAirport varchar(255),            
 @ishotelshare bit,            
 @isApproved bit,            
 @isAccess bit,            
 @dtApprovaldate datetime,            
 @ApprovedBy int,            
 @Rank int,            
 @Rating float(53),            
 @UserName varchar(100),            
 @Password varchar(100),            
 @OvationRef varchar(100),            
 @BirthDate datetime,            
 @TeckPositions nvarchar(max),  
 @SSN varchar(50) = null,
 @HomeAddress varchar(450) = null   ,   
 @Other VARCHAR(250),
 @LinkedInURL NVARCHAR(255),
 @ShirtSize NVARCHAR(2),
 @TechnicianReferences TechnicianReferences READONLY,
 @Gender bit,
 @NickName Nvarchar(50),
 @IsAcceptTerms bit,
 @NearestMajorCity nvarchar(50)
 	                        
)            
AS            
            
begin            
            
SET NOCOUNT ON            
if exists (select null from [Technician] where Email = @Email)            
begin            
select -2            
end            
else if exists (select null from [Technician] where UserName = @UserName)            
begin            
select -1            
end            
else            
begin            
            
INSERT INTO [Technician] (            
 [Firstname],            
 [LastName],            
 [Address],            
 [City],            
 [State],            
 [ZipCode],            
 [Country],            
 [Phone1],            
 [Phone2],            
 [Fax],            
 [Mobile],            
 [Email],            
 [PhotoPath],            
 [ResumePath],            
 [hasPassport],            
 [isInterviewed],            
 [NearestAirport],            
 [ishotelshare],            
 [isApproved],            
 [isAccess],            
 [dtApprovaldate],            
 [ApprovedBy],            
 [Rank],            
 [Rating],            
 [UserName],            
 [Password],            
 [OvationRef],            
 [BirthDate],            
 FKLevelID,  
 [SSN],
 HomeAddress ,
 Other ,
 LinkedInURL,
 ShirtSize   ,
 Gender,
 NickName    ,
 IsAcceptTerms  ,
 NearestMajorCity           
) VALUES (            
 @Firstname,            
 @LastName,            
 @Address,            
 @City,            
 @State,            
 @ZipCode,            
 @Country,            
 @Phone1,            
 @Phone2,            
 @Fax,            
 @Mobile,            
 @Email,            
 @PhotoPath,            
 @ResumePath,            
 @hasPassport,            
 @isInterviewed,            
 @NearestAirport,            
 @ishotelshare,            
 @isApproved,            
 @isAccess,            
 @dtApprovaldate,            
 @ApprovedBy,            
 @Rank,            
 @Rating,            
 @UserName,            
 @Password,            
 @OvationRef,            
 @BirthDate,            
 2,  
 @SSN,
 @HomeAddress    ,
 @Other  ,
 @LinkedInURL ,
 @ShirtSize  ,
 @Gender,
 @NickName  ,
 @IsAcceptTerms ,
 @NearestMajorCity      
)            
            
            
declare @PKTechnicianID int            
set @PKTechnicianID = (SELECT SCOPE_IDENTITY() )            
select @PKTechnicianID 



if(isnull(@ResumePath,'') <>'')
  begin
  INSERT INTO [dbo].[TechnicianDocs]
        ([FKTechnicianID]
        ,[DocumentName]
        ,[DocumentPath]
        ,[DocumentType])
  values( @PKTechnicianID, @ResumePath ,@ResumePath,4)
  end
             
--declare @T Table (val int,TechnicianID int)            
--insert into @T            
--select cast(val as int),@PKTechnicianID from dbo.fnParseArray(@TeckPositions, ',')             
--Insert into TechnicianPositions (FKPositionID,FKTechnicianID,StatusID)             
--select cast(val as int),@PKTechnicianID,0 from dbo.fnParseArray(@TeckPositions, ',')             
insert into TechnicianPositions(FKTechnicianID, FKPositionID,StatusID)          
select @PKTechnicianID ,cast(val as int), 0 from dbo.fnParseArray(@TeckPositions, ',')         
        
--case when @isApproved = 1 then 1 else 0 end          
--   values ( @PKTechnicianID, @FKPositionID)            
BEGIN TRANSACTION                      
  Declare @tmpFirstName VARCHAR(50)
  Declare @tmpLastName VARCHAR(50)
  Declare @tmpEmail NVARCHAR(255)
  Declare @tmpPhoneNumber VARCHAR(15)
  Declare TechnicianReferences CURSOR FOR Select FirstName, LastName, Email, PhoneNumber from @TechnicianReferences            
              
  OPEN TechnicianReferences            
              
  FETCH NEXT FROM TechnicianReferences INTO @tmpFirstName,@tmpLastName, @tmpEmail,@tmpPhoneNumber  
  WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0              
  BEGIN              
   INSERT INTO [dbo].[TechnicianReferences]
           ([FKTechnicianID]
           ,[FirstName]
           ,[LastName]
           ,[Email]
           ,[PhoneNumber])
     VALUES
           (@PKTechnicianID
           ,@tmpFirstName
           ,@tmpLastName
           ,@tmpEmail
           ,@tmpPhoneNumber)            
                 
   FETCH NEXT FROM TechnicianReferences INTO @tmpFirstName,@tmpLastName, @tmpEmail,@tmpPhoneNumber         
  END              
     
  CLOSE TechnicianReferences            
              
  DEALLOCATE TechnicianReferences            
            
 COMMIT TRANSACTION               
end            
end 
GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[TechnicianLogin]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
-- exec [TechnicianLogin] 'technician','dGVjaG5pY2lhbg==-hBkHMQki1Rg='    
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechnicianLogin] (@UserName VARCHAR(100), @Password NVARCHAR(100))
AS
	SET NOCOUNT ON    
	BEGIN
		IF EXISTS (
		       SELECT NULL
		       FROM   Technician a
		       WHERE  a.[UserName] = @UserName
		              AND a.[Password] = @Password
		              AND a.isApproved = 0
		   )
		BEGIN
		    SELECT -2 AS DisApproved
		END
		ELSE
		BEGIN

		
		    SELECT a.[PKTechnicianID],
		           a.SSN, 
				   (select count(*) from Bid where FKTechnicianID = [PKTechnicianID] and IsApproved = 1) as Notify,
				  isnull(a.IsSecondaryCompleted,0) as IsSecondaryCompleted,
		           --a.[FirstName],
		           --a.[LastName],
		           --a.[UserName],
		           --a.[Password],
		           --a.[Email],
		           --          (select Rank from (select row_number() over (order by AVG(r.AverateRate) desc) as Rank,
		           --t.PkTechnicianID
		           --from technician t left join Ratings r on t.PKTechnicianID = r.FKTechnicianID
		           --group by t.PKTechnicianID,t.dtApprovaldate )as temp where  temp.PKTechnicianID=a.PKTechnicianID) as Rank ,
		           --(SELECT count(m.PKMessageID) FROM  Message AS m INNER JOIN SentMessage AS sm ON m.PKMessageID = sm.FKMessageID where sm.IsDeleted = 0 and sm.IsRead = 0 and sm.RecieverID = a.[PKTechnicianID])
		           --as NewMessages,
		           --         a.Rating,
		           --         a.[PhotoPath],  
		           
		           --         a.[isApproved],    
		           a.FKLevelID 
		           --l.[Description] AS [Level],
		           --l.[LevelName] AS [LevelName]
		    FROM   [dbo].[Technician] a
		           LEFT JOIN dbo.[Level] l
		                ON  a.FKLevelID = l.PKLevelID
		    WHERE  a.[UserName] = @UserName
		           AND a.[Password] = @Password
		           AND a.isApproved = 1
		END
	END 
	
	
	
	
	--select FKLevelID from AccountLevel where FKAccountID = @PKAccountID    
GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[TechnicianMessageListing]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO



--- Exec TechnicianMessageListing 122
CREATE Procedure [dbo].[TechnicianMessageListing]
(
	@TechnicianID int 
)
as

begin
--Select *, (select FirstName from Account where FKLevelID = LevelID and PKAccountID = SenderID) as SenderName 
--from Message where PkMessageID in (Select FKMessageID from SentMessage where RecieverID = @TechnicianID) order by MessageDate Desc


SELECT m.PKMessageID, m.MessageDate, m.Description, m.SenderID, m.LevelID, m.IsReply, m.ParentID, sm.IsRead, sm.RecieverID, sm.IsDeleted,(select FirstName from Account where FKLevelID = LevelID and PKAccountID = m.SenderID) as SenderName 
FROM  Message AS m INNER JOIN SentMessage AS sm ON m.PKMessageID = sm.FKMessageID where sm.IsDeleted = 0 and sm.RecieverID = @TechnicianID  order by MessageDate Desc

update SentMessage set IsRead = 1 where IsDeleted = 0 and RecieverID = @TechnicianID
end

GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[TechnicianMultipleDelete]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

-- exec [TechnicianMultipleDelete] '435,432'
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechnicianMultipleDelete] (      

 @TechnicianIDs nvarchar(max)      

)      

AS      

      

SET NOCOUNT ON      





delete from GroupMembers where FKTechnicianID in (select cast(isnull(val,0) as int) from fnParseArray(@TechnicianIDs,','))

DELETE FROM dbo.[Message] WHERE SenderID in (select cast(isnull(val,0) as int) from fnParseArray(@TechnicianIDs,','))

DELETE FROM SentMessage WHERE RecieverID in (select cast(isnull(val,0) as int) from fnParseArray(@TechnicianIDs,','))

DELETE FROM Bid WHERE FKTechnicianID in (select cast(isnull(val,0) as int) from fnParseArray(@TechnicianIDs,','))

DELETE FROM Ratings WHERE FKTechnicianID in (select cast(isnull(val,0) as int) from fnParseArray(@TechnicianIDs,','))

Delete From TechnicianPositions where FKTechnicianID in (select cast(isnull(val,0) as int) from fnParseArray(@TechnicianIDs,',')) 

delete from technicianReferences where FKTechnicianID in (select cast(isnull(val,0) as int) from fnParseArray(@TechnicianIDs,','))   

delete from TechnicianDocs where FKTechnicianID in (select cast(isnull(val,0) as int) from fnParseArray(@TechnicianIDs,',')) 

delete from TechShowSettings where FKTechnicianID in (select cast(isnull(val,0) as int) from fnParseArray(@TechnicianIDs,','))  


 delete from DiscussionPost where FKDiscussionID in 
 (select PKDiscussionID from Discussion where FKTechnicianID in (select CAST(isnull(val,0) as int) from fnParseArray(@TechnicianIDs,',')))
 delete from Discussion where FKTechnicianID in (select cast(isnull(val,0) as int) from fnParseArray(@TechnicianIDs,','))  



DELETE FROM [Technician]  WHERE [PKTechnicianID] in (select cast(isnull(val,0) as int) from fnParseArray(@TechnicianIDs,','))



select 1 as ReturnVal

GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[TechnicianMultipleUpdateAsApproved]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechnicianMultipleUpdateAsApproved](  

 @TechnicianIDs nvarchar(max)

)  

AS  

  

begin  

  

SET NOCOUNT ON 
UPDATE
[Technician]  
SET 
IsTable = 0,
isapproved = 1
WHERE 
[PKTechnicianID] in (select cast(isnull(val,0) as int) from fnParseArray(@TechnicianIDs,',')) 


update technicianPositions set StatusID = 1 where  FKTechnicianID in (select cast(isnull(val,0) as int) from fnParseArray(@TechnicianIDs,','))

end



GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[TechnicianMultipleUpdateTabled]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechnicianMultipleUpdateTabled](  

 @TechnicianIDs Nvarchar(Max),
 @IsTable bit 
)  

AS  

  

begin  

  

SET NOCOUNT ON 
UPDATE
[Technician]  
SET 
IsTable = @IsTable
WHERE 
[PKTechnicianID] in (select cast(isnull(val,0) as int) from fnParseArray(@TechnicianIDs,',')) 


--update technicianPositions set StatusID = 1 where  FKTechnicianID =@PKTechnicianID

end



GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[TechnicianPendingPositionsSelectAll]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechnicianPendingPositionsSelectAll](        
 @PageIndex INT,        
 @RecordsPerPage INT,        
 @SortBy nvarchar(50),        
 @OrderBy nvarchar(50),        
 @SearchText nvarchar(50),  
 @Status int    
) AS          

SET NOCOUNT ON          

 Declare @startRowIndex INT;        
 Declare @endRowIndex INT;        
 declare @Str nvarchar(max)        

 set @endRowIndex = (@PageIndex * @RecordsPerPage);        
 set @startRowIndex = (@endRowIndex - @RecordsPerPage) + 1;        
 set @Str = 'select * from (    
 select     

 ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY '+@SortBy+' '+@OrderBy+') as Row,tmpTable.* from(         
  SELECT           
[PKTechnicianID],          
 [Firstname],          
 [CreatedDate],
 [LastName],    
 [Email],               
 (SELECT  STUFF((          
 select DISTINCT '', ''+ CAST(p.PositionName as varchar) from Technician t         
 inner join TechnicianPositions tp ON t.PKTechnicianID=tp.FKTechnicianID inner join Position p        
 on p.PKPositionID=tp.FKPositionID  where tp.FKTechnicianID = dbo.Technician.PKTechnicianID  and StatusID = 0       
 FOR XML PATH('''')),1,1,'''')) as Positions,             
 FKLevelID,         
 (select [Description] from dbo.[Level] where PKLevelID = FKLevelID) as [Level]           
 FROM dbo.Technician     
 where [Firstname] like ''%'' + @SearchText+''%'' and (IsApproved = @Status OR @Status = -2)  and IsNull(IsTable,0) = 0 ) as tmpTable          
 WHERE tmpTable.Positions is not null) as x WHERE Row between           
 @startRowIndex and @endRowIndex;'          

 print(@STR)        

 -- Table 1: Content record        

 EXEC sp_executesql @STR, N' @endRowIndex INT = NULL,        

        @startRowIndex INT = NULL,        
        @SortBy nvarchar(50)=null,        
        @OrderBy nvarchar(50)=null,        
        @SearchText nvarchar(50)=null,   
        @Status int',     
        @endRowIndex,        
        @startRowIndex,        
        @SortBy,        
        @OrderBy,        
        @SearchText,  
        @Status;    


SELECT COUNT(distinct Email) FROM [dbo].[Technician]    
inner join TechnicianPositions tp on tp.FKTechnicianID = PKTechnicianID and tp.StatusID = 0 and (isApproved = @Status OR @Status = -2)         
where [Firstname] like '%' + @SearchText +'%' and IsNull(IsTable,0) = 0 

GO

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechnicianPositionsInsert] (
	@FKTechnicianID int,
	@FKPositionID int,
	@RequestDescription varchar(500),
	@StatusID int,
	@ApprovedBy int,
	@RejectedBy bit,
	@Reason varchar(500)
)
AS

SET NOCOUNT ON

INSERT INTO [TechnicianPositions] (
	[FKTechnicianID],
	[FKPositionID],
	[RequestDescription],
	[StatusID],
	[ApprovedBy],
	[RejectedBy],
	[Reason]
) VALUES (
	@FKTechnicianID,
	@FKPositionID,
	@RequestDescription,
	@StatusID,
	@ApprovedBy,
	@RejectedBy,
	@Reason
)

SELECT SCOPE_IDENTITY() AS PKTechPositionID


GO

	[TechnicianPositions]
WHERE
	[PKTechPositionID] = @PKTechPositionID

/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[TechnicianPositionsSelectByFKTechnicianID]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
--exec TechnicianPositionsSelectByFKTechnicianID 13,-1
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechnicianPositionsSelectByFKTechnicianID] (          
 @FKTechnicianID int,  
 @StatusID int          
)          
AS          
          
SET NOCOUNT ON          
if @StatusID >= 0
BEGIN          
	SELECT          
	 tp.[PKTechPositionID],          
	 tp.[FKPositionID] as PositionID,  
	 p.PositionName  
	  
	FROM          
	 [TechnicianPositions] tp  
	 inner join Position p on p.PKPositionID = tp.FKPositionID          
	WHERE          
	 tp.[FKTechnicianID] = @FKTechnicianID   
	 AND tp.StatusID = @StatusID
 END
 ELSE
 BEGIN
	select distinct 
	0 as PKTechPositionID,
	p.PKPositionID as PositionID,
	p.PositionName
	from Position p
	where p.PKPositionID 
	not in(select tp.FKPositionID from TechnicianPositions tp where tp.FKTechnicianID = @FKTechnicianID)


 END

GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[TechnicianPositionsUpdate]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechnicianPositionsUpdate] (
	@PKTechPositionID int,
	@FKTechnicianID int,
	@FKPositionID int,
	@RequestDescription varchar(500),
	@StatusID int,
	@ApprovedBy int,
	@RejectedBy bit,
	@Reason varchar(500)
)
AS

SET NOCOUNT ON

UPDATE
	[TechnicianPositions]
SET
	[FKTechnicianID] = @FKTechnicianID,
	[FKPositionID] = @FKPositionID,
	[RequestDescription] = @RequestDescription,
	[StatusID] = @StatusID,
	[ApprovedBy] = @ApprovedBy,
	[RejectedBy] = @RejectedBy,
	[Reason] = @Reason
WHERE
	 [PKTechPositionID] = @PKTechPositionID


GO

/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[TechnicianReferenceUpdate]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON

SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
