/************************************************************
 * Code formatted by SoftTree SQL Assistant © v6.2.107
 * Time: 04/15/2013 15:22:19
 ************************************************************/



CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechnicianReferenceUpdate](
    @TechnicianID           INT,
    @TechnicianReferences     TechnicianReferences READONLY
)
AS

	BEGIN TRANSACTION  
	DELETE 	FROM   TechnicianReferences	WHERE  FKTechnicianID = @TechnicianID
	
	DECLARE @tmpFirstName VARCHAR(50)
	DECLARE @tmpLastName VARCHAR(50)
	DECLARE @tmpEmail NVARCHAR(255)
	DECLARE @tmpPhoneNumber VARCHAR(15)
	DECLARE TechnicianReferences CURSOR  
	FOR
	    SELECT FirstName,
	           LastName,
	           Email,
	           PhoneNumber
	    FROM   @TechnicianReferences 
	
	OPEN TechnicianReferences 
	
	FETCH NEXT FROM TechnicianReferences INTO @tmpFirstName,@tmpLastName, @tmpEmail,
	@tmpPhoneNumber  
	WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
	BEGIN
	    INSERT INTO [dbo].[TechnicianReferences]
	      (
	        [FKTechnicianID],
	        [FirstName],
	        [LastName],
	        [Email],
	        [PhoneNumber]
	      )
	    VALUES
	      (
	        @TechnicianID,
	        @tmpFirstName,
	        @tmpLastName,
	        @tmpEmail,
	        @tmpPhoneNumber
	      ) 
	    
	    FETCH NEXT FROM TechnicianReferences INTO @tmpFirstName,@tmpLastName, @tmpEmail,
	    @tmpPhoneNumber
	END 
	
	CLOSE TechnicianReferences 
	
	DEALLOCATE TechnicianReferences 
	
	COMMIT TRANSACTION


GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[TechnicianResetIDUpdate]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
/************************************************************  
 * Code formatted by SoftTree SQL Assistant © v4.5.9  
 * Time: 12/07/2012 10:36:51 AM  
 ************************************************************/  
  
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechnicianResetIDUpdate](  
    @ResetID         UNIQUEIDENTIFIER,  
    @PKTechnicianID  INT,  
    @Password        NVARCHAR(150)  
)  
AS  
BEGIN  
 IF (@Password IS NULL OR @Password = '')  
 BEGIN  
     SET @Password = (  
             SELECT TOP 1 PASSWORD  
             FROM   Technician t  
             WHERE  t.PKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID  
         )  
 END  
   
 UPDATE Technician  
 SET    ResetID = @ResetID,  
        [Password] = @Password  
 WHERE  PKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID  
END  
  
GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[TechnicianScoreByShow]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
-- =============================================        



-- Author:  Name        



-- Create date:         



-- Description:         



-- =============================================   



--  exec [TechnicianScoreByShow]     60, 122



CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechnicianScoreByShow] 



-- Add the parameters for the stored procedure here



	@ShowID INT ,



	@TechnicianID INT



AS



BEGIN



	-- SET NOCOUNT ON added to prevent extra result sets from



	-- interfering with SELECT statements.        



	SET NOCOUNT ON; 



	



	-- Insert statements for procedure here        



	SELECT Title



	FROM   Show



	WHERE  PKShowID = @ShowID        



	



	



	SELECT (Firstname + ' ' + LastName)NAME



	FROM   Technician



	WHERE  PKTechnicianID = @TechnicianID        



	



	--SELECT RANK,



	--       AvgRating,



	--       temp.PKTechnicianID



	--FROM   (



	--           SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY AVG(r.AverateRate) DESC) AS 



	--                  RANK,



	--                  CAST(AVG(r.AverateRate) AS FLOAT) AS AvgRating,



	--                  t.PkTechnicianID



	--           FROM   technician t



	--                  LEFT JOIN Ratings r



	--                       ON  t.PKTechnicianID = r.FKTechnicianID



	--           GROUP BY



	--                  t.PKTechnicianID



	--       ) AS temp



	--WHERE  temp.PKTechnicianID = @TechnicianID     



	



	SELECT cast(isnull(Rating,0) AS DECIMAL(10,2)) AS AvgRating,PKTechnicianID,



	 (SELECT RANK FROM (select row_number() over (order by isnull(t.Rating,0) desc, t.CreatedDate) as RANK,t.PKTechnicianID



			                      FROM Technician t WHERE t.isApproved = 1 ) AS tmp WHERE tmp.PKTechnicianID = Technician.PKTechnicianID) AS RANK



	FROM Technician    WHERE  PKTechnicianID = @TechnicianID



	



	SELECT (COUNT(*)) AS TotalShows



	FROM   Bid



	WHERE  FKTechnicianID     = @TechnicianID



	       AND isApproved     = 1 



	         



END 

GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[TechnicianSelect]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

--- Exec [TechnicianSelect] 122
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechnicianSelect] (                
 @PKTechnicianID int                
)                
AS                
                
SET NOCOUNT ON                
                
SELECT                
 [PKTechnicianID],                
 [Firstname],                
 [LastName],                
 [Address],                
 [City],                
 [State],                
 [ZipCode],                
 [Country],                
 [Phone1],                
 [Phone2],                
 [Fax],                
 [Mobile],                
 [Email],                
 [PhotoPath],                
 [ResumePath],                
 [hasPassport],                
 [isInterviewed],                
 [NearestAirport],                
 [ishotelshare],                
 [isApproved],                
 [isAccess],                
 [dtApprovaldate],                
 [ApprovedBy],                
 [Rank],                
 [Rating],                
 [UserName],                
 [Password],                
 [OvationRef],                
 [BirthDate],              
 [IsAcceptTerms],      
 [IsEmailSent],    
 [Video],  
 [SSN],
 [HomeAddress]   ,
  Other ,
 [LinkedInURL],
 [ShirtSize] ,
 NickName   ,
 Gender ,
 [IsTable] ,
 [NearestMajorCity]   ,
 [PassportImage],
 [DriverLicence],
 [SSC]
  
FROM                
 [Technician]                
WHERE                
 [PKTechnicianID] = @PKTechnicianID                
                 
select PKPositionID, PositionName from Position                 
where PKPositionID in (select FKPositionID from TechnicianPositions where FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID and StatusID = 1)           
select PKPositionID, PositionName from Position                 
where PKPositionID in (select FKPositionID from TechnicianPositions where FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID and (StatusID = 0 OR StatusID = 1 ) ) 


SELECT * FROM TechnicianReferences tr WHERE tr.FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID
GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[TechnicianSelectAll]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
--SELECT * FROM Technician t WHERE t.LastName LIKE '%Zar%'
--	exec [TechnicianSelectAll]  1,200,'Rating','desc','0.00',-2,'Rating'
--  exec [TechnicianSelectAll]  1,200,'FirstName','asc','',-2,'All'
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechnicianSelectAll](      
 @PageIndex INT,      
 @RecordsPerPage INT,      
 @SortBy nvarchar(50),      
 @OrderBy nvarchar(50),      
 @SearchText nvarchar(50),    
 @Status int     ,
 @SearchColumn nvarchar(50) 
) AS        
        
SET NOCOUNT ON        
 Declare @startRowIndex INT;      
 Declare @endRowIndex INT;      
 declare @Str nvarchar(max)      
 set @endRowIndex = (@PageIndex * @RecordsPerPage);      
 set @startRowIndex = (@endRowIndex - @RecordsPerPage) + 1;      
  
  declare @SearchCondition nvarchar(max)

  IF(isnull(@SearchColumn,'sortBy') = 'sortBy')
   set @SearchColumn = 'FirstName'

  if(@SearchColumn = 'All')
  begin
  set @SearchCondition = 'FirstName like ''%'+ @SearchText+ '%'' or LastName like ''%'+ @SearchText+ '%'' or Location  like ''%'+ @SearchText+ '%'' or AvgBid  like ''%'+ @SearchText+ '%'' or Positions  like ''%'+ @SearchText+ '%'' or Rank  like ''%'+ @SearchText+ '%'' or Rating  like ''%'+ @SearchText+ '%'''
  end
  else
  begin
  set @SearchCondition = 'isnull(cast('+@SearchColumn + ' as varchar),'''') like ''%' +@SearchText+ '%'''
  end
  print(@SearchCondition)

set @Str = '
 select * from (select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY '+@SortBy+' '+@OrderBy+') as Row,tmpTable.* from(   
 select tmpTechs.* from( SELECT         
 [PKTechnicianID],        
 [Firstname],        
 [LastName],        
 [Address],        
 [City],       
 case when(ISNULL([Country],'''') = '''')    
 then    
 [City]     
 else    
 [City] + '', ''+ [Country]    
 end as Location,     
cast(ISNULL((select AVG(b.BidAmount) from bid b where b.fktechnicianID = PKTechnicianID),0) as decimal(10,2)) as AvgBid,    
 [State],        
 [ZipCode],        
 [Country],        
 [Phone1],        
 [Phone2],        
 [Fax],     
 --row_number() over (order by isnull(Rating,0) desc, CreatedDate) as Rank,    
 ISNULL((SELECT RANK FROM (select row_number() over (order by isnull(t.Rating,0) desc, t.CreatedDate) as RANK,t.PKTechnicianID
 FROM Technician t WHERE t.isApproved = 1 ) AS tmp WHERE tmp.PKTechnicianID = Technician.PKTechnicianID),0) AS Rank,
 [Mobile],        
 [Email],        
 [PhotoPath],        
 [ResumePath],        
 [hasPassport],        
 [isInterviewed],        
 [NearestAirport],        
 [ishotelshare],        
 [isApproved],        
 [isAccess],        
 [dtApprovaldate],        
 [ApprovedBy],        
 cast([Rating] as decimal(10,2)) as [Rating],        
 [UserName],        
 [Password],        
 [OvationRef],        
 [BirthDate],      
   
 [LinkedInURL],
 [ShirtSize] ,     
 isnull( (SELECT  STUFF((        
 select '', ''+ CAST(p.PositionName as varchar) from Technician t       
 inner join TechnicianPositions tp ON t.PKTechnicianID=tp.FKTechnicianID inner join Position p      
 on p.PKPositionID=tp.FKPositionID  where tp.FKTechnicianID = dbo.Technician.PKTechnicianID  and StatusID = 1 order by PositionName    
 FOR XML PATH('''')),1,1,'''')) ,'''')as Positions,    
 FKLevelID,       
 (select [Description] from dbo.[Level] where PKLevelID = FKLevelID) as [Level]         
 FROM dbo.Technician) as tmpTechs where 
 ('+@SearchCondition+') 
 and (IsApproved = @Status or @Status = -2)) as tmpTable ) as tmp       
 WHERE Row between         
 @startRowIndex and @endRowIndex;'        
--('+@SearchColumn+' like ''%'' + @SearchText+''%'')      Search Condition
 print(@STR)      
       
       
 -- Table 1: Content record      
 EXEC sp_executesql @STR, N' @endRowIndex INT = NULL,      
        @startRowIndex INT = NULL,      
        @SortBy nvarchar(50)=null,      
        @OrderBy nvarchar(50)=null,      
        @SearchText nvarchar(50)=null,    
        @Status int,
		@SearchCondition nvarchar(max),
        @SearchColumn nvarchar(50)=null',      
        @endRowIndex,      
        @startRowIndex,      
        @SortBy,      
        @OrderBy,      
        @SearchText,    
        @Status,
		@SearchCondition,
        @SearchColumn;      
       
--SELECT COUNT(*) FROM [dbo].[Technician]        
--where ([Firstname] like '%' + @SearchText+'%' OR lastname like '%' + @SearchText+'%') and (IsApproved = @Status or @Status = -2) 
DECLARE @CountStr NVARCHAR(MAX)
--SET @CountStr = 'SELECT COUNT(*) FROM [dbo].[Technician] where ('+@SearchColumn+' like ''%' + @SearchText+ '%'') and (IsApproved = @Status or @Status = -2)'
SET @CountStr = 'select count(*) from (select tmpTable.* from(   
 select tmpTechs.* from( SELECT 
 [Firstname],        
 [LastName],
 [isApproved],    
 case when(ISNULL([Country],'''') = '''')    
 then    
 [City]     
 else    
 [City] + '', ''+ [Country]    
 end as Location,   
 cast([Rating] as decimal(10,2)) as [Rating],  
 ISNULL((select AVG(b.BidAmount) from bid b where b.fktechnicianID = PKTechnicianID),0) as AvgBid,        
 ISNULL((SELECT RANK FROM (select row_number() over (order by isnull(t.Rating,0) desc, t.CreatedDate) as RANK,t.PKTechnicianID
 FROM Technician t WHERE t.isApproved = 1 ) AS tmp WHERE tmp.PKTechnicianID = Technician.PKTechnicianID),0) AS Rank, 

 isnull( (SELECT  STUFF((        
 select '', ''+ CAST(p.PositionName as varchar) from Technician t       
 inner join TechnicianPositions tp ON t.PKTechnicianID=tp.FKTechnicianID inner join Position p      
 on p.PKPositionID=tp.FKPositionID  where tp.FKTechnicianID = dbo.Technician.PKTechnicianID  and StatusID = 1 order by PositionName    
 FOR XML PATH('''')),1,1,'''')) ,'''')as Positions     
 FROM dbo.Technician) as tmpTechs where
 ('+@SearchCondition+')
 and (IsApproved = @Status or @Status = -2)) as tmpTable ) as tmp' 

  --  ('+@SearchColumn+' like ''%'' + @SearchText+''%'')     Search Condition
 
 
 PRINT(@CountStr)
EXEC sp_executesql @CountStr, N'     
        @SearchText nvarchar(50)=null,
        @Status int,
		@SearchCondition nvarchar(max),
        @SearchColumn nvarchar(50)=null', 
        @SearchText,
        @Status,
		@SearchCondition,
        @SearchColumn;



GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[TechnicianSelectAllByPM]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
--		exec [TechnicianSelectAllByPM]  1,10,'Firstname','Asc','',13        
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechnicianSelectAllByPM](        
 @PageIndex INT,        
 @RecordsPerPage INT,        
 @SortBy nvarchar(50),        
 @OrderBy nvarchar(50),        
 @SearchText nvarchar(50),      
 @PMID int        
) AS          
          
SET NOCOUNT ON          
 Declare @startRowIndex INT;        
 Declare @endRowIndex INT;        
 declare @Str nvarchar(max)        
 set @endRowIndex = (@PageIndex * @RecordsPerPage);        
 set @startRowIndex = (@endRowIndex - @RecordsPerPage) + 1;        
   
set @Str = 'select * from (select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY '+@SortBy+' '+@OrderBy+') as Row, tmpTable.* from( 
 SELECT       
 [PKTechnicianID],      
 [Firstname],      
 [LastName],      
 [Address],      
 [City],     
 case when(  ISNULL([Country],'''') = '''')  
 then  
 [City]   
 else  
 [City] + '', ''+ [Country]  
 end as Location,   
 ISNULL((select AVG(b.BidAmount) from bid b where b.fktechnicianID = PKTechnicianID),0) as AvgBid,  
 [State],      
 [ZipCode],      
 [Country],      
 [Phone1],      
 [Phone2],      
 [Fax],   
 (SELECT RANK FROM (select row_number() over (order by isnull(t.Rating,0) desc, t.CreatedDate) as RANK,t.PKTechnicianID
 FROM Technician t WHERE t.isApproved = 1 ) AS tmp WHERE tmp.PKTechnicianID = Technician.PKTechnicianID) AS Rank,   
 [Mobile],      
 [Email],      
 [PhotoPath],      
 [ResumePath],      
 [hasPassport],      
 [isInterviewed],      
 [NearestAirport],      
 [ishotelshare],      
 [isApproved],      
 [isAccess],      
 [dtApprovaldate],      
 [ApprovedBy],    
 [Other],  
 [Rating],      
 [UserName],      
 [Password],      
 [OvationRef],      
 [BirthDate],    
     
 (SELECT  STUFF((      
 select DISTINCT '', ''+ CAST(p.PositionName as varchar) from Technician t     
 inner join TechnicianPositions tp ON t.PKTechnicianID=tp.FKTechnicianID inner join Position p    
 on p.PKPositionID=tp.FKPositionID  where tp.FKTechnicianID = dbo.Technician.PKTechnicianID  and StatusID = 1   
 FOR XML PATH('''')),1,1,'''')) as Positions,    
     
 FKLevelID,     
 (select [Description] from dbo.[Level] where PKLevelID = FKLevelID) as [Level]       
 FROM dbo.Technician where   
 PKTechnicianID in  
 (  
 select   
 distinct t2.PKTechnicianID  
  from Technician t2  
   inner join Bid b  on b.FKTechnicianID = t2.PKTechnicianID  
   inner join Show s on s.PKShowID = b.FKShowID  
   inner join ShowManagers sm on sm.FKShowID = s.PKShowID  
  where sm.FKAccountID = @PMID and b.isApproved = 1   
 )  
 AND ([Firstname] like ''%'' + @SearchText+''%'' OR [UserName] like ''%'' + @SearchText+''%'') and IsApproved = 1 ) as tmpTable ) as tmp     
 WHERE Row between       
 @startRowIndex and @endRowIndex;'  
 print(@STR)        
         
         
 -- Table 1: Content record        
 EXEC sp_executesql @STR, N' @endRowIndex INT = NULL,        
        @startRowIndex INT = NULL,        
        @SortBy nvarchar(50)=null,        
        @OrderBy nvarchar(50)=null,        
        @SearchText nvarchar(50)=null,  
        @PMID int = 0',      
        @endRowIndex,        
        @startRowIndex,        
        @SortBy,        
        @OrderBy,        
        @SearchText,  
        @PMID   
         
SELECT COUNT(distinct t.Email)   
 FROM [dbo].[Technician] t  
inner join Bid b  on b.FKTechnicianID = t.PKTechnicianID  
 inner join Show s on s.PKShowID = b.FKShowID  
 inner join ShowManagers sm on sm.FKShowID = s.PKShowID  
where sm.FKAccountID = @PMID        
AND (t.Firstname like '%' + @SearchText+'%' OR t.UserName like '%' + @SearchText+'%') and t.isApproved = 1
and b.isApproved = 1

GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[TechnicianSelectAllForMessage]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

--	exec [TechnicianSelectAllForMessage]  1,10,'Rank','Desc','',''
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechnicianSelectAllForMessage](      
 @PageIndex INT,      
 @RecordsPerPage INT,      
 @SortBy nvarchar(50),      
 @OrderBy nvarchar(50),      
 @SearchText nvarchar(50),
 @SelectedTechs NVARCHAR(MAX)
) AS        
        
SET NOCOUNT ON        
 Declare @startRowIndex INT;      
 Declare @endRowIndex INT;      
 declare @Str nvarchar(max)      
 set @endRowIndex = (@PageIndex * @RecordsPerPage);      
 set @startRowIndex = (@endRowIndex - @RecordsPerPage) + 1;      
  
  
set @Str = '
 select * from (select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY '+@SortBy+' '+@OrderBy+') as Row,tmpTable.* from(   
 SELECT         
 [PKTechnicianID],        
 [Firstname],        
 [LastName],
 ISNULL((SELECT RANK FROM (select row_number() over (order by isnull(t.Rating,0) desc, t.CreatedDate) as RANK,t.PKTechnicianID
 FROM Technician t WHERE t.isApproved = 1 ) AS tmp WHERE tmp.PKTechnicianID = Technician.PKTechnicianID),0) AS Rank,
 [Email], 
 cast(0 as bit) as Checked,
 [Rating],        
 [UserName]         
 FROM dbo.Technician where ([Firstname] like ''%'' + @SearchText+''%'' OR [lastname] like ''%'' + @SearchText+''%'') and (IsApproved = 1)
  AND ((ISNULL(@SelectedTechs,'''') = '''') or (PKTechnicianID NOT IN (SELECT CAST (val AS INT) FROM dbo.fnParseArray(@SelectedTechs,'',''))))) as tmpTable ) as tmp       
 WHERE Row between         
 @startRowIndex and @endRowIndex;'        
       
 print(@STR)      
       
       
 -- Table 1: Content record      
 EXEC sp_executesql @STR, N' @endRowIndex INT = NULL,      
        @startRowIndex INT = NULL,      
        @SortBy nvarchar(50)=null,      
        @OrderBy nvarchar(50)=null,      
        @SearchText nvarchar(50)=null,
        @SelectedTechs nvarchar(max)',      
        @endRowIndex,      
        @startRowIndex,      
        @SortBy,      
        @OrderBy,      
        @SearchText,
        @SelectedTechs;      
       
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM [dbo].[Technician]        
where ([Firstname] like '%' + @SearchText+'%' OR lastname like '%' + @SearchText+'%') and (IsApproved = 1)  AND ((ISNULL(@SelectedTechs,'') = '') or (PKTechnicianID NOT IN (SELECT CAST (val AS INT) FROM dbo.fnParseArray(@SelectedTechs,','))))



SELECT t.PKTechnicianID, t.Firstname FROM Technician t WHERE t.PKTechnicianID IN (SELECT CAST (val AS INT) FROM dbo.fnParseArray(@SelectedTechs,','))  
GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[TechnicianSelectAllSelectedForMessage]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

--	exec [TechnicianSelectAllSelectedForMessage] ''
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechnicianSelectAllSelectedForMessage](
 @Searchtext nvarchar(50),
 @SelectedTechs NVARCHAR(MAX)
) AS        
        
SET NOCOUNT ON   
 SELECT         
 [PKTechnicianID],        
 [Firstname],        
 [LastName],
 ISNULL((SELECT RANK FROM (select row_number() over (order by isnull(t.Rating,0) desc, t.CreatedDate) as RANK,t.PKTechnicianID
 FROM Technician t WHERE t.isApproved = 1 ) AS tmp WHERE tmp.PKTechnicianID = Technician.PKTechnicianID),0) AS Rank,
 [Email], 
 [Rating],        
 [UserName]         
 FROM dbo.Technician where FirstName like '%' +@Searchtext +'%' and  PKTechnicianID IN (SELECT CAST (val AS INT) FROM dbo.fnParseArray(@SelectedTechs,','))
 order by FirstName
GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[TechnicianSelectByEmailAddess]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
Create PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechnicianSelectByEmailAddess] (
	@Email varchar(100)
)
AS

SET NOCOUNT ON

SELECT
	a.[PKTechnicianID],
	a.[FirstName],
	a.[LastName],
	a.[UserName],
	a.[Password],
	a.[Email],	
	a.[PhotoPath],
	a.[isApproved],
	a.FKLevelID,
	l.[Description] as [Level],
	l.[LevelName] as [LevelName]
	
FROM
	[dbo].[Technician] a left join dbo.[Level] l on a.FKLevelID = l.PKLevelID
WHERE
	a.[Email] = @Email 
	
	
--select FKLevelID from AccountLevel where FKAccountID = @PKAccountID


GO

SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechnicianSelectByResetID] (
	@ResetID varchar(100)
)
AS

SET NOCOUNT ON

SELECT
	a.PKTechnicianID,
	a.[FirstName],
	a.[LastName],
	a.[UserName],
	a.[Password],
	a.[Email],

	a.PhotoPath,
	a.isApproved,
	a.FKLevelID,
	l.[Description] as [Level],
	l.[LevelName] as [LevelName]
	
FROM
	Technician a left join dbo.[Level] l on a.FKLevelID = l.PKLevelID
WHERE
	a.[ResetID] = @ResetID 
	
	
--select FKLevelID from AccountLevel where FKAccountID = @PKAccountID


GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[TechnicianSelectByShowID]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
        
--  exec [TechnicianSelectByShowID]  1,10,'Firstname','Asc','',60            
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechnicianSelectByShowID](            
 @PageIndex INT,            
 @RecordsPerPage INT,            
 @SortBy nvarchar(50),            
 @OrderBy nvarchar(50),            
 @SearchText nvarchar(50),        
 @ShowID int          
           
) AS              
              
SET NOCOUNT ON              
 Declare @startRowIndex INT;            
 Declare @endRowIndex INT;            
 declare @Str nvarchar(max)            
 set @endRowIndex = (@PageIndex * @RecordsPerPage);            
 set @startRowIndex = (@endRowIndex - @RecordsPerPage) + 1;            
             
set @Str = 'select * from (select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY '+@SortBy+' '+@OrderBy+') as Row, tmpTable.* from( 
 SELECT          
 [PKTechnicianID],              
 [Firstname],        
 [LastName],                 
 [Address],              
 [City],             
 case when(  ISNULL([Country],'''') = '''')          
 then          
 [City]           
 else          
 [City] + '', ''+ [Country]          
 end as Location,           
 ISNULL((select AVG(b.BidAmount) from bid b where b.fktechnicianID = PKTechnicianID),0) as AvgBid,          
 [State],              
 [ZipCode],              
 [Country],              
 [Phone1],              
 [Phone2],              
 [Fax],              
 [Mobile],              
 tec.[Email],              
 [PhotoPath],              
 [ResumePath],              
 [hasPassport],              
 [isInterviewed],              
 [NearestAirport],              
 [ishotelshare],              
 tec.[isApproved],              
 [isAccess],              
 [dtApprovaldate],   
 (select AverateRate from Ratings where FKShowID=@ShowID and FKTechnicianID= tec.PKTechnicianID) as ShowRate,       
 tec.[ApprovedBy],              
--(select Rank from (select row_number() over (order by AVG(r.AverateRate) desc) as Rank,        
--    t.PkTechnicianID         
--    from technician t left join Ratings r on t.PKTechnicianID = r.FKTechnicianID          
--    group by t.PKTechnicianID,t.CreatedDate )as temp where  temp.PKTechnicianID=tec.PKTechnicianID) as Rank,            
(SELECT RANK FROM (select row_number() over (order by isnull(t.Rating,0) desc, t.CreatedDate) as RANK,t.PKTechnicianID
 FROM Technician t WHERE t.isApproved = 1 ) AS tmp WHERE tmp.PKTechnicianID = tec.PKTechnicianID) AS Rank,  
 isnull([Rating],0) as Rating,              
 [UserName],              
 [Password],              
 [OvationRef],              
 [BirthDate],       
          
 (select top 1 Title from Show inner join Bid on Show.PKShowID=@ShowID) as ShowTitle,        
 @ShowID as ShowID,        
 Bid.PKBidID,      
 (SELECT  STUFF((              
 select DISTINCT '', ''+ CAST(p.PositionName as varchar) from Technician t             
 inner join TechnicianPositions tp ON t.PKTechnicianID=tp.FKTechnicianID inner join Position p            
 on p.PKPositionID=tp.FKPositionID  where tp.FKTechnicianID = tec.PKTechnicianID  and StatusID = 1           
 FOR XML PATH('''')),1,1,'''')) as Positions          
 FROM dbo.Technician tec inner join Bid on tec.PKTechnicianID=Bid.FKTechnicianID where Bid.isApproved  = 1 and (Firstname like ''%'' + @SearchText+''%'' or Lastname like ''%'' + @SearchText+''%'')  and tec.IsApproved = 1 and Bid.FKShowID=@ShowID 
) as tmpTable ) as tmp                 
 WHERE Row between               
 @startRowIndex and @endRowIndex;'              
             
 print(@STR)            
             
             
 -- Table 1: Content record            
 EXEC sp_executesql @STR, N' @endRowIndex INT = NULL,            
        @startRowIndex INT = NULL,            
        @SortBy nvarchar(50)=null,            
        @OrderBy nvarchar(50)=null,            
        @SearchText nvarchar(50)=null,          
        @ShowID int',            
        @endRowIndex,            
        @startRowIndex,            
        @SortBy,            
        @OrderBy,            
        @SearchText,          
        @ShowID;            
             
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM [dbo].[Technician] tec inner join Bid on tec.PKTechnicianID=Bid.FKTechnicianID  
 where Bid.isApproved  = 1 and (tec.Firstname like '%' + @SearchText+'%' OR tec.LastName like '%' + @SearchText+'%')  
  and tec.isApproved = 1  and Bid.FKShowID=@ShowID 

GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[TechnicianSelectWithShowDate]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
--select * from Technician where username  = 'ye'
--- Exec [TechnicianSelectWithShowDate] 443
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechnicianSelectWithShowDate] (                
 @PKTechnicianID int                
)                
AS                
                
SET NOCOUNT ON                
                
SELECT                
 [PKTechnicianID],                
 [Firstname],                
 [LastName],                
 [Address],                
 [City],                
 [State],                
 [ZipCode],                
 [Country],                
 [Phone1],                
 [Phone2],                
 [Fax],                
 [Mobile],                
 [Email],                
 [PhotoPath],                
 [ResumePath],                
 [hasPassport],                
 [isInterviewed],                
 [NearestAirport],                
 [ishotelshare],                
 [isApproved],                
 [isAccess],                
 [dtApprovaldate],                
 [ApprovedBy],                
 [Rank],                
 [Rating],                
 [UserName],                
 [Password],                
 [OvationRef],                
 [BirthDate],              
 [IsAcceptTerms],      
 [IsEmailSent],    
 [Video],  
 [SSN],
 [HomeAddress]   ,
  Other ,
 [LinkedInURL],
 [ShirtSize] ,
 NickName   ,
 Gender ,
 [IsTable] ,
 [NearestMajorCity]   ,
 [PassportImage],
 [DriverLicence],
 [SSC],
 TCIndex,
 (Select StartDate from Show where PKShowID = (select top 1 FKShowID from Bid where IsApproved = 1 and FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID)) as ShowDate
  
FROM                
 [Technician]                
WHERE                
 [PKTechnicianID] = @PKTechnicianID                
                 
select PKPositionID, PositionName from Position                 
where PKPositionID in (select FKPositionID from TechnicianPositions where FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID and StatusID = 1)           
select PKPositionID, PositionName from Position                 
where PKPositionID in (select FKPositionID from TechnicianPositions where FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID and (StatusID = 0 OR StatusID = 1 ) ) 


SELECT * FROM TechnicianReferences tr WHERE tr.FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID
GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[TechnicianSSNUpdate]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
    
    
    
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechnicianSSNUpdate] (@TechnicianID INT, @SSN VARCHAR(50))
AS
BEGIN
	IF EXISTS(
	       SELECT NULL
	       FROM   Technician t
	       WHERE  t.SSN = @SSN
	              AND t.PKTechnicianID != @TechnicianID
	   )
	BEGIN
		SELECT -2
	END
	ELSE
	BEGIN
	    UPDATE Technician
	    SET    SSN = @SSN
	    WHERE  PKTechnicianID = @TechnicianID
	    
	    SELECT @TechnicianID
	END
END      
    
    
    
GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[TechnicianTabledSelectAll]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechnicianTabledSelectAll]( 
 @PageIndex INT, 
 @RecordsPerPage INT,        
 @SortBy nvarchar(50),        
 @OrderBy nvarchar(50),       
 @SearchText nvarchar(50) 
) AS          
SET NOCOUNT ON
 Declare @startRowIndex INT;        
 Declare @endRowIndex INT;        
 declare @Str nvarchar(max)       
 set @endRowIndex = (@PageIndex * @RecordsPerPage);        
 set @startRowIndex = (@endRowIndex - @RecordsPerPage) + 1;        
set @Str = 'select * from (    
 select     
 ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY '+@SortBy+' '+@OrderBy+') as Row,tmpTable.* from(         
  SELECT           
[PKTechnicianID],          
 [Firstname],          
 [CreatedDate],
 [LastName],   
 [Email],      
 (SELECT  STUFF((          
 select DISTINCT '', ''+ CAST(p.PositionName as varchar) from Technician t         
 inner join TechnicianPositions tp ON t.PKTechnicianID=tp.FKTechnicianID inner join Position p        
 on p.PKPositionID=tp.FKPositionID  where tp.FKTechnicianID = dbo.Technician.PKTechnicianID  and t.IsTable = 1      
 FOR XML PATH('''')),1,1,'''')) as Positions,             
 FKLevelID,         
 (select [Description] from dbo.[Level] where PKLevelID = FKLevelID) as [Level]           
 FROM dbo.Technician     
 where [Firstname] like ''%'' + @SearchText+''%'' and IsTable = 1  ) as tmpTable          
 WHERE tmpTable.Positions is not null) as x WHERE Row between           
 @startRowIndex and @endRowIndex;' 
 print(@STR)  

 -- Table 1: Content record    

 EXEC sp_executesql @STR, N' @endRowIndex INT = NULL,
        @startRowIndex INT = NULL,  
        @SortBy nvarchar(50)=null,  
        @OrderBy nvarchar(50)=null,  
        @SearchText nvarchar(50)=null',  
        @endRowIndex,   
        @startRowIndex, 
        @SortBy,   
        @OrderBy,  
        @SearchText
SELECT COUNT(distinct Email) FROM [dbo].[Technician] 
inner join TechnicianPositions tp on tp.FKTechnicianID = PKTechnicianID and IsTable = 1
where [Firstname] like '%' + @SearchText +'%'

GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[TechnicianUpdate]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechnicianUpdate] (      
 @PKTechnicianID int,      
 @Firstname varchar(50),      
 @LastName varchar(50),      
 @Address varchar(450),      
 @City varchar(50),      
 @State varchar(50),      
 @ZipCode varchar(50),      
 @Country varchar(50),      
 @Phone1 varchar(15),      
 @Phone2 varchar(15),      
 @Fax varchar(15),      
 @Mobile varchar(15),      
 @Email varchar(150),      
 @PhotoPath varchar(100),      
 @ResumePath varchar(100),      
 @hasPassport bit,      
 @isInterviewed bit,      
 @NearestAirport varchar(150),      
 @ishotelshare bit,      
 @isApproved bit,      
 @isAccess bit,      
 @dtApprovaldate datetime,      
 @ApprovedBy int,      
 @Rank int,      
 @Rating float(53),      
 @UserName varchar(100),      
 @Password varchar(100),      
 @OvationRef varchar(100),      
 @BirthDate datetime,      
 @TeckPositions nvarchar(max)   ,   
 @Other VARCHAR(250) ,
 @LinkedInURL NVARCHAR(255),
 @ShirtSize NVARCHAR(2)
       
)      
AS      
      
begin      
      
SET NOCOUNT ON      
if exists (select null from [Technician] where Email = @Email and [PKTechnicianID] <> @PKTechnicianID and @Email <> '')      
begin      
select -2      
end      
else if exists (select null from [Technician] where UserName = @UserName and [PKTechnicianID] <> @PKTechnicianID)      
begin      
select -1      
end      
else      
begin      
      
UPDATE      
 [Technician]      
SET      
 [Firstname] = @Firstname,      
 [LastName] = @LastName,      
 [Address] = @Address,      
 [City] = @City,      
 [State] = @State,      
 [ZipCode] = @ZipCode,      
 [Country] = @Country,      
 [Phone1] = @Phone1,      
 [Phone2] = @Phone2,      
 [Fax] = @Fax,      
 [Mobile] = @Mobile,      
 [Email] = @Email,      
 [PhotoPath] = @PhotoPath,      
 [ResumePath] = @ResumePath,      
 [hasPassport] = @hasPassport,      
 [isInterviewed] = @isInterviewed,      
 [NearestAirport] = @NearestAirport,      
 [ishotelshare] = @ishotelshare,      
 [isApproved] = @isApproved,      
 [isAccess] = @isAccess,      
 [dtApprovaldate] = @dtApprovaldate,      
 [ApprovedBy] = @ApprovedBy,      
 [Rank] = @Rank,      
 [Rating] = @Rating,      
 [UserName] = @UserName,      
 [Password] = @Password,      
 [OvationRef] = @OvationRef,      
 [BirthDate] = @BirthDate   ,
  Other   = @Other  ,
  LinkedInURL = @LinkedInURL,
  ShirtSize = @ShirtSize   
       
WHERE      
  [PKTechnicianID] = @PKTechnicianID      
        
      
select @PKTechnicianID      
--delete from TechnicianPositions where FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID And (StatusID = 1 OR FKPositionID IN (select cast(val as int) from dbo.fnParseArray(@TeckPositions, ',')))    
--insert into TechnicianPositions(FKTechnicianID, FKPositionID,StatusID,ApprovedBy)      
--select @PKTechnicianID ,cast(val as int),1 ,@ApprovedBy from dbo.fnParseArray(@TeckPositions, ',')       
  --case when @isApproved = 1 then 1 else 0 end    
  
BEGIN TRANSACTION                
  Declare @FKPositionID int      
  Declare Tech_Positions CURSOR FOR select cast(val as int) from dbo.fnParseArray(@TeckPositions, ',')      
  OPEN Tech_Positions      
   
  UPDATE TechnicianPositions SET StatusID = 0 where FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID          
  FETCH NEXT FROM Tech_Positions INTO @FKPositionID      
  WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0        
  BEGIN   
 if not exists (select PKTechPositionID from TechnicianPositions where FKPositionID = @FKPositionID and FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID)        
 BEGIN  
   Insert into TechnicianPositions (FKTechnicianID, FKPositionID,StatusID)      
   values ( @PKTechnicianID, @FKPositionID,1)      
   END  
   ELSE  
   BEGIN  
   UPDATE TechnicianPositions SET StatusID = 1 where FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID   
   and FKPositionID = @FKPositionID  
   END  
    
           
   FETCH NEXT FROM Tech_Positions INTO @FKPositionID      
  END        
        
  CLOSE Tech_Positions      
        
  DEALLOCATE Tech_Positions      
      
 COMMIT TRANSACTION    
 
       
end      
end   
GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[TechnicianUpdateAccess]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechnicianUpdateAccess](  
 @PKTechnicianID int,  
 @isAccess bit  
   
)  
AS  
  
begin  
  
SET NOCOUNT ON  
  
  
UPDATE  
 [Technician]  
SET  
   
 isAccess = @isAccess  
WHERE  
  [PKTechnicianID] = @PKTechnicianID  
  end


GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[TechnicianUpdateApprovalposition]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechnicianUpdateApprovalposition] (    
 @PKTechnicianID int,    
 @TeckPositions nvarchar(max)    
     
)    
AS    
    
begin    
    
SET NOCOUNT ON    
declare @IsApproved bit
set @IsApproved = (Select IsApproved from Technician where [PKTechnicianID] = @PKTechnicianID )
    
UPDATE    
 [Technician]    
SET    
   
 [isApproved] = 1     
     
WHERE    
  [PKTechnicianID] = @PKTechnicianID    
      
    
select @PKTechnicianID    
--delete from TechnicianPositions where FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID And (StatusID = 1 OR FKPositionID IN (select cast(val as int) from dbo.fnParseArray(@TeckPositions, ',')))  
--insert into TechnicianPositions(FKTechnicianID, FKPositionID,StatusID,ApprovedBy)    
--select @PKTechnicianID ,cast(val as int),1 ,@ApprovedBy from dbo.fnParseArray(@TeckPositions, ',')     
  --case when @isApproved = 1 then 1 else 0 end  

BEGIN TRANSACTION              
  Declare @FKPositionID int    
  Declare Tech_Positions CURSOR FOR select cast(val as int) from dbo.fnParseArray(@TeckPositions, ',')    
  OPEN Tech_Positions    
	
  UPDATE TechnicianPositions SET StatusID = 0 where FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID 	      
  FETCH NEXT FROM Tech_Positions INTO @FKPositionID    
  WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0      
  BEGIN 
	if not exists (select PKTechPositionID from TechnicianPositions where FKPositionID = @FKPositionID and FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID)      
	BEGIN
			Insert into TechnicianPositions (FKTechnicianID, FKPositionID,StatusID)    
			values ( @PKTechnicianID, @FKPositionID,1)    
   END
   ELSE
   BEGIN
		 UPDATE TechnicianPositions SET StatusID = 1 where FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID 
			and FKPositionID = @FKPositionID
   END
  
         
   FETCH NEXT FROM Tech_Positions INTO @FKPositionID    
  END      
      
  CLOSE Tech_Positions    
      
  DEALLOCATE Tech_Positions    
    
 COMMIT TRANSACTION    
 
 if(isnull(@IsApproved,0) = 0)
begin
select cast (0 as bit) as IsApproved,FirstName,isnull( (SELECT  STUFF((        
 select ', '+ CAST(p.PositionName as varchar) from Technician t       
 inner join TechnicianPositions tp ON t.PKTechnicianID=tp.FKTechnicianID inner join Position p      
 on p.PKPositionID=tp.FKPositionID  where tp.FKTechnicianID = dbo.Technician.PKTechnicianID  and StatusID = 1 order by PositionName    
 FOR XML PATH('')),1,1,'')) ,'')as Positions from Technician where PKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID
end
else
begin
select cast (1 as bit) as IsApproved,FirstName,isnull( (SELECT  STUFF((        
 select ', '+ CAST(p.PositionName as varchar) from Technician t       
 inner join TechnicianPositions tp ON t.PKTechnicianID=tp.FKTechnicianID inner join Position p      
 on p.PKPositionID=tp.FKPositionID  where tp.FKTechnicianID = dbo.Technician.PKTechnicianID  and StatusID = 1 order by PositionName    
 FOR XML PATH('')),1,1,'')) ,'')as Positions from Technician where PKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID
end
    
end    



GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[TechnicianUpdateAsApproved]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechnicianUpdateAsApproved](  

 @PKTechnicianID int

)  

AS  

  

begin  

  declare @IsApproved bit
  set @IsApproved = (Select IsApproved from Technician where [PKTechnicianID] = @PKTechnicianID )

SET NOCOUNT ON 
UPDATE
[Technician]  
SET 
IsTable = 0,
IsApproved = 1
WHERE 
[PKTechnicianID] = @PKTechnicianID  


update technicianPositions set StatusID = 1 where  FKTechnicianID =@PKTechnicianID

if(isnull(@IsApproved,0) = 0)
begin
select cast (0 as bit) as IsApproved,FirstName,Email,isnull( (SELECT  STUFF((        
 select ', '+ CAST(p.PositionName as varchar) from Technician t       
 inner join TechnicianPositions tp ON t.PKTechnicianID=tp.FKTechnicianID inner join Position p      
 on p.PKPositionID=tp.FKPositionID  where tp.FKTechnicianID = dbo.Technician.PKTechnicianID  and StatusID = 1 order by PositionName    
 FOR XML PATH('')),1,1,'')) ,'')as Positions from Technician where PKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID
end
else
begin
select cast (1 as bit) as IsApproved,FirstName,Email,isnull( (SELECT  STUFF((        
 select ', '+ CAST(p.PositionName as varchar) from Technician t       
 inner join TechnicianPositions tp ON t.PKTechnicianID=tp.FKTechnicianID inner join Position p      
 on p.PKPositionID=tp.FKPositionID  where tp.FKTechnicianID = dbo.Technician.PKTechnicianID  and StatusID = 1 order by PositionName    
 FOR XML PATH('')),1,1,'')) ,'')as Positions from Technician where PKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID
end
end



GO

/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[TechnicianUpdateRating]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
-- =============================================      
-- Author:  Name      
-- Create date: 21 dec 2012      
-- Description: Update Technician Average Rating in Technician Table      
-- =============================================      
--exec TechnicianUpdateRating 159      
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechnicianUpdateRating]       
 -- Add the parameters for the stored procedure here      
 @TechnicianID int      
        
AS      
BEGIN      
 -- SET NOCOUNT ON added to prevent extra result sets from      
 -- interfering with SELECT statements.      
 SET NOCOUNT ON;      
         
 update Technician set Rating=(select cast(avg(AverateRate)as float) from Ratings where FKTechnicianID=@TechnicianID) where PKTechnicianID=@TechnicianID    
      
END 

GO

/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[TechPositionUpdate]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
/************************************************************
 * Code formatted by SoftTree SQL Assistant © v4.5.9
 * Time: 12/11/2012 1:24:05 PM
 ************************************************************/

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechPositionUpdate](
    @UserID        INT,
    @TechnicianID  INT,
    @StatusID      INT,
    @PositionID    INT,
    @Reason        VARCHAR(255)
)
AS
BEGIN
	IF EXISTS (
	       SELECT NULL
	       FROM   TechnicianPositions tp
	       WHERE  tp.FKPositionID = @PositionID
	              AND tp.FKTechnicianID = @TechnicianID
	   )
	BEGIN
	    IF (@StatusID = 1)
	    BEGIN
	        UPDATE TechnicianPositions
	        SET    StatusID = @StatusID,
	               Reason = @Reason,
	               ApprovedBy = @UserID
	        WHERE  FKTechnicianID = @TechnicianID
	               AND FKPositionID = @PositionID
	    END
	    ELSE 
	    IF (@StatusID = 2)
	    BEGIN
	        UPDATE TechnicianPositions
	        SET    StatusID = @StatusID,
	               Reason = @Reason,
	               RejectedBy = @UserID
	        WHERE  FKTechnicianID = @TechnicianID
	               AND FKPositionID = @PositionID
	    END
	    ELSE
	    BEGIN
	        UPDATE TechnicianPositions
	        SET    StatusID = @StatusID,
	               Reason = @Reason
	        WHERE  FKTechnicianID = @TechnicianID
	               AND FKPositionID = @PositionID
	    END
	END
	ELSE
	BEGIN
	    IF (@StatusID = 1)
	    BEGIN
	        INSERT into TechnicianPositions(StatusID,Reason,ApprovedBy,FKTechnicianID,FKPositionID)
	        VALUES (@StatusID,@Reason,@UserID,@TechnicianID,@PositionID)	       
	    END
	    ELSE 
	    IF (@StatusID = 2)
	    BEGIN
	        INSERT into TechnicianPositions(StatusID,Reason,RejectedBy,FKTechnicianID,FKPositionID)
	        VALUES (@StatusID,@Reason,@UserID,@TechnicianID,@PositionID)	
	            
	    END
	    ELSE
	    BEGIN
	        INSERT into TechnicianPositions(StatusID,Reason,FKTechnicianID,FKPositionID)
	        VALUES (@StatusID,@Reason,@TechnicianID,@PositionID)	
	    END
	END
END


GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[TechProfileUpdate]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechProfileUpdate] ( 
 @PKTechnicianID int,          
 @Firstname varchar(50),            
 @LastName varchar(50),            
 @Address varchar(450),            
 @City varchar(50),            
 @State varchar(50),            
 @ZipCode varchar(50),            
 @Country varchar(50),            
 @Phone1 varchar(15),            
 @Phone2 varchar(15),            
 @Fax varchar(15),            
 @Mobile varchar(15),            
 @Email varchar(150),            
 @PhotoPath varchar(100),            
 @ResumePath varchar(100),            
 @hasPassport bit,            
 @isInterviewed bit,            
 @NearestAirport varchar(255),            
 @ishotelshare bit,            
 @isApproved bit,            
 @isAccess bit,            
 @dtApprovaldate datetime,            
 @ApprovedBy int,            
 @Rank int,            
 @Rating float(53),            
 @UserName varchar(100),            
 @Password varchar(100),            
 @OvationRef varchar(100),            
 @BirthDate datetime,            
 @TeckPositions nvarchar(max),  
 @SSN varchar(50) = null,
 @HomeAddress varchar(450) = null   ,   
 @Other VARCHAR(250),
 @LinkedInURL NVARCHAR(255),
 @ShirtSize NVARCHAR(2),
 @TechnicianReferences TechnicianReferences READONLY,
 @Gender bit,
 @NickName Nvarchar(50) ,
 @NearestMajorCity nvarchar(50) ,
 @IsAcceptTerms  bit
)            
AS            
            
begin            
            
SET NOCOUNT ON            
if exists (select null from [Technician] where Email = @Email and PKTechnicianID <> @PKTechnicianID)            
begin            
select -2            
end            
else 
if exists (select null from [Technician] where UserName = @UserName and PKTechnicianID <> @PKTechnicianID)            
begin            
select -1            
end            
else            
begin            
            
UPDATE              
 [Technician]              
SET              
 [Firstname] = @Firstname,              
 [LastName] = @LastName,              
 [Address] = @Address,              
 [City] = @City,              
 [State] = @State,              
 [ZipCode] = @ZipCode,              
 [Country] = @Country,              
 [Phone1] = @Phone1,              
 [Phone2] = @Phone2,              
 [Fax] = @Fax,              
 [Mobile] = @Mobile,              
 [Email] = @Email,              
 [PhotoPath] = @PhotoPath,              
 [ResumePath] = @ResumePath,              
 [hasPassport] = @hasPassport,              
 [isInterviewed] = @isInterviewed,              
 [NearestAirport] = @NearestAirport,              
 [ishotelshare] = @ishotelshare,              
 --[isApproved] = @isApproved,              
 [isAccess] = @isAccess,              
 [dtApprovaldate] = @dtApprovaldate,              
 [ApprovedBy] = @ApprovedBy,              
 [Rank] = @Rank,              
 [Rating] = @Rating,              
 [UserName] = @UserName,              
 [Password] = @Password,              
 [OvationRef] = @OvationRef,              
 [BirthDate] = @BirthDate,      
  [IsAcceptTerms] = @IsAcceptTerms,
 SSN = @SSN,
 HomeAddress = @HomeAddress  ,
 Other = @Other,
 LinkedInURL = @LinkedInURL,
 ShirtSize = @ShirtSize ,
 Gender = @Gender,
 NickName = @NickName  ,
 NearestMajorCity = @NearestMajorCity           
               
WHERE              
  [PKTechnicianID] = @PKTechnicianID              
                
              
select @PKTechnicianID           
delete from TechnicianPositions where FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID and StatusID = 0
insert into TechnicianPositions(FKTechnicianID, FKPositionID,StatusID)          
select @PKTechnicianID ,cast(val as int) as val, 0 from dbo.fnParseArray(@TeckPositions, ',') 
where val not in (select FKPositionID from TechnicianPositions where FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID and StatusID = 1)         


BEGIN TRANSACTION     
 DELETE FROM TechnicianReferences WHERE FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID                    
  Declare @tmpFirstName VARCHAR(50)
  Declare @tmpLastName VARCHAR(50)
  Declare @tmpEmail NVARCHAR(255)
  Declare @tmpPhoneNumber VARCHAR(15)
  Declare TechnicianReferences CURSOR FOR Select FirstName, LastName, Email, PhoneNumber from @TechnicianReferences            
              
  OPEN TechnicianReferences            
              
  FETCH NEXT FROM TechnicianReferences INTO @tmpFirstName,@tmpLastName, @tmpEmail,@tmpPhoneNumber  
  WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0              
  BEGIN              
   INSERT INTO [dbo].[TechnicianReferences]
           ([FKTechnicianID]
           ,[FirstName]
           ,[LastName]
           ,[Email]
           ,[PhoneNumber])
     VALUES
           (@PKTechnicianID
           ,@tmpFirstName
           ,@tmpLastName
           ,@tmpEmail
           ,@tmpPhoneNumber)            
                 
   FETCH NEXT FROM TechnicianReferences INTO @tmpFirstName,@tmpLastName, @tmpEmail,@tmpPhoneNumber         
  END              
     
  CLOSE TechnicianReferences            
              
  DEALLOCATE TechnicianReferences            
            
 COMMIT TRANSACTION               
end            
end 
GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[TechProfileUpdateBasic]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechProfileUpdateBasic] ( 

 @PKTechnicianID int,          

 @Firstname varchar(50),            

 @LastName varchar(50),    

 @NickName Nvarchar(50) , 

 @Email varchar(150),    

 @UserName varchar(100),            

 @Password varchar(100)

)            

AS            

            

begin            

            

SET NOCOUNT ON            

if exists (select null from [Technician] where Email = @Email and PKTechnicianID <> @PKTechnicianID)            

begin            

select -2            

end            

else 

if exists (select null from [Technician] where UserName = @UserName and PKTechnicianID <> @PKTechnicianID)            

begin            

select -1            

end            

else            

begin            

            

UPDATE              

 [Technician]              

SET              

 [Firstname] = @Firstname,              

 [LastName] = @LastName, 

 [Email] = @Email,           

 [UserName] = @UserName,              

 [Password] = @Password,

 NickName = @NickName 

WHERE              

  [PKTechnicianID] = @PKTechnicianID              

                
select @PKTechnicianID
                  

end 

end
GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[TechProfileUpdateDocs]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechProfileUpdateDocs] ( 
 @PKTechnicianID int,  
 @PassportImage nvarchar(255),
 @SSC nvarchar(255),
 @DriverLicence nvarchar(255)
)            
AS           
begin        
UPDATE       
 [Technician]
SET          
 PassportImage = @PassportImage,
 SSC = @SSC,
 DriverLicence = @DriverLicence
WHERE              
  [PKTechnicianID] = @PKTechnicianID    
   

  Delete from [TechnicianDocs] where [FKTechnicianID] = @PKTechnicianID and [DocumentType] in (1,2,3)
  if(isnull(@PassportImage,'') <>'')
  begin
  INSERT INTO [dbo].[TechnicianDocs]
        ([FKTechnicianID]
        ,[DocumentName]
        ,[DocumentPath]
        ,[DocumentType])
  values( @PKTechnicianID, @PassportImage ,@PassportImage,3)
  end

  if(isnull(@SSC,'') <>'')
  begin
  INSERT INTO [dbo].[TechnicianDocs]
        ([FKTechnicianID]
        ,[DocumentName]
        ,[DocumentPath]
        ,[DocumentType])
  values( @PKTechnicianID, @SSC ,@SSC,2)
  end

  if(isnull(@DriverLicence,'') <>'')
  begin
  INSERT INTO [dbo].[TechnicianDocs]
        ([FKTechnicianID]
        ,[DocumentName]
        ,[DocumentPath]
        ,[DocumentType])
  values( @PKTechnicianID, @DriverLicence ,@DriverLicence,1)
  end
 select @PKTechnicianID

end 
GO

GO

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechProfileUpdateFirstTime] ( 
 @PKTechnicianID int,          
 @Firstname varchar(50),            
 @LastName varchar(50),            
 @Address varchar(450),            
 @City varchar(50),            
 @State varchar(50),            
 @ZipCode varchar(50),            
 @Country varchar(50),            
 @Phone1 varchar(15),            
 @Phone2 varchar(15),            
 @Fax varchar(15),            
 @Mobile varchar(15),            
 @Email varchar(150),            
 @PhotoPath varchar(100),            
 @ResumePath varchar(100),            
 @hasPassport bit,            
 @isInterviewed bit,            
 @NearestAirport varchar(255),            
 @ishotelshare bit,            
 @isApproved bit,            
 @isAccess bit,            
 @dtApprovaldate datetime,            
 @ApprovedBy int,            
 @Rank int,            
 @Rating float(53),            
 @UserName varchar(100),            
 @Password varchar(100),            
 @OvationRef varchar(100),            
 @BirthDate datetime,           
 
 @SSN varchar(50) = null,
 @HomeAddress varchar(450) = null   ,   
 @Other VARCHAR(250),
 @LinkedInURL NVARCHAR(255),
 @ShirtSize NVARCHAR(2),
 @Gender bit,
 @NickName Nvarchar(50) ,
 @NearestMajorCity nvarchar(50) ,
 @IsAcceptTerms  bit,
 --@TCIndex int,
 @PassportImage NVARCHAR(255),
 @DriverLicence NVARCHAR(255),
 @SSC NVARCHAR(255)
)            
AS            
            
begin            
            
SET NOCOUNT ON            
if exists (select null from [Technician] where Email = @Email and PKTechnicianID <> @PKTechnicianID)            
begin            
select -2            
end            
else 
if exists (select null from [Technician] where UserName = @UserName and PKTechnicianID <> @PKTechnicianID)            
begin            
select -1            
end            
else            
begin            
            
UPDATE              
 [Technician]              
SET              
 --[Firstname] = @Firstname,              
 --[LastName] = @LastName,              
 [Address] = @Address,              
 [City] = @City,              
 [State] = @State,              
 [ZipCode] = @ZipCode,              
 [Country] = @Country,              
 [Phone1] = @Phone1,              
 [Phone2] = @Phone2,              
 [Fax] = @Fax,              
 [Mobile] = @Mobile,              
 --[Email] = @Email,              
 [PhotoPath] = @PhotoPath,              
 --[ResumePath] = @ResumePath,              
 [hasPassport] = @hasPassport,              
 [isInterviewed] = @isInterviewed,              
 [NearestAirport] = @NearestAirport,              
 [ishotelshare] = @ishotelshare,              
 --[isApproved] = @isApproved,              
 [isAccess] = @isAccess,              
 --[dtApprovaldate] = @dtApprovaldate,              
 --[ApprovedBy] = @ApprovedBy,              
 --[Rank] = @Rank,              
 --[Rating] = @Rating,              
 --[UserName] = @UserName,              
 --[Password] = @Password,              
 [OvationRef] = @OvationRef,              
 [BirthDate] = @BirthDate,      
 [IsAcceptTerms] = @IsAcceptTerms,
 SSN = @SSN,
 HomeAddress = @HomeAddress  ,
 Other = @Other,
 --LinkedInURL = @LinkedInURL,
 ShirtSize = @ShirtSize ,
 Gender = @Gender,
 --NickName = @NickName  ,
 NearestMajorCity = @NearestMajorCity ,
 IsSecondaryCompleted = 1 ,
  PassportImage= @PassportImage,
DriverLicence =@DriverLicence ,
        SSC = @SSC
		--TCIndex = @TCIndex
               
WHERE              
  [PKTechnicianID] = @PKTechnicianID              
                
              
      


             
end            
end

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechProfileUpdateInformation] ( 
 @PKTechnicianID int,             
 @Address varchar(450),            
 @City varchar(50),            
 @State varchar(50),            
 @ZipCode varchar(50),            
 @Country varchar(50),            
 @Phone1 varchar(15),            
 @Phone2 varchar(15),            
 @Fax varchar(15),            
 @Mobile varchar(15),          
 @hasPassport bit,            
 @isInterviewed bit,            
 @NearestAirport varchar(255),            
 @ishotelshare bit,          
 @isAccess bit,        
 @OvationRef varchar(100),            
 @BirthDate datetime,  
 @HomeAddress varchar(450) = null   ,   
 @Other VARCHAR(250),
 @ShirtSize NVARCHAR(2),
 @Gender bit, 
 @NearestMajorCity nvarchar(50)
)            
AS            
            
begin            
            
SET NOCOUNT ON            
      
UPDATE              
 [Technician]              
SET               
 [Address] = @Address,              
 [City] = @City,              
 [State] = @State,              
 [ZipCode] = @ZipCode,              
 [Country] = @Country,              
 [Phone1] = @Phone1,              
 [Phone2] = @Phone2,              
 [Fax] = @Fax,              
 [Mobile] = @Mobile,             
 [hasPassport] = @hasPassport,              
 [isInterviewed] = @isInterviewed,              
 [NearestAirport] = @NearestAirport,              
 [ishotelshare] = @ishotelshare,           
 [isAccess] = @isAccess,             
 [OvationRef] = @OvationRef,              
 [BirthDate] = @BirthDate,
 HomeAddress = @HomeAddress  ,
 Other = @Other,
 ShirtSize = @ShirtSize ,
 Gender = @Gender,
 NearestMajorCity = @NearestMajorCity           
               
WHERE              
  [PKTechnicianID] = @PKTechnicianID              
                
          select @PKTechnicianID
end 
GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[TechProfileUpdatePhoto]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechProfileUpdatePhoto] (

 @PhotoPath varchar(100)
)            
AS

SET

  [PKTechnicianID] = @PKTechnicianID              
      select @PKTechnicianID

/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[TechProfileUpdatePositions]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechProfileUpdatePositions] ( 
 @PKTechnicianID int,   
 @TeckPositions nvarchar(max)  
 
)            
AS            
            
begin            
            
SET NOCOUNT ON   
         
delete from TechnicianPositions where FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID and StatusID = 0
insert into TechnicianPositions(FKTechnicianID, FKPositionID,StatusID)          
select @PKTechnicianID ,cast(val as int) as val, 0 from dbo.fnParseArray(@TeckPositions, ',') 
where val not in (select FKPositionID from TechnicianPositions where FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID and StatusID = 1)
select @PKTechnicianID       
end 
GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[TechProfileUpdateReferences]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechProfileUpdateReferences] ( 
 @PKTechnicianID int, 
 @ResumePath varchar(100), 
 @LinkedInURL NVARCHAR(255),
 @TechnicianReferences TechnicianReferences READONLY
)            
AS            
            
begin            
            
SET NOCOUNT ON            
         
            
UPDATE              
 [Technician]              
SET           
 [ResumePath] = @ResumePath,
 LinkedInURL = @LinkedInURL
WHERE              
  [PKTechnicianID] = @PKTechnicianID 


  if(isnull(@ResumePath,'') <>'')
  begin
Delete from [TechnicianDocs] where [FKTechnicianID] = @PKTechnicianID and [DocumentType] = 4
  INSERT INTO [dbo].[TechnicianDocs]
        ([FKTechnicianID]
        ,[DocumentName]
        ,[DocumentPath]
        ,[DocumentType])
  values(@PKTechnicianID, @ResumePath ,@ResumePath,4)
  end
BEGIN TRANSACTION     
 DELETE FROM TechnicianReferences WHERE FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID                    
  Declare @tmpFirstName VARCHAR(50)
  Declare @tmpLastName VARCHAR(50)
  Declare @tmpEmail NVARCHAR(255)
  Declare @tmpPhoneNumber VARCHAR(15)
  Declare TechnicianReferences CURSOR FOR Select FirstName, LastName, Email, PhoneNumber from @TechnicianReferences            
              
  OPEN TechnicianReferences            
              
  FETCH NEXT FROM TechnicianReferences INTO @tmpFirstName,@tmpLastName, @tmpEmail,@tmpPhoneNumber  
  WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0              
  BEGIN              
   INSERT INTO [dbo].[TechnicianReferences]
           ([FKTechnicianID]
           ,[FirstName]
           ,[LastName]
           ,[Email]
           ,[PhoneNumber])
     VALUES
           (@PKTechnicianID
           ,@tmpFirstName
           ,@tmpLastName
           ,@tmpEmail
           ,@tmpPhoneNumber)            
                 
   FETCH NEXT FROM TechnicianReferences INTO @tmpFirstName,@tmpLastName, @tmpEmail,@tmpPhoneNumber         
  END              
     
  CLOSE TechnicianReferences            
              
  DEALLOCATE TechnicianReferences            
            
 COMMIT TRANSACTION  
 select @PKTechnicianID             
end            

GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[TechProfileUpdateSSN]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

 @PKTechnicianID int,
 @SSN nvarchar(10),
 @IsAcceptTerms  bit
)            
AS            
            
begin            
    
UPDATE              
 [Technician]              
SET SSN = @SSN, IsAcceptTerms =@IsAcceptTerms         
               
WHERE              
  [PKTechnicianID] = @PKTechnicianID              
                
  select @PKTechnicianID
end

/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[TechProspectsSelectAll]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
--SELECT * FROM Technician t

--SELECT * FROM Position p WHERE p.PKPositionID NOT IN (SELECT sp.FKPositionID

--                                                      FROM ShowPositions sp)

---		exec [TechProspectsSelectAll] 122

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechProspectsSelectAll] (  

    @PKTechnicianID  INT

)

AS

	SET NOCOUNT ON

	





	SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY Title Desc) as Row,

	s.[PKShowID],
	@PKTechnicianID as TechID,

	s.[Title],

	s.[Email],

	s.[LogoPath],

	s.[DayRateValue],

	s.[StartDate],

	s.[EndDate],

	 bd.PKBidID  as BidID,

	(SELECT  STUFF((  

	select DISTINCT '##'+ cast(TravelDate AS VARCHAR)

	FROM ShowTravelDate  where FKShowID = s.PKShowID

	FOR XML PATH('')),1,2,'')) as TravelDates,	

	--(select '$' + cast(BidAmount as varchar) + '/hr' from Bid where FKShowID = s.PKShowID and FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID and isApproved = 1) as ConfirmedRate,

	'$' + cast(bd.BidAmount as varchar) + '/hr'  as ConfirmedRate,

	--(select PositionName from Position where PKPositionID = (select FKShowPositionID from Bid where FKShowID = s.PKShowID and FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID and isApproved = 1)) as PositionName,

	(select PositionName from Position where PKPositionID =  bd.FKShowPositionID ) as PositionName,

	((datediff (d, [StartDate], [EndDate]) + 1) - (SELECT COUNT(FKShowID) FROM ShowTravelDate std WHERE std.FKShowID = s.PKShowID)) AS ShowDays,

	(SELECT COUNT(FKShowID) FROM ShowTravelDate std WHERE std.FKShowID = s.PKShowID) AS TravelDays,

	bd.IsApproved,

	isnull(bd.ToNotify,0) as ToNotify,

	bd.Email as TotifyEmail,
	(select isnull(sum (TotalHours),0) from TimeEntry where FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID and FKShowID = s.PKShowID ) as HoursWorked

	

FROM

	[Show] s INNER JOIN Technician t ON s.isPublished = t.isApproved inner join bid bd on bd.FKShowID = s.PKShowID 

	where

	t.PKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID and s.EndDate > getdate() and bd.FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID and bd.IsApproved = 1

	--( SELECT COUNT(b.PKBidID) FROM Bid b WHERE  b.FKShowID = s.PKShowID AND b.FKTechnicianID = t.PKTechnicianID AND B.IsApproved = 1) > 0





	SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY Title Desc) as Row,
	@PKTechnicianID as TechID,
	s.[PKShowID],

	s.[Title],

	s.[Email],

	s.[LogoPath],

	s.[DayRateValue],

	s.[StartDate],

	s.[EndDate],

	bd.PKBidID as BidID,

	(SELECT  STUFF((  

	select DISTINCT '##'+ cast(TravelDate AS VARCHAR)

	FROM ShowTravelDate  where FKShowID = s.PKShowID

	FOR XML PATH('')),1,2,'')) as TravelDates,	

	--(select '$' + cast(BidAmount as varchar) + '/hr' from Bid where FKShowID = s.PKShowID and FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID and isApproved = 1) as ConfirmedRate,

	'$' + cast(bd.BidAmount as varchar) + '/hr'  as ConfirmedRate,

	--(select PositionName from Position where PKPositionID = (select FKShowPositionID from Bid where FKShowID = s.PKShowID and FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID and isApproved = 1)) as PositionName,

	(select PositionName from Position where PKPositionID =  bd.FKShowPositionID ) as PositionName,

	((datediff (d, [StartDate], [EndDate]) + 1) - (SELECT COUNT(FKShowID) FROM ShowTravelDate std WHERE std.FKShowID = s.PKShowID)) AS ShowDays,

	(SELECT COUNT(FKShowID) FROM ShowTravelDate std WHERE std.FKShowID = s.PKShowID) AS TravelDays,

	--15 as HoursWorked
	(select isnull(sum (TotalHours),0) from TimeEntry where FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID and FKShowID = s.PKShowID ) as HoursWorked

	--bd.IsApproved,

	--bd.ToNotify,

	--bd.Email

	

FROM

	[Show] s INNER JOIN Technician t ON s.isPublished = t.isApproved inner join bid bd on bd.FKShowID = s.PKShowID 

	where

	t.PKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID and s.EndDate < getdate() and bd.FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID and bd.IsApproved = 1

	--( SELECT COUNT(b.PKBidID) FROM Bid b WHERE  b.FKShowID = s.PKShowID AND b.FKTechnicianID = t.PKTechnicianID AND B.IsApproved = 1) > 0





	Select FirstName, LastName, Email from Technician where PKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID



	--- To select Weekly Avg
	DECLARE @WeeklyHour decimal(3,2)   
	DECLARE @CurrentDate DATETIME   
    SET @CurrentDate = GETDATE()    
    DECLARE @PreviousSDate DATETIME,@PreviousEDate DATETIME    
    SET @PreviousSDate = cast(cast(DATEADD(dd, -(DATEPART(dw, @CurrentDate-1)), @CurrentDate +1)  as varchar(12)) as datetime) 
    SET @PreviousEDate = cast(cast(DATEADD(dd, 7-(DATEPART(dw, @CurrentDate-1)), @CurrentDate )  as varchar(12)) as datetime) 
    set @WeeklyHour = (select convert(decimal(3,2),avg(t.TotalHours)) as WeekLyAvg 
    from TimeEntry t inner join [TechShowSettings] ts on t.FKTechnicianID = ts.[FKTechnicianID] 
    where (cast(cast(t.TaskDate as varchar(12)) as datetime) between @PreviousSDate
    and @PreviousEDate) and t.FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID
    group by t.FKTechnicianID )

	select @WeeklyHour as AvgWeeklyHours, (SELECT COUNT(s.PKShowID) FROM show s inner join  Bid b on s.PkShowID = b.FKShowID WHERE  b.FKShowID = s.PKShowID AND b.FKTechnicianID = 122 AND B.IsApproved = 1 and s.EndDate > getdate()) as ScheduledShow,

	(SELECT COUNT(s.PKShowID) FROM show s inner join  Bid b on s.PkShowID = b.FKShowID WHERE  b.FKShowID = s.PKShowID AND b.FKTechnicianID = 122 AND B.IsApproved = 1 and s.EndDate < getdate()) as ShowsCompleted



	select * from [TechShowSettings] where FKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID

	       

	       

	       

	       

	       

	       

	       



GO

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechShowSettingsDelete] (
	@PKSettingID int
)
AS

SET NOCOUNT ON

DELETE FROM
	[TechShowSettings]
WHERE
	[PKSettingID] = @PKSettingID

GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[TechShowSettingsInsert]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO


CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TechShowSettingsInsert] (
	@FKTechnicianID int,
	@ToNotify bit,
	@WeeklyHours int,
	@EmailAddress nvarchar(255)
)
AS

SET NOCOUNT ON
begin
if exists(select null from [TechShowSettings] where FKTechnicianID = @FKTechnicianID)
begin

UPDATE
	[TechShowSettings]
SET
	[ToNotify] = @ToNotify,
	[WeeklyHours] = @WeeklyHours,
	[EmailAddress] = @EmailAddress
WHERE
	 FKTechnicianID = @FKTechnicianID
	 select @FKTechnicianID

end
else
begin

INSERT INTO [TechShowSettings] (
	[FKTechnicianID],
	[ToNotify],
	[WeeklyHours],
	[EmailAddress]
) VALUES (
	@FKTechnicianID,
	@ToNotify,
	@WeeklyHours,
	@EmailAddress
)

SELECT SCOPE_IDENTITY() AS PKSettingID

end
end

GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[TechShowSettingsSelect]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

	@PKSettingID int
)
AS

SET NOCOUNT ON

SELECT
	[PKSettingID],
	[FKTechnicianID],
	[ToNotify],
	[WeeklyHours],
	[EmailAddress]
FROM
	[TechShowSettings]
WHERE
	[PKSettingID] = @PKSettingID

GO

/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[TimeEntryInsert]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO


-- exec TimeEntryInsert 122,43,2,4,'technician','maintainace','06/06/2013',1

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TimeEntryInsert] (



	@FKTechnicianID int,



	@FKShowID int,



	@StartTime decimal(4, 2),



	@EndTime decimal(4, 2),



	@TotalHours decimal(4, 2),



	@Title varchar(100),



	@Description nvarchar(max),



	@CreateDate datetime,



	@CreatedBy int,

	@TaskDate datetime,
	@Start_Min decimal(4, 2),
	@End_Min decimal(4, 2)

)



AS







SET NOCOUNT ON







INSERT INTO [TimeEntry] (



	[FKTechnicianID],



	[FKShowID],



	[StartTime],



	[EndTime],



	[TotalHours],



	[Title],



	[Description],



	[CreateDate],



	[CreatedBy],

	TaskDate,
	Start_Min,
	End_Min



) VALUES (



	@FKTechnicianID,



	@FKShowID,



	cast(@StartTime as decimal(4, 2)) ,



	cast(@EndTime as decimal(4, 2)) ,

	

	cast(@TotalHours as decimal(4, 2)) ,

	



	@Title,



	@Description,



	@CreateDate,



	@CreatedBy,

	@TaskDate,
	@Start_Min,
	@End_Min



)







SELECT SCOPE_IDENTITY() AS PKTimeEntryID

GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[TimeEntrySelect]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO


CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TimeEntrySelect] (

	@PKTimeEntryID int

)

AS



SET NOCOUNT ON



SELECT

	[PKTimeEntryID],

	[FKTechnicianID],

	[FKShowID],

	[StartTime],

	[EndTime],

	[TotalHours],

	[Title],

	[Description],

	[CreateDate],

	[CreatedBy],
	Start_Min,
	End_Min,

TaskDate

FROM

	[TimeEntry]

WHERE

	[PKTimeEntryID] = @PKTimeEntryID

GO

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TimeEntrySelectByFKTechnicianIDandFKShowID](
	@FKTechnicianID INT,
	@FKShowID INT
)
AS 
SET NOCOUNT ON
select [PKTimeEntryID],
	[FKTechnicianID],
	[FKShowID],
	[StartTime],
	[EndTime],
	[TotalHours],
	[Title],
	[Description],
	[CreateDate],
	[CreatedBy],
	TaskDate
	 from timeentry
	  where FKTechnicianID=@FKTechnicianID AND FKShowID=@FKShowID

GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[TimeEntryUpdate]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO


-- exec [TimeEntryUpdate] 2,122,43,1,2,1,abc3,abc,'2013-06-20 00:00:00.000'

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TimeEntryUpdate] (



	@PKTimeEntryID int,



	@FKTechnicianID int,



	@FKShowID int,



	@StartTime decimal(4, 2),



	@EndTime decimal(4, 2),



	@TotalHours decimal(4, 2),



	@Title varchar(100),



	@Description nvarchar(max),



	--@CreateDate datetime,



	--@CreatedBy int,



	@TaskDate datetime,
	@Start_Min decimal(4, 2),
	@End_Min decimal(4, 2)



)



AS







SET NOCOUNT ON







UPDATE



	[TimeEntry]



SET



	[FKTechnicianID] = @FKTechnicianID,



	[FKShowID] = @FKShowID,



	[StartTime] =cast(@StartTime as decimal(4, 2)) ,



	[EndTime] = cast(@EndTime as decimal(4, 2)) ,



	[TotalHours] =cast(@TotalHours as decimal(4, 2)) ,



	[Title] = @Title,



	[Description] = @Description,



	--[CreateDate] = @CreateDate,



	--[CreatedBy] = @CreatedBy,



	TaskDate=@TaskDate,
	Start_Min=@Start_Min,
	End_Min=@End_Min







WHERE



	 [PKTimeEntryID] = @PKTimeEntryID

GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[UpdateIsNotifiedAdmin]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
create procedure [dbo].[UpdateIsNotifiedAdmin]
(
	@IsNotifiedAdmin bit,
	@PKBidID int 
)
as
Begin
Update Bid set  IsNotifiedAdmin =  @IsNotifiedAdmin where PKBidID = @PKBidID
end
GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[UpdateLastUpdatedDate]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
  Create Procedure [dbo].[UpdateLastUpdatedDate]
  (
	@TechnicianID int
  )
  as
  begin
  Update [TechShowSettings] set LastUpdatedDate = getdate() where FKTechnicianID = @TechnicianID
  end
GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[updateNotifiedBids]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
CREATE procedure [dbo].[updateNotifiedBids]
(
 @PKBidIDs Nvarchar(Max)
)
as
begin
Update Bid Set IsNotified = 1 where PKBidID in 
(
	select cast(val as int) FROM [dbo].[fnParseArray] (@PKBidIDs , ',')
)
end

GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[UpdateTechnicianPassword]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
    
    
    
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[UpdateTechnicianPassword] (      
 @PKTechnicianID int,    
 @Password varchar(50)
     
 )      
AS      
      
begin      
      
SET NOCOUNT ON      
UPDATE      
 Technician      
SET      
Password=@Password    
WHERE      
  PKTechnicianID = @PKTechnicianID      
select @PKTechnicianID      
end      
    
    
    

GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[UpdateTechnicianResume]    Script Date: 07-03-2013 13:19:15 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
-- =============================================
-- Author:		Name
-- Create date: 
-- Description:	
-- =============================================
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[UpdateTechnicianResume] 
	-- Add the parameters for the stored procedure here
	@ResumePath varchar(100), 
	@PKTechnicianID int 
AS
BEGIN
	-- SET NOCOUNT ON added to prevent extra result sets from
	-- interfering with SELECT statements.
	SET NOCOUNT ON;

    -- Insert statements for procedure here
	update technician set ResumePath = @ResumePath where PKTechnicianID= @PKTechnicianID
END

GO
